
1a1(mdo 'grel): slob dpon seng+ge bzang pos mdzad pa'i nyi khri le'u brgyad ma'i dum bu dang po bzhugs//
1b1(mdo 'grel): rgya gar skad du / pany+tsa bid sha ti sa ha sri ka pradz+nyA pA ra mi tA/ bod skad du / shes rab kyi pha rol tu
1b2(mdo 'grel): phyin pa stong phrag nyi shu lnga pa / bam po dang po/ /sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/ /nyan
1b3(mdo 'grel): thos zhi ba tshol rnams kun shes nyid kyis nyer zhir khrid mdzad gang yin dang/ /'gro la phan par byed rnams laM shes nyid
1b4(mdo 'grel): kyis 'jig rten don sgrub mdzad pa gang/ /gang dang yang dag ldan pas thub rnams rnam pa kun ldan sna tshogs 'di gsung ba/ /
2a1(mdo 'grel): nyan thos byang chub sems dpa' i tshogs bcas sangs rgyas kyi ni yum de la phyag 'tshal lo/ /rgyal sras
2a2(mdo 'grel): gang dag skye bo ma lus bsgral phyir byang chub tu ni yid byas dang/ so sor byang chub rtogs nas gang dag slar yang mnyam med sgom
2a3(mdo 'grel): par byed rnams dang / slob ma dang ni slob ma'i lam 'gro nyon mongs zil mnan 'gro ba gang yin pa/ /de dag thams cad dam
2a4(mdo 'grel): pa'i chos mnyan phyir na rab dga' i yid kyis 'dir spyon cig /gang phyir dri ma mang pos dus 'di de bzhin ma yin 'gro ba 'di
2b1(mdo 'grel): yin zhing/ /lta ba mchog tu mi legs chags sdang mun pa rab tu lhag gyur mi g.yo la/ /tshe yang ring po med dang mun pas dri bral snang ba bzang po dang
2b2(mdo 'grel): ldan pa/ /the tshom yul min mdo 'di kye ma rnyed dka' bas na rigs par bdag gis dbye/ /'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus cig na/ bcom
2b3(mdo 'grel): ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab kyi ri bya rgod 'phungs pa na bzhugs te/ dge slong lnga stong tsam gyi dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po thams cad kyang dgra bcoM
2b4(mdo 'grel): pa/ zag pa zad pa/ nyon mongs pa med pa/ dbang du gyur pa / sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/ shes rab shin tu rnam par grol pa /
2b5(mdo 'grel): cang shes pa/ glang po chen po/ bya ba byas pa/ byed pa byas pa/ khur bor ba/ bdag gi don rab tu thob pa/ srid par kun tu sbyor ba/
3a1(mdo 'grel): yongs su zad pa/ yang dag par kun shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/ sems kyi dbang thams cad la pha rol tu phyin pa'i mchog
3a2(mdo 'grel): thob pa rnams dang thabs cig go /gang zag gcig ma gtogs pa ni 'di ltar slob ma rgyun tu zhugs pa tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo'o/ /dge slong ma grags 'dzin
3a3(mdo 'grel): dang/ skye dgu'i bdag mo chen mo la sogs pa lnga brgya tsam dang/ dge bsnyen dang /dge bsnyen ma shin tu mang po kun kyang chs mthong ba dag dang yang thabs cig
3a4(mdo 'grel): go /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa byed ba khrag khrig brgya stong dang yang thabs cig ste / thams cad kyang gzungs rab tu thob pa/ ting nge 'dzin
3a5(mdo 'grel): rab tu thob pa/ stong pa nyid kyis rnam par spyod pa/ mtshan ma med pa'i spyod yul can/ rtog pa med pa'i smon lam dang ldan pa/ chos thams cad la mnyam pa
3b1(mdo 'grel): nyid kyis bzod pa rab tu thob pa/ chags pa med pa'i gzungs rab tu thob pa/ mngon par shes pa shin tu ma nyams pa/ mnyan par 'os pa'i tshig dang ldan pa/ tshul 'chos pa med pa/ kha gsag med pa/ grags
3b2(mdo 'grel): ba dang/ khe dang bkur sti'i sems med pa/ zang zing med pa'i chos ston pa/ chos zab mo'i bzod pa dam pa rtogs par khong du chud pa/ mi 'jigs pa chen po thob pa/ bdud kyi las thams cad las yang
3b3(mdo 'grel): dag par 'das pa/ las kyi sgrib pa rgyun chad pa/ chos rab tu rtogs pas rnam par dbye zhing bstan pa la mkhas pa/ bskal ba grangs med pa nas smon lam shin tu brtsams pa/ bzhin 'dzum pa dang ldan pa/
3b4(mdo 'grel): sngon du smra ba/ khro gnyer med pa/ pha rol la tshigs su bcad pa'i dbyangs su brjod pa la mkhas pa/ zhum pa'i sems dang bral ba/ spobs pa mi chod pa/ 'khor mdza' yas pa zil gis gnon pa'i mi
3b5(mdo 'grel): 'jigs pa dang ldan pa/ bskal pa bye ba mta' yas pa las nges par 'byung ba la mkhas pa/ chos thams cad sgyu ma dang smig rgyu dang/ chu zla dang rmi lam dang/ sgra brnyan dang/ mig yor dang/ gzugs brnyan
3b6(mdo 'grel): dang/ srpul pa lta bur lhag par mos pa/ sems can thams cad kyi rgyu dang/ sems can thams cad kyi 'gro ba dang/ mos pa phra mo sna tshogs la 'jug par mkhas pa/ sems can thams cad la sdang pa med pa'i
4a1(mdo 'grel): sems dang ldan pa/ bzod pa rlabs po che dang ldan pa/ bdag nyid ji lta ba bzhin 'jug pa la mkhas pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du bkod pa mdza' yas par smon pa dang 'jug pa yongs su bzung ba
4a2(mdo 'grel): 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa na bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i ting nge 'dzin rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par mngon du gyur pa/ sangs rgyas dpag tu med pa la gsol ba 'debs pa la mkhas pa/ sems can
4a3(mdo 'grel): gyi lta ba sna tshogs dang bag la nyal dang kun nas ldang ba'i nyon mongs pa zhi bar bya ba la mkhas pa/ ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par rtson pa brgya stong mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas pa/ yon tan brjod pa bskal pa
4a4(mdo 'grel): mdza' yas par mi zad pa dang ldan pa sha stag dang thabs cig ste/ 'di lta ste skye ba gcig gis thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzang skyong dang/ rin chen 'byung gnas dang/ ded dpon dam pa
4a5(mdo 'grel): dang skyes bus byin pa dang chus byin dang/ dbang pos byin dang blo gros dam pa dang/ khyad par blo gros dang/ blo gros 'phel ba dang/ don yod mthong ba dang/ rab tu zhugs pa dang/ rog kyi rtsal gyi rnam par gnon pa dang/ rtag tu brtson pa dang/
4a6(mdo 'grel): rtag tu sbyor ba dang/ mi gtong brtson pa dang/ nyi ma'i snying po dang/ blo gros dpe med pa dang/ spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po dang mthu chen pa dang/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang/ rdo rje blo gros dang/ lag na rin chen phyag rgya dang /
4b1(mdo 'grel): rtag tu lag brkyang dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa dang/ de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dag dang thabs cig ge/ de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi gdan seng+ge'i khri bshams nas/ sku drang por
4b2(mdo 'grel): bsrangs te/ dgongs pa mngon du bzhag nas skyel mo krung bcas te bzhug so/ /der bzhugs nas ting nge 'dzin gong du ting nge 'dzin thams cad khongs su chud pas 'du ba dang rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur ba ting nge 'dzin gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag go /
4b3(mdo 'grel): de nas bcom ldan 'das dgongs shing yang dag par mthon pas ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs te ? lha'i spyan gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad la rnam par gzigs so/ /de ltar gzigs nas sku thams cad nas 'od zer rab tu bkye ste/ de'i zhags kyi mthil
4b4(mdo 'grel): gnyis kyi 'khor lo rtsibs stong dang ldan pa gnyis las kyang 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgyu stong drug cu drug cu byung ngo/ /zhabs kyi sor mo bcu las kyang 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu drug cu byung ngo/ /zhabs long bu gnyis dang/ zhabs byin pa gnyis dang
4b5(mdo 'grel): zhabs dus mo gnyis dang/ zhabs brla gnyis dang/ bku? sta zur gnyis dang/ sku lte ba'i dkyil 'khor dang/ sku rtsibs logs gnyis dang/ thugs ka'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan dpal gyi be'u las kyang 'od zer gye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu drug cu byung ngo/ /phyag gi
4b6(mdo 'grel): sor mo bcu las kyang 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu drug cu byung ngo/ /de bzhin du phyag lag dar gnyis dang/ dpung pa gnyis dang/ mgur dang /tshems mche ba bzhi dang/ tshems bzhi bcu dang/ spyan gnyis dang/ snyan gnyis dang/ shangs kyi sbubs gnyis dang
4b7(mdo 'grel): ? tshags kyi mdzod spu dang/ steng gi spyi gtsug dang/ zhal gyi sgo nas kyang 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu drug cu byung ste/ 'od zer bye ba phrag khrig brgya stong drug cu po de dag thams cad kyi stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dag thams cad snang ba?/ 
5a1(mdo 'grel): chen pos khyab par byas te/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so/ /de bzhin du/ lho dang/ nub dang/ byang dang/ byang shar dang/ shar lho dang/ lho nub dang/ nub byang gi phyogs
5a2(mdo 'grel): mchags dang/ 'og dang/ steng gi phyogs su re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so/ sems can gang gis 'od zer de mthong pa dang/ /'od zer de mthong pa dang/ 'od zer des gang la reg par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang
5a3(mdo 'grel): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyiS pa spu'i sgo thams cad nas 'od zer rab tu bskye pa mdzad de/ ba spu'i bu ga re re nas kyang 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong drug cu drug cu byung ngo/ /'od
5a4(mdo 'grel): zer nges kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jigs rten gyi khams 'di snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so/ /shar phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so/ /de bzhin du lho dang/ nub dang/ byang dang/ byang shar dang
5a5(mdo 'grel): shar lho dang/ lho nub dang/ nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang/ 'og dang/ steng gi phyogs su phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i glung gi bye ma snyed snang ba chen pos khyab par byas so/ /sems can gang gis 'od de mthong ba dang/ 'od des gang la reg
5a6(mdo 'grel): par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i rang bzhin gyi 'od gang yin pa des/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
5a7(mdo 'grel): 'di snang ba chen pos khyab par mdzad pa dang/ phyogs bcu po rnams thams cad kyi phyogs re rer/'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rang bzhin gyi 'od des khyab par mdzad nas/ 'od des gang la reg par gyur pa de dag thams cad
5b1(mdo 'grel): kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges pa'i bar du gyur to/ /de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal gyi sgo nas ljags kyi dbang po bkram te/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad ljags kyi dbang po des khyab par
5b2(mdo 'grel): mdzad nas ljags kyi dbang po de las 'od rab tu bkyi? ste/ 'od de las 'od zer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma mthon to/ 'od zer gyi rtse mo re re las kyang rin po che'i rang bzhin gyi pad+ma gser gyi mdog tu snang ba 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa sna tshogs su 'dus pa
5b3(mdo 'grel): lta na sdug pa yid du 'ong ba kha dog bzang ba dri zhim pa 'jam pa ka tsa lindi ki ltar reg na bde bar 'gyur ba sha stag kun nas gnas par gyur to/ /pad+ma de dag la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku chos ston par mdzad cing gnas pa rnams bzhugs te/ 'di lta
5b4(mdo 'grel): ste pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pI chos bstan pa 'di nyid ston par mdzad do/ /de dag shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du gshegs shing de dag tu byon nas 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid ki chos
5b5(mdo 'grel): ston to/ /de bzhin du de dag lho dang/ nub dang/ byang dang/ byang shar dang/ shar lho dang/ lho nub dang/ nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang/ 'og dang steng gi phyogs su phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu gshegs shing/ de dag tu
5b6(mdo 'grel): byon nas kyang 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid kyis chos ston to/ /sems can gang gis chos de dag thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to/ /de nas bcom
5b7(mdo 'grel): ldan 'das kyis gdan seng ge'i khri de la bzhugs bzhin du sangs rgyas ki ting nge 'dzin seng ge rnam par rol pa zhes bya ba la mnyam par bzhag ste/ de lta bu'i gzugs kyi rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du mdzad do/ /ji lta bu'i gzugs kyis rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du
6a1(mdo 'grel): *//mdzad pas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jir rten gyi khams 'di rnam par 'gyur ba drug tu g.yos so/ /rab tu g.yos so/ /kun tu rab tu g.yos so/ /'gul to/ /rab tu 'gul to/ /kun tu rab tu 'gul to/ /ldeg go/ rab tu ldeg go/
6a2(mdo 'grel): kun tu rab tu ldeg go/ tsham/ rab tu chem/ kun tu rab tu chem mo/ /'khrugs rab tu 'khrugs/ kun tu rab tu 'khrugs so/ /'ur 'ur rab tu 'ur 'ur/ kun tu rab tu 'ur 'ur ro/ /mdza' mtho na ni dbus dma'/dbus mthon ni mdza' dma' ste/ dal bus
6a3(mdo 'grel): bags kyis nyams su bde bar sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba bskyed par gyur to/ /de nas de'i tshe skad cig yud tsam thang cig la/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ sems can dmyal pa dang/ byol song gi skye gns dang
6a4(mdo 'grel): gshin rje'i 'jig rten gang dag yod pa de dag rgyun chad cing stongs par gyur to/ /mi khom pa thams cad kyang zad par gyur to/ /sems can gang dag dmyal ba dang/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten de rnams las shi 'phos pa de dag
6a5(mdo 'grel): kyang dang ba dang rab tu dga' ba de nyid kyis mi rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skyes par gyur to/ /de bzhin du rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha dang/ sum cu rtsa gsum dang/ 'thab bral dang/ dga' ldan dang/ 'phrul dga' dang/ gzhal 'phrul dbang byed ki
6a6(mdo 'grel): lha dang skal ba mnyam par skyes par gyur to/ /de nas mi de dag dang lha de dag bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi mthus sngon gyi tshe rabs rjes su dran par gyur te/ rjes su dran nas dang pa dang rab tu dga' bas bcom ldan 'das ga na ba der dong zhing phyin nas/
6a7(mdo 'grel): bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom ldan 'das la thal mo sbyor zhing 'dud par gyur to/ /de bzhin du shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi bams? gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dang/ lho phyogs dang/ nub phyogs dang/ byang phyogs
6b1(mdo 'grel): dang/ phyogs mtshams rnams dang/ 'og dang steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs bcu po rnams kun tu phyogs kyi cha re rer 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can dmyal ba thams cad dang/ byol song gi skye gnas thams cad dang/ gshin rje'i 'jig/
6b2(mdo 'grel): rten thams cad kyang rgyun chad cing stongs par gyur / mi khom pa thams cad kyang nub par gyur to/ sems can gang dag dmyal ba dang/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten de dag nas shi 'phos pa de dag thams cad kyang mi dang lhar skal pa mnyam
6b3(mdo 'grel): par skyes par gyur to/ /mi dang lha rnams su skyes pa de dag kyang bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi mthus sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran par gyur te/ rjes su dran nas kyang dang ba dang rab tu dga' ba de nyid kyis rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das byung par
6b4(mdo 'grel): gyur pa de dag gi drung du dong zhing phyin nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de rnams kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/ thams cad thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das rnams la 'dud par gyur to/ /de nas de'i tshe stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams
6b5(mdo 'grel): 'di ni sems can dmus long ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyang mig gis gzugs mthong bar gyur to/ /sems can 'on pa rnams kyang rna bas sgra thos par gyur to/ /smyon pa rnams kyang dran pa thob par gyur to/ /sems 'khrugs pa rnams kyang sems
6b6(mdo 'grel): rtse gcig pa thob par gyur to/ /gos med pa rnams kyang gos thob par gyur to/ /dbul po rnams kyang nor thob par gyur to/ /bkres pa rnams kyang zas thob par gyur to/ /skom pa rnams kyang btung ba thob par gyur to/ /nad kyis btab pa rnams kyang nad med par gyur to
6b7(mdo 'grel): lus nyams kha dang dbang po mtshang ba rnams kyang lus nang dbang po tshang zhing rgyas par gyur to/ /ngal ba rnams kyang la sos par gyur to/ /lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las kyi mdza' dpa' cho ba mi dge pa ma spangs pa rnams kyang/ lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las kyi mdza' dang 'cho
7a1(mdo 'grel): ba mi dge ba spangs par gyur to/ /sems can thams cad kyang sems can thams cad la dper na/ pha dang/ ma dang/ phu?  nu dang/ srin mo dang/ mdza' ba dang/ gnyen dang/ grogs po dang mtshungs pa'i sems kyis phan tshun sems
7a2(mdo 'grel): mnyam pa nyid du gyur to/ /sems can thams cad kyang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan zhing tshangs par spyod pa dang/ gtsang pa dang/ nyes pa'i dring ba med de/ mi dge ba'i rtog pa thams cad dang bral bar gyur to/ /de'i tshe sems can thams cad kyang
7a3(mdo 'grel): bde ba thams cad dang ldan par gyur to/ /'di lta bu'i bde ba dang ldan par gyur te/ dper na dge slong bsam gtan gsum pa la snyoms par zhugs pa'i bde ba di lta bu'i bde ba thams cad dangldan par gyur to/ /de'i tshe 'di lta ba'i rang bzhin dang
7a4(mdo 'grel): ldan par gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan bzhugs pa'i sngs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi dul ba ni legs so/ /zhi ba ni legs so/ /yang dag par sdom pa ni legs so/ /yun ring du tshangs par spyod pa la gnas pa ni legs so/ /srog chags su
7a5(mdo 'grel): gyur pa rnams la mi 'tshe ba ni legs zhes ched du brjod pa ched du brjod par gyur to/ /de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das gdan seng ge'i khri de nyid la bzhugs pas 'di lta ste/ dper na nyi ma bsgribs pa med pa nam mkha' i dbyings yongs su dag pa la 'dug pa'am
7a6(mdo 'grel): zla ba nya ba'i dkyil 'khor ltar stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams ri rab dang bcas pa/ khor yug dang bcas pa/ lha'i gnas dang bcas pa/ dbang po dang bcas pa/ dbang byed dang bcas pa/ lha dang lha ma yin gyi ris dang bcas pa/ tshangs pa
7a7(mdo 'grel): dang bcas pa/ gtsang ma'i gnas dang bcas pa 'di zil gyis mnan te bzhugs na/ 'od dang/ sku mdog dang/ gzi brjid dang/ dpal gyis mdzes shing lha me lhan ne lhang de'o/ /ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten
6b1(mdo 'grel): gyi khams zil gyis mnan te/ 'od dang/ sku dang/ sku mdog dang/ gzi brjid dang/ dpal gyis mdzes shing lha ma me lhan Ne?/ lhang der bzhugs ba de bzhin du shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed zil gyis mnan te 'od dang/ sku mdog dang/ gzi brjid
6b2(mdo 'grel): dang/ dpal gyis mdzes shing lha me lhan ne lhang der bzhugs so/ /lho dang/ nub dang/ byang dang/ byang shar dang/ shar lho dang/ lho nub dang/ nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang/ 'og dang/ stong gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i
6b3(mdo 'grel): gi bye ma snyed zil gyis mnan te/ 'od dang/ sku mdog dang/ gzi brjid dang/ dpal gyis mdzes shing lha ma me lhan ni lhang der bzhugs so/ /'di lta ste dper na/ ri'i rgyal po ri rab ri nag po gzhan thams cad zil gyis non par gnas pa ni mdzes shing
6b4(mdo 'grel): lham mo lhen ne lhang de'o/ /'di lta ste dper na/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor skar ma'i gzugs thams cad zil gyis non par gnas pa ni mdzes shing lha ma me lhan ne lhang de'o/ /'di lta ste dper na/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'od gzhan thams cad zil gyis non
6b5(mdo 'grel): par gnas pa ni mdzes shing lham me lhan ne lhang de'o/ /de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten lha dang bcas pa/ dbang po dang bcas pa/ tshangs pa dang bcas pa/ gtsang ma'i gnas rang bcas bzil gyis non par bzhugs pa yang 'od dang
6b6(mdo 'grel): skumdog dang/ gzi brjid dang bcas/ dpal gyis mdzes shes lham me lhan ne lhang de'o/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir bcom ldan 'das kyi rang bzhin gyi sku ci 'dra ba bzhin du bstan to/ /de nas
6b7(mdo 'grel): stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi bams 'di'i gtsang ma'i gnas kyi lha'i ris dang/ kun snang dang ba dang/ tshangs ris dang/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang/ 'phrul dga' dang/ dga' ldan dang/ 'thab bral dang/ sum cu rtsa gsum dang/ rgyal chen bzhi'i
8a1(mdo 'grel): ris kyi lte gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gdan seng ge'i khri la bzhugs pa mthong nas dga' zhing spro ba dang/ yid bde zhing rab tu dga' la?
8a2(mdo 'grel): nyams bde ba dang yid bde ba skyes nas lha rdzas kyi me tog dang/ phreng ba dang/ spos dang/ byug pa dang/ phye ma dang/ na bza' dang/ lha rdzas kyi byug spos dang/ lha rdzas kyi yul la dag bstod? ku mu pa dang/ puN+Da? rI ka dang/ na li na dang/ sau ka ndi dang/
8a3(mdo 'grel): lha rdzas kyi me tog kai sa ra dang/ ta ma la'i lo ma dang/ lha rdzas kyin bza' dang/ rgyan dang/ gduD dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ lha rdzas kyi mnan man pa thogs nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/ me tog dang/ phreng ba dang/ spos dang/ rgyug pa
8a4(mdo 'grel): dang/ phye ma dang/ byug spos dang/ utpal dang/ padmo dang/ ku mu da dang/ puN+Da ri ka dang/ na lin dang/ so gan+d+ri dang/ me tog kai sa ra dang/ til ma'i lo ma dang/ lha rdzas kyi na bza' dang/ rgyan dang/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ lha'i ba dan dag gis
8a5(mdo 'grel): bcom ldan 'das la gtor to/ /mngon par gtor to/ /rab tu gtor to/ /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na 'bul ba dang snod du gyur ba'i mi ji snyed cig yod pa de dag kyang me tog chu las skyes pa dang/ thang las skyes pa
8a6(mdo 'grel): mang po khyer nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong zhing byin nas/ bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byed par gyur to/ /me tog dang/ phreng ba dang/ spos dang/ byug pa dang/ phye ma la sogs pa dang/ na bza' dang/ rgyun dang/ bdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan
8a7(mdo 'grel): dang/ bdan de dag thams cad kyang de ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das kyis byin gyis brlabs kyis/ bcom ldan 'das kyi dbu'i steng gi nam mkha' la me tog la sogs pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams tsam du red de
8b1(mdo 'grel): gnas par gyur to/ /khang pa brtsegs pa de las kyang lha rdzas kyi me tog dang/ dar gyi lnga ldi mang po 'phyang bar gyur to/ /mngon par 'byang bur gyur to/ /rab tu 'phyang bar gyur to/ /me tog dang ? gyi lnga ldi de dag gi stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di
8b2(mdo 'grel): shin tu mdzes par gyur to/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od snang ba gser phyi kha dog lta bu nges kyang shin tu mngos shing lha me lhan ne lhang der gyur to/ /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di ci lta ba de bzhin du shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
8b3(mdo 'grel): gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od snang ba des khyab cing gsal bar gyur to/ /lho dang/ nub dang/ byung dang/ byang shar dang/ shar lho dang/ lho nub dang/ nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang/'og dang/ stel gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re zing 'jig rten gyi
8b4(mdo 'grel): khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang bcom ldan 'das kyi 'od snang ba des khyab cing gsal bar gyur to/ /de la 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku lta bs cho ga mi shes pa de mthong nas 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa
8b5(mdo 'grel): bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo/ /'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams ji ltar sems pa de bzhin du nub kyil ? sbyod dang/ shar gyi lus 'phags po dag byang gi sgra mi spyan dang/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang/ 'og min gyi lha rnams
8b6(mdo 'grel): kyi bar dang/ de bzhin du steng gi 'jig rten gyi khams dang/ stong gnyis kyi 'jig rten gyi khams dang/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi mi thams cad dang/ lha thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku lta bas cho ga mo shes pa de mthor nas
8b7(mdo 'grel): 'di snyam du sems par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa bdag cag gi mdun na bzhugs shing chos ston to snyam mo/ /de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis gdan seng ge'i khri de la bzhugs bzhin du 'od rab tu bkye bar mdzad de/ yang 'od nges stong gsum gyi stong 
9a1(mdo 'grel): chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rab tu snang bar 'gyur to/ /shar phyogs dang/ lho dang/ nub dang/ byang shar dang/ shar lho dang/ lho nub dang/ nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang/ 'og dang/ steng gi phyogs gyi phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gyi
9a2(mdo 'grel): khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ba snyed rab tu rab tu snang bar gyur to/ /'od des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na sems can gang ji snyed cig yod pa de dag thams cad kyis/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+ga'i klung gi bye ba snyed
9a3(mdo 'grel): kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa' i 'khor dang bcas pa mang po mthong bar gyur ro/ /shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ba snying
9a4(mdo 'grel): de dag na sems can gang ji snyed cig 'khod pa de dag gis kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa dge slong gi dge 'dun
9a5(mdo 'grel): dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa' i 'khor dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs pa mthong bar gyur to/ /de bzhin du 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na sems can ji snyed cig yod pa de dag gis slho dang/ nub dang/ byang dang/ byang shar dang/ shar lho dang/ lho nub dang
9a6(mdo 'grel): nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang/ 'og dang/ steng gi phyogs su phyogs re re zhing 'jig t+ten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ byang chub
9a7(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' i 'khor dang bcas pa mang po rnams mthong bar gyur to/ /'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed de dag na sems can gang dag yod pa de dag thams bcad kyis kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na/ bcom
9b1(mdo 'grel): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'isangs rgyas shAkya thub pa dge slong gi dge 'dun dang bcas pa/ byang chub sems dpa' i 'khor dang thabs cig tu bzhugs pa mthong bar gyur to/ /de nas shar phyogs 'jig rten gyi kham
9b2(mdo 'grel): gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed las 'das te/ de thams cad las pha rol po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che dang ldan pa zhes bya ba gang yin pa de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung gnas zhes bya ba bzhugs
9b3(mdo 'grel): shing 'tshal skyong par byed de/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i chos 'di nyid ston par mdzad do/ /de nas 'jig rten gyi khams de na byang chub sems dpa 'sems dpa' chen po kun nas 'od zer zhes bya ba
9b4(mdo 'grel): 'dug 'dug pas snang ba chen po de dang/ sa cher g.yas pa de dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta na chog mi shes pa de mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung gnas
9b5(mdo 'grel): gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung gnas de la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das 'od chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rten du byung ba dang/ dogs
9b6(mdo 'grel): 'di ltar cher g.yos pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'isku 'di lta bu gda' ba 'di rgyu ci lags/ rkyen ci lags/ de skad ces gsol ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung gnas kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun
9b7(mdo 'grel): nas 'od zer la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu 'di ni nub phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bya ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams mi mdzad ces bya ba yon de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
10a1(mdo 'grel): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston te/ 'di 'dra ba 'di ni de'i mthu yin no//
10a2(mdo 'grel): de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun nas 'od zer gyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung gnas pa 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mdzad der/ bcom ldan
10a3(mdo 'grel): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de blta ba dang/ de la phyag bgyi zhing bsnyen bkur ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kun kyang phal cher gzhon nur gyur pa/ gzungs
10a4(mdo 'grel): dang so so yang dag par rig pa bsgrub pa rab tu thob pa/ ting 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la dbang rab tu thob pa de dag blta ba'i slad pa'i slad du mchi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung gnas kyis bka' stsal
10a5(mdo 'grel): pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis da ltar de'i dus la bab par shes na song zhig/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung gnas kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun nas 'odzer la padmo rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba/ gser
10a6(mdo 'grel): gyi mdog tu snang ba 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa steng bkur te/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la padmo 'di dag gis gtor te/ 'di skad du bcom ldan
10a7(mdo 'grel): 'das rin chen 'byung gnas bcom ldan 'das la snyn mi mnga' 'am/ thugs gzer ma mchis sam/ ldang ba yang dam/ gshegs spyod dam/ bde ba la reg pa gnas sam zhes rmed de/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
10b1(mdo 'grel): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung gnas des bcom ldan 'das la pad mo 'di dag kyang bskur ro zhes smros shing/ rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bag yod par spyod cig /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang dag 'jig
10b2(mdo 'grel): rten gyi khams mi mdzad der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni bstan par dka' ba yin te/ der nyams par gyur te re/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun nas 'od zer gyis/ bcom ldan
10b3(mdo 'grel): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung gnas de las par mo rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba gser gyi mdog tu snang ba 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa de dag blangs te/ byang chub sems
10b4(mdo 'grel): dpa' khyim pa dang/ rab tu byung ba dang/ khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang 'grogs te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur te/ shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji
10b5(mdo 'grel): snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag thams cad la me tog dang/ sbos dang/ bdug spos dang/ /phreng ba dang/ byug pa dang/ phye ma dang/ na bza' dang/ rgyan dang/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan dag gis
10b6(mdo 'grel): rim gror bya ba dang/ bkur stir bya ba dang/ bsti stang du bya ba dang/ mchod pa byed cing/ byang chub sems dpa' i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang/ byang chub sems dpa' i mthu chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
10b7(mdo 'grel): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ /bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/ byang chub
11a1(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun nas 'od zer gyis/ /bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol te/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin
11a2(mdo 'grel): chen 'byung gnas/ bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga' 'am/ thugs gzer ma mchis sam/. ldang ba yang dam/ gshegs spyod dam/ bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes 'dri ste/ pad mo gser gyi mdog tu snang ba 'dab
11a3(mdo 'grel): ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'byung gnas kyis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das
11a4(mdo 'grel): de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas padmo de dag bzhes nas/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag
11a5(mdo 'grel): gang na bder gtor to/ /de nas pad mo de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad rgyas par gyur te/ bad mo de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'isku mang po bzhugs shing/ sangs rgyas kyi zhi? dag tu 'di lta ste/
11a6(mdo 'grel): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid stong go/ /chos bstan pa des sems can gang gis thos pa gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to/
11a7(mdo 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang/ rab tu byung ba dang/ khye'u dang/ bu mo'igzugs su 'dug pa byang chub sems dpa' kun nas 'od zer dang lhan cig tu 'jig rten gyi khams rin chen yod pa de nas 'ongs pa de
11b1(mdo 'grel): ngag gis kyang/ rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa bas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la rim gro byas so/ /bkur stir byas so/ /bsti steng du byas so/ /mchod par byas nas
11b2(mdo 'grel): phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /de nas lho phyogs legs su 'jigs rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed las 'das te/ 'di thams bcad las pha rol po'i 'jig rten gyi khams mya ngan thams cad dang bral ba zhes bya ba gang yin pa de na de
11b3(mdo 'grel): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan med pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tshol skyong bar byed de/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi phyin pa 'di nyid yang dag par
11b4(mdo 'grel): ston pa mdzad do/ /de nas 'jig rten gyi khams de na byang chub sems dpa sems dpa' chen po mya ngan med pa zhes bya ba 'dug 'dug pas snang ba chen pa de dang/ sa cher g.yos pa de dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku bstan chog mi shes
11b5(mdo 'grel): pa de mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan med pa'i dpal gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das de'i zhabs la phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
11b6(mdo 'grel): gshegs pa mya ngan med pa'i dpal de la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das 'od chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rten du byung ba dang/ dogs 'di ltar cher g.yos pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bu gda' ba 'di bci lags/
11b7(mdo 'grel): rkyen ci lags/ de skad ces gsol ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan med pa'i dpal gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan med pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu 'di nas byang phyogs logs
12a1(mdo 'grel): su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs
12a2(mdo 'grel): shing 'tsho skyong ngo/ /de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston te/ 'di 'dra ba 'di ni de'i mthu yin no/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan dang bral bas
12a3(mdo 'grel): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan med pa'i dpal la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
12a4(mdo 'grel): bar rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de blta ba dang/ de la phyag bgyi zhing bsnyen bkur ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kun kyang phal cher gzhon nur gyur pa/ gzungs dang so so yang dag par rig pa
12a5(mdo 'grel): bsgrub pa rab tu thob pa/ ting nge 'dzin dang/ snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la dbang rab tu thob pa de dag blta ba'i slad du mchi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
12a6(mdo 'grel): da lta de'i dus la bab par shes na song zhig/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan med pa'idpal gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan dang bral ba la padmo rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba/ gser gyi
12a7(mdo 'grel): mdog tu snang ba/ 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa stong bskur te/ rig kyi bu bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la padmo 'di dag gis gtor te/ 'di skad du/
12b1(mdo 'grel): bcom ldan 'das mya ngan med pa'i dpal bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga' 'am/ thugs gzer ma mchis snam/ wang ba yang dam/ gshegs spyod dam/ bde ba la dge bar gnas sam zhes rmed de/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
12b2(mdo 'grel): mya ngan med pa'i dpal des bcom ldan 'das pa pad mo de dag kyang bskur ro zhes smros shig /rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dra bag yod par spyod cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten gyi khams der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 
12b3(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' chen po de dag ni bsten par dka' ba yin te/ der nyams par gyur ter/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan dang bral bas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
12b4(mdo 'grel): sangs rgyas mya ngan med pa'i dpal de las pad mo gser gyi mdog tu snang ba 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa de dag blangs te/ byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang/ rab tu byung ba dang/ khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya
12b5(mdo 'grel): stong du mas lhan cig kun nas bskor cing mdun du bdar te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing denas mi snang bar gyur nas/ lho phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag thams cad la me tog
12b6(mdo 'grel): dang/ spos dang/ bdug spos dang/ phreng ba dang/ byug pa dang/ phye ma dang/ na bza' dang/ rgyan dang/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan dag gis rim gror bya ba dang/ bkur stir bya ba dang/ bsti stang du
12b7(mdo 'grel): bya ba dang/ mchod pa byed cing/ byang chub sems dpa' i sku 'phrul chen po dang/ byang chub sems dpa' i mthu chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa
13a1(mdo 'grel): gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /phyogs gcig tu 'khor nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mya ngan
13a2(mdo 'grel): dang bral bas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par drags pa'i sangs rgyas mya ngan med pa'i dpa' bcom ldan 'das pa lhun mo mnga' 'am/ thugs gzer ma mchis
13a3(mdo 'grel): sam/ ldang ba yang dam/ gshegs spyod dam/ bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes 'dri ste/ padmo gser gyi mdog tu sn+ng ba 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan med pa'i dpal gyis bcom ldan 'das
13a4(mdo 'grel): la mchod pa'i slad bu bskur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas padmo de dag bzhes nas/ lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gang na bder gtor to/
13a5(mdo 'grel): de nas padmo de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad rgyas par khyab par gyur te/ padmo de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po bzhugs shing sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'ichos bstan pa 'di
13a6(mdo 'grel): nyid ston to/ /chos bstan pa de sems can gang gis thos pas gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu des par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' i khyim pa dang/ rab tu byung ba dang/ khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa
13a7(mdo 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' mya ngan med pa dang lhan cig tu 'jig rten gyi khams mya ngan med pa de nas 'ongs pa de dag gis kyang rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa bas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya
13b1(mdo 'grel): thub pa la rim gror byas so/ /bkur stir byas so/ /bsti stang du byas so/ /mchod pa r byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /de nas nab phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed las 'das te/ de thams cad las pha rol pa'i 'jig rten gyi
13b2(mdo 'grel): khams nye bar zhi ba zhes bya ba gang yin pa de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'od 'phro zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong bar byed de/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes
13b3(mdo 'grel): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid yang dag par ston pa mdzad do/ /de nas 'jig rten gyi khams de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod pa'i blo gros zhes bya ba 'dug 'dug pas snang ba chen po de dang/ sa cher g.yos pa de dang/ de bzhin gshegs
13b4(mdo 'grel): pa'i sku blta na chog mi shes pa de mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'od 'phro gang ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das de'izhabs la phyag 'tshal nas/
13b5(mdo 'grel): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'od 'phro de la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das 'od chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rten du byung ba dang/ dog sa 'di ltar ches g.yos pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bu
13b6(mdo 'grel): gda' ba 'di rgyu ci lags/ rgyan ci lags/ de skad ces gsol ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das rin chen 'od 'phros byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ spyod pa'i blo gos la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu 'di nas shar
13b7(mdo 'grel): phyogs sogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams mi mdzad ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa
14a1(mdo 'grel): zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong dang/ /de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston te/ 'di 'dra ba de ni de'i mthu yin no/ /de nas byang chub sems
14a2(mdo 'grel): dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod pa'i blags kyis/ bcom ldan 'das rin chen 'od 'phrol de skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang 'jig rten kyi khams mi mjed der bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
14a3(mdo 'grel): yang dag par rdzogs pa? rgyas shAkya thub pa de blta ba dang/ de la phyag bgyi zhing bsnyen bkur ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kun kyang phal cher gzhon nur gyurpa/ gzungs dang so so yang dag par
14a4(mdo 'grel): rig pa bsgrubs rab tu 'thob pa/ ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la dbang rab tu thob pa de dag blta ba'i slad du mchi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'od 'phros bka' stsal pa/
14a5(mdo 'grel): rigs kyi bu khyod kyis da ltar de'i dusu la bab bar shes na song zhig/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'od 'phros byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyod pa'i blo gros la pad mo rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las
14a6(mdo 'grel): byung ba gser gyi mdog tu snang ba 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa stong bskur te/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la pad mo 'di
14a7(mdo 'grel): dag gis gtor te/ 'di skad du bcom ldan 'das rin chen 'od 'phro bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga' 'am/ thugs gzer ma mchis sam/ ldang ba yang dam/ gshegs spyod dam/ bde ba la rig par gnas sam/ zhes rmed de/ bcom
14b1(mdo 'grel): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'od 'phro des bcom ldan 'das la padmo 'di dag kyang bskur ro zhes smos shig/ rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bag yang par spyod cig/ de
14b2(mdo 'grel): ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten gyi khams der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni bsten par dka' ba yin te/ der nyams par gyur te de/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod pa'i blo gros kyis/ bcom
14b3(mdo 'grel): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag pad rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'od 'phrod las pad mo gser gyi mdog tu snang ba 'dab ma steng dang ldan pa de dag blangs te/ byang chub sems dpa' i khyim pa dang/ rab tu
14b4(mdo 'grel): byung ba dang/ khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang 'grogs te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ nub phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho
14b5(mdo 'grel): skyong ba de dag thams cad la me tog dang/ spos dang/ bdug spos dang/ phreng ba dang/ byug pa dang/ byeba dang/ na bza' dang/ rgyan dang/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan dag gis rim gror bya ba dang/ bkur stir bya ba dang/
14b6(mdo 'grel): bsti stang du bya ba dang/ mchod par byed cing/ byang chub sems d pa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang/ byang chub sems dpa' i mthu chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
14b7(mdo 'grel): sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gang na ba der dong ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das ki zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /phyogs gcig tu 'khod? nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyod pa'i blo gros kyis/
15a1(mdo 'grel): bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'od 'phro bcom ldan 'das la snyan
15a2(mdo 'grel): mi mnga' 'am/ thugs gzer ma mchis sam/ ldang ba yang dam/ gshegs spyod dam/ bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes 'dri ste/ padmo gser gyi mdog tu snang ba 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang bcom ldan 'das de
15a3(mdo 'grel): bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'od 'phros bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas pad mo de dag bzhes nas nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams
15a4(mdo 'grel): gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs ba'i sangs rgyas de dag gang na ba der gtor to/ /de nas padmo de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad rgyas par khyab par gyur te/
15a5(mdo 'grel): padmo de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po bzhugs shing/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid ston to/ /chos bstan pa de sems can gang
15a6(mdo 'grel): gis thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang/ rab tu byung ba dang/ khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa/
15a7(mdo 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa'i blo gros dang lhan cig 'jig rten gyi khams nye bar zhi ba de nas 'ongs pa de dag gis kyang rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsabs/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
15b1(mdo 'grel): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la rim gror byas so/ /bkur stir byas so/ /bsti stang du byas so/ /mchod par byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /de nas byang phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed
15b2(mdo 'grel): las 'das te/ de thams cad las pha rol po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgyal ba zhes bya ba gang yin pa de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyal ba'i dbang po zhes bya ba bzhugs shing
15b3(mdo 'grel): 'tsho skyong ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab ki pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid yang dg par ston pa mdzad do/ /de nas 'jig rten gyi khams de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal bas
15b4(mdo 'grel): byin zhes bya ba 'dug 'dug pas snang ba chen po dang/ sa cher g.yos pa de dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku bstan chog mi shes pa de mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs
15b5(mdo 'grel): rgyas rgyal ba'i dbang po gang na ba dar song ste byin nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal ba'i dbang po de la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das 'od chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rten du byung ba dang/ dog sa 'di ltar cher
15b6(mdo 'grel): g.yos pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bu gda' ba 'di rgyu ci lags/ rkyen ci lags/ de skad ces gsol ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal ba'i dbang pos byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
15b7(mdo 'grel): rgyal bas byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal te/ /rigs kyi bu 'di ni lho phyogs logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang ga'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams mi mdzad ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
16a1(mdo 'grel): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo/ /de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston te/ 'di 'dra ba 'di ni
16a2(mdo 'grel): de'i mthu yin no/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal bas byin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal ba'i dbang po la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mi
16a3(mdo 'grel): mdzed der bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de blda? ba dang/ de la phyag bgyi zhing bsnyen bkur ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kun kyang phal cher
16a4(mdo 'grel): gzhon nu rgyur pa/ gzungs dang so so yang dag par rig pa bsgrub pa rab tu thob pa/ ting nge 'dzin dang/ snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la dbang rab tu thob pa de dag blta ba'i slad du mchi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal ba'i
16a5(mdo 'grel): dbang pos bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis da ltar de'i dus la bab par shes na song zhig/ de nas de bzhin gshegs brgyal ba'i dbang pos byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal bas byin la/ padmo rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu
16a6(mdo 'grel): las byung ba gser gyi mdog tu snang ba 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa stong bskur te/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la padmo 'di dag gis gtor tet/
16a7(mdo 'grel): 'di skad du/ bcom ldan 'das rgyal ba'i dbang po bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga' 'am/ thugs gzer ma mchis sam/ ldang ba yang dam/ gshegs spyod dam/ bde a la reg par gnas sam zhes rmad de/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
16b1(mdo 'grel): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyal ba'i dbang po des bcom ldan 'das la padmo 'di dag kyang ngo bskur ro zhes skos shig/ rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bag yod par spyod cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten gyi khams
16b2(mdo 'grel): der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni bsten par dka' ba yin te/ dang nyams par gyur ba de/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal bas byin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
16b3(mdo 'grel): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ba'i dbang po lam padmo gser gyi mdog tu snang ba 'dab ma stol dang ldan pa de dag blangs te/ byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang/ rab tu byung ba dang/ khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong bum
16b4(mdo 'grel): dang 'grogs te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ byang phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag thams cad la me tog dang/ spos dang/ bdug spos dang/ phreng ba dang/ byug pa dang/ phye ma dang/
16b5(mdo 'grel): na bza' dang/ rgyan dang/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ bdan dag gis rim grong bya ba dang/ bkur stir bya ba dang/ bsti stang du bya ba dang/ mchod par byed cing/ byang chub sems dpa' i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang/ byang chub sems dpa' i mthu chen pos/ bcom ldan
16b6(mdo 'grel): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag bar rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas byang
16b7(mdo 'grel): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rgyal bas byin gyis/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rgyal ba'i dbang po/ bcom ldan 'da
17a1(mdo 'grel): la snyun mi mnga' 'am/ thugs gzer ma mchis sam/ ldang ba yang ngam/ gshegs spyod dam/ bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes 'dri ste/ padmo gser gyi mdog tu snang ba 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang bcom ldan
17a2(mdo 'grel): 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rgyal ba'i dbang pos bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskur bo/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas bar mo de dag bzhes nas/ byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i ? gsar ?
17a3(mdo 'grel): ma snyed po de dag gi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gang na ba der gtor to/ /de nas padmo de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad rgyas bar khyab par gyur te/ padmo de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po bzhugs ?
17a4(mdo 'grel): sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid ston to/ /chos bstan pa de sems can gang gis thos par? byung ba de dag thams cad kyang? bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges
17a5(mdo 'grel): par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' khyim ba dang/ rab tu byung ba dang/ khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa byang chub sems dpa' rgyal bas byin dang lhan cig 'jig rten gyi khams rgyal ba de nas 'ongs pa de dag gis kyang/ rang? rang gi dag pa'i
17a6(mdo 'grel): rtsa bas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la rim gror byas so/ /bkur stir byas so/ /bsti steng du byas so/ /mchod par byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /de nas
17a7(mdo 'grel): byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed las 'das te/ de thams cad la pha rol po'i 'jig rten gyi khams ting nge 'dzin gyis brgyan pa zhes bya ba gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
17b1(mdo 'grel): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid yang dag par ston pa mdzad do/ /de nas 'jig
17b2(mdo 'grel): rten gyi khams de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par gnon pa zhes bya ba 'dug 'dug pas snang pa chen po de dang/ sa cher g.yos pa de dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku nga lta na cho ga mi shes pa de mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das de
17b3(mdo 'grel): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal gang na ba?  der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal de la 'di skad ces gsol
17b4(mdo 'grel): to/ /bcom ldan 'das 'od chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rten du 'byung ba dang/ dog sa 'di ltar cher g.yos pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bu gdab ba 'di rgyu ci lags/ rkyen ci lags/ de skad ces gsol ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
17b5(mdo 'grel): gshegs pa ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal gyis byang chub sems dpa' rnam par rgyal bas rnam par gnon pa la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /rigs kyi bu 'di nas lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed
17b6(mdo 'grel): 'das ba na 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo/ /de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab
17b7(mdo 'grel): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston te/ 'di 'dra ba 'di ni de'i mthu yin no/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par rgyal bas rnam par gnon pas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal la 'di skad ces
18a1(mdo 'grel): gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de blta ba dang/ de la phyag bgyi zhing bsten
18a2(mdo 'grel): bkur ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kun kyang phal cher gzhon nur gyur pa/ gzungs dang so so yang dag par rig pa bsgrub pa rab tu thob pa/ ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la dbang rab tu thob pa de dag ?
18a3(mdo 'grel): ba'i slad du mchi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal gyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis/ da ltar de'i dus la bab par shes na song zhig/ //bam po gnyis pa/ /de nas de bzhin
18a4(mdo 'grel): gshegs pa ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po dam? pa'i? dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par rgyal bas rnam par gnon pa la padmo rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba/ gser gyi mdog tu snang ba 'dab ma stob dang ldan pa stong bskur? te/
18a5(mdo 'grel): rigs kyi bu khyod kyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la padmo 'di dag gis gtor te/ 'di skad du bcom ldan 'das ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal bcom ldan 'das
18a6(mdo 'grel): la snyun? mi mnga' 'am/ thugs gzer ma mchis sam/ ldang ba yang ngam/ gshegs spyod dam/ bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes rmed de/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ting nge
18a7(mdo 'grel): 'dzin gyi glang po daM pI dpal des bcom ldan 'das la padmo 'di dag kyang bskur ro zhes smros shig/ rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bag yod par spyod cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten gyi khams der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
18b1(mdo 'grel): chen po de dag ni bsten par bka' ba yin te/ der nyams par gyur ta re/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par rgyal bas rnam par gnon pas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
18b2(mdo 'grel): ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal de las padmo gsar gyi mdog tu snang ba 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa de dag blangs te/ byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang/ rab tu byung ba dang/ khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang 'grogs
18b3(mdo 'grel): te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ /byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dag thams cad la me tog dang/ spos dang/ bdug spos dang/ phreng ba dang/
18b4(mdo 'grel): byug pa dang/ phye ma dang/ na bza' dang/ rgyan dang/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan dag gis rim gror bya ba dang/ bkur stir bya ba dang/ bsti stang du bya ba dang/ mchod par byed cing/ byang chub sems dpa' i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang/ byang chub
18b5(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' i mthu chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gang na ba der seng ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs
18b6(mdo 'grel): gcig tu 'khod do/ /phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam par rgyal bas rnam par gnon pas/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
18b7(mdo 'grel): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga' 'am/ thugs gzer ma mchis sam/ ldang ba yang ngam/ gshegs spyod dam/ bde ba la reg par gnas sam
19a1(mdo 'grel): zhes 'dri ste/ padmo gser gyi mdog tu snang ba 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag byang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ting nge 'dzin gyi glang po dam pa'i dpal gyis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro/ /
19a2(mdo 'grel): de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas padmo de dag bzhes nas/ byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
19a3(mdo 'grel): sangs rgyas de dag gang na ba der gtor to/ /de nas padmo de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad rgyas par khyab par gyur te/ pad mo de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po bzhugs shing/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu
19a4(mdo 'grel): 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid ston to/ /chos bstan pa de sems can gang gis thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur te/ /byang chub semS
19a5(mdo 'grel): dpa' khyim pa dang/ rab tu byung ba dang/ khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa byang chub sems dpa' rnam par rgyal bas rnam par gnon pa dang lhan cig 'jig rten gyi khams ting nge 'dzin gyis brgyan pa de nas 'ongs pa de dag gis kyang rang rang gi dge
19a6(mdo 'grel): ba'i rtsa bas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la rim gror byas so/ /bkur bstir byas so/ /bsti stang du byas so/ /mchod par byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /de nas shar
19a7(mdo 'grel): lho'i phyogs mtshams su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed las 'das te/ de thams cad las pha rol po'i 'jig rten gyi khams snying po byang chub kyi rgyan shin tu yid du 'ong ba zhes bya ba gang yin pa de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcoM
19b1(mdo 'grel): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas padmo dam pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ste/ /de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid yang dag par ston pa mdzad do/ /de nas 'jig rten gyi
19b2(mdo 'grel): khams de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na padmo zhes bya ba 'dug 'dug pas snang ba chen po de dang/ sa cher g.yes pa de dang/ de bzhin gsh+gs pa'i sku? bstan chog mi shes pa de mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegS
19b3(mdo 'grel): pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas padmo dam pa'i dpal gang ni bder song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa padmo dam pa'i dpal de la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das 'od chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rten du
19b4(mdo 'grel): byung ba dang/ dogs 'di ltar cher g.yos pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bu gda' pa 'di rgyu ci lags/ rkyen ci lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa padmo dam pa'i dpal gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems
19b5(mdo 'grel): dpa' chen po lag na padmo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu 'di ni nub byang gi phyogs mtshams logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams mi mdzed ces bya ba yod de/ don de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
19b6(mdo 'grel): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ngo/ /de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston te/ 'di 'dra ba 'di ni de'i mthu yin no/ /de nas byang chub
19b7(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na padmos bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa padmo dam pa'i dpal la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mdzad der bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
20a1(mdo 'grel): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de blta ba dang/ de la phyag bgyi? zhing bsnyen bkur ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kun kyang phal? cher gzhon nur gyur pa/ gzungs
20a2(mdo 'grel): dang so so yang dag par reg pa bsgrub pa rab tu thob pa/ ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la dbang rab tu thob pa de dag blta ba'i slad du mchi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa padmo dam pa'i dpal gyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs
20a3(mdo 'grel): kyi bu khyod kyis nga ltar de'i dus la bab par shes na song zhig/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa padmo dam pa'i dpal gyis byang chub sems dpa' lag na padmo la padmo rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba gser gyi mdog tu snang ba 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa
20a4(mdo 'grel): stong bskur te/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la padmo 'di dag gis gtor te/ 'di skad du bcom ldan 'das padmo dam pa'i dpal bcom ldan 'das la
20a5(mdo 'grel): snyun mi mnga' 'am/ thugs gzer ma mchis sam/ ldang ba yang ngam/ gshegs spyod ngam/ bd ba la reg par gnas sam/ zhes rmong de/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas padmo dam pa'i
20a6(mdo 'grel): dpal des bcom ldan 'das la padmo 'di dag kyang bskur ro zhes smos shig /rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bag yod par spyod cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten gyi khams der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni
20a7(mdo 'grel): bsten par dka' ba yin te/ der nyams par gyur ta re/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na padmos/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas padmo dam pa'i dpal de las
20b1(mdo 'grel): padmo? gser gyi mdog tu snang ba 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa de dag blangs nas/ byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang/ rab tu byung ba dang/ khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa bya? ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang 'grogs te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas/
20b2(mdo 'grel): shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong pa de dag thams cad la me tog dang/ spos dang/ bdug spos dang/ phreng ba dang/ byug pa dang/ phye ma dang/ na bza' dang/ rgyan dang/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan
20b3(mdo 'grel): dang/ bden dag gis rim gror bya ba dang/ bkur stir bya ba dang/ bsti stang du bya ba dang/ mchod pa by+d cing/ byang chub sems dpa' i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang/ byang chub sems dpa' i mthu chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
20b4(mdo 'grel): rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi thos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na padmos bcom ldan
20b5(mdo 'grel): 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas padmo dam pa'i dpal/ bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga' 'am/ thugs gzar ma mchis sam/ ldang ba yang ngam/ gshegs spyod
20b6(mdo 'grel): dam/ bde ba la rig par gnas sam zhes 'dri ste/ padmo gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas padmo dam pa'i dpal gyis bcom ldan 'das la mchod 
20b7(mdo 'grel): pa'i slad du bskur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas padmo de dag bzhes nas/ shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snying po de dag gi
21a1(mdo 'grel): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gang na ba der gtor to/ /de nas padmo de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad rgyas par khyab par gyur te/ padmo de dag la de bzhin gshegs pI
21a2(mdo 'grel): sku mang po bzhugs shing/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dang tu 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid ston to/ /chos bstan pa de sems can gang gis thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par
21a3(mdo 'grel): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang/ rab tu byung ba dang/ khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa byang chub sems dpa' lag na padmo dang lhan cig 'jig rten gyi khams snying po byang chub kyi rgyan shin tu yid du 'ong ba de nas
21a4(mdo 'grel): 'ongs pa de dag gis kyang/ rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa bas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la rim gror byas so/ /bkur stir byas so/ /bsti stang du byas so/ /mchod par byas nas phyogs gcig tu
21a5(mdo 'grel): 'khod do/ /de nas lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed las 'das te/ de thams cad las pha rol po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rdul gyi tshogs dang bral ba zhes bya ba gang yin pa de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
21a6(mdo 'grel): par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpal zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid yang dag par ston pa mdzad do/ /de nas 'jig rten gyi
21a7(mdo 'grel): khams? de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi ma rab tu snang ba zhes bya ba 'dug 'dug pas snang ba chen po de dang/ sa cher? g.yos pa de dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku bstan chog mi shes pa de mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra
21b1(mdo 'grel): bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpal gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpal de la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das 'od chen po 'di lta bu
21b2(mdo 'grel): 'jig rten du byung ba dang/ dogs 'di ltar cher g.yos pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bu gda' ba ni rgyu ci lags/ rkyen ci lags/ de skad ces gsol ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi mI dkyil
21b3(mdo 'grel): 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpal gyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi ma rab tu snang ba de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed las 'das pa na
21b4(mdo 'grel): 'jig rten gyi khams mi mdzed ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya bzhugs shing mtsho skyong ngo/ /de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
21b5(mdo 'grel): ston te/ 'di 'dra ba 'di ni de'i mthu yin no/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi ma rab tu snang bas/ bcom ldan 'das nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpal la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang 'jig rten gyi
21b6(mdo 'grel): khams mi mdzed der bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de blta ba dang/ de la phyag bgyi zhing bsnyen bkur ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kun kyang pa 'cher
21b7(mdo 'grel): gzhon nur gyur pa/ gzungs dang so so yang dag par rig pa bsgrub pa rab tu thob pa/ ting 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad la dbang rab tu thob pa de dag blta ba'i slad du mchi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor
22a1(mdo 'grel): snang ba dam pa'i dpal gyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis da ltar de'i dus la bab par shes na song zhing/ /de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i
22a2(mdo 'grel): dpal gyis/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi ma rab tu snang ba la padmo rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyu las byung ba/ gser gyi mdog tu snang ba 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa stong bkur te/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa
22a3(mdo 'grel): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de la padmo 'di dag gis gtor te/ 'di skad du bcom ldan 'das nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpal bcom ldan 'das la snyun? mi mnga' 'am/ thugs gzer ma mchis sam/ ldad ba
22a4(mdo 'grel): yang dam/ gshegs spyod dam/ bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes rmed de/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpal nges bcom ldan 'das la padmo 'di dag kyang
22a5(mdo 'grel): bskur ro zhes smros shig /rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bag yod par spyod cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten gyi khams der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni bsten par dka' ba yin te/ der nyams par gyur ta re?/ de nas
22a6(mdo 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi ma rab tu snang bas bcom ldan 'das nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpal de las padmo gser gyi mdog tu snang ba 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa de dag blangs te/ byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang/ rab tu
22a7(mdo 'grel): byung ba dang/ khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang 'grogs te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nas mi snang bar gyur nas lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyad cig bzhugs shing/ 'tsho skyong ba de
22b1(mdo 'grel): dag thams cad la me tog dang/ spos dang/ bdug spos dang/ phreng ba dang/ byug pa dang/ phye mya ngan/ na bza' dang/ rgyan dang/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan ngag gis rim gror bya ba dang/ bkur stir bya ba dang/ bsti stang du bya ba dang/ mchod par byed cing/
22b2(mdo 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang/ byang chub sems dpa' i mthu chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhags?
22b3(mdo 'grel): gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyi ma rab tu snang bas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
22b4(mdo 'grel): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpal/ bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga' 'am/ thugs gzer ma mchis sam/ ldang ba yang dam/ gshegs spyod dam/ bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes 'od? ste/ padmo gser gyi mdog
22b5(mdo 'grel): tu snang ba 'dab ma stod dang ldan pa 'di dag kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor snang ba dam pa'i dpal gyis bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskur ro/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das
22b6(mdo 'grel): de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas padmo de dag bzhes nas/ lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed po de dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogS
22b7(mdo 'grel): pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gang na ba der gtor to/ /de nas padmo de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad rgyas par khyab par gyur te/ padmo de dag la de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mang po bzhugs shing/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha
23a1(mdo 'grel): rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid ston to/ /chos bstan pa de sems can gang gis thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' 
23a2(mdo 'grel): khyim pa dang/ rab tu byung ba dang/ khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa byang chub sems dpa' nyi ma rab tu snang ba dang lhan cig 'jig rten gyi khams rdul gyi tshogs dang bral ba de nas 'ongs ba de dag gis kyang rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa bas bcom
23a3(mdo 'grel): ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la rim gror byas so/ /bkur stir byas so/ /bsti snang? du byas so/ /mchod par byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /de nas nub byang gi phyogs mtshaMs?  su
23a4(mdo 'grel): 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed las 'das te/ de thams cad las pha rol po'i 'jig rten gyi khams dbang du gyur pa zhes bya ba gang yin pa de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gdugs dam
23a5(mdo 'grel): pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nyid yang dag par ston par mdzad do/ /de nas 'jig rten gyi khams de na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin
23a6(mdo 'grel): chen mchog ces bya ba 'dug 'dug pas snang ba chen po de dang/ sa cher g.yos pa de dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku blta na chog mi shes pa de mthong nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
23a7(mdo 'grel): gdugs dam pa gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gdugs dam pa de la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das 'od chen po 'di lta bu 'jig rten du
23b1(mdo 'grel): byung ba dang/ dogs 'di ltar cher g.yos pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku 'di lta bu gda' ba ni rgyu ci lags/ rkyen ci lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gdugs dam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
23b2(mdo 'grel): po rin chen mchog la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rigs kyi bu 'di nas shar lho'i phyogs mtshams logs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed 'das pa na/ 'jig rten gyi khams ma mthed? ces bya ba yod de/ de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
23b3(mdo 'grel): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa zhes bya ba bzhugs shing 'cho skyong ngo/ /de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ston te/ 'di 'dra ba 'di ni de'i mthu yin no/ /de nas byang chub sems dpa' 
23b4(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' chen po rin chen mchog gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gdugs dam pa la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed der bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
23b5(mdo 'grel): yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa de blta ba dang/ de la phyag bgyi zhing bsnyen bkur ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kun kyang phal cher gzho nur gyur pa/ gzungs dang so so yang dag par rig pa bsgrub pa rab tu thob pa/
23b6(mdo 'grel): ting nge 'dzin dang snyoms par 'jug pa/ thams cad la dbang rab tu thob pa de dag blta ba'i slad du mchi'o/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gdugs dam pas bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de
23b7(mdo 'grel): ltar de'i dus la bab par shes na song zhig /de nas de bzhin gsh+gs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gdugs dam pas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin chen mchog la padmo rin po che sna tshogs pa rgyu las byung ba gser
24a1(mdo 'grel): gyi mdog tu snang ba 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa stong bskur te/ rigs kyi bu khyod kyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la padmo 'di dag gis gtong te/ 'di skad
24a2(mdo 'grel): du bcom ldan 'das gdugs dam pas bcom ldan 'das la snyun mi mnga' 'am/ thugs gzed ma mchis sam/ ldang ba yang ngam/ gshegs spong dam/ bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes rmed de/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom
24a3(mdo 'grel): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gdugs dam pa nges bcom ldan 'das la padmo 'dir dag kyang bskur ro zhes smros shig /rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bas yod par spyod cig /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'jig rten gyi khams der skyes ba'i byang chub sems dpa' 
24a4(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' chen po de dag ni bsten par dka' ba yin te/ der nyams par gyur dang/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin chen mcho gis /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
24a5(mdo 'grel): gdugs dam pa de las padmo gser gyi mdog tu snang ba 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa de dag blangs te/ byang chub sems dpa' khyim ba dang/ rab tu byung ba dang/ khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang 'grogs te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de
24a6(mdo 'grel): nas mi snang bar gyur nas/ nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tshe skyong ba de dag thams cad pa me tog dang/ spos dang/ bdug spos dang/ phreng ba dang/ byug pa dang/ phye ma dang/ na bza' dang rgyun dang
24a7(mdo 'grel): gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan dag gis rim gor bya ba dang/ bkur stir bya ba dang/ bsti stang du bya ba dang/ mchod par byad cing/ byang chub sems dpa' i rdzu 'phrul chen po dang/ byang chub sems dpa' i mthu chen pos/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
24b1(mdo 'grel): gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
24b2(mdo 'grel): dpa' chen po rin chen mchog gis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gdugs dam pas/ bcom ldan 'das pa snyan? mi mnga' 'am/ thugs gzer nas
24b3(mdo 'grel): mchis sam/ ldang ba yang dam/ gshegs spyod dam/ bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes 'dri ste/ padmo gser gyi mdog tu snang ba 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa'i de dag kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas
24b4(mdo 'grel): gdugs ngam pas bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa'i slad du bskur po/ /de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pas padmo de dag bzhes nas/ nub byang gi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi
24b5(mdo 'grel): khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed pa de dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gang na bder gtor to/ /de nas padmo de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thaMs cad? rgyas par khyad par gyur te/ padmo de dag la d bzhin gshegs pa'i
24b6(mdo 'grel): sku mang po bzhugs shing/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid ston to/ /chos bstan pa de sems can gang gis thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
24b7(mdo 'grel): tu nges par gyur to/ /byang chub sems dpa' khyim pa dang/ rab tu byung ba dang/ khye'u dang bu mo'i gzugs su 'dug pa byang chub sems dpa' rin chen mchog dang lhan cig 'jig rten gyi khams dbang du gyur pa de nas 'od bas de dag gis kyang rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa bas
25a1(mdo 'grel): bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la rim gror byas so/ /bkur stir byas so/ /bsti steng du byas so/ /mchod par byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/ /de nas dog gi
25a2(mdo 'grel): phyogs su 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed las 'das te/ de thams cad las pha rol po'i 'jig rten gyi khams padmo zhes bya ba gang yin pa de na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs ba'i sangs rgyas padmo'i dpal zhes bya ba
