66b3(mdo 'grel): ni/ lha'i mig gi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/ /lha'i rna ba'i don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/ /gzhan gyi sems shes pa'i don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/ /sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa'i don
66b4(mdo 'grel): du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/ /rdzu 'phrul sgrub pa'i don du shes rab kyi phyi rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/ /zag pa zang pa'i ye shes kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar shes rab ki pha
66b5(mdo 'grel): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i che/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong na/ /byang chub sems dpa' lta gang zhig mngon par shes par thams cad lta gang las yin/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
66b6(mdo 'grel): de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni brtson zhes brjod par bya'o/ /shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'di snyam du bdag gis lha'i mig gis shar phyogs kyi
66b7(mdo 'grel): 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba shes par bya'o snyam? du sems so/ /lha'i rna bas de dag gi sgra thos par bya'o/ /de dag nyid kyi sems sems kyis shes par ba'o/ /de dag nyid kyi sngon gyi gnas
67a1(mdo 'grel): rjes su dran nas rdzu 'phrul gyis song ste chos bstan par bya'o snyam du mi sems so/ /shA ri'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'di snyam du bdag gis lha'i mig gis lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi sems gang+gA'i klung gi
67a2(mdo 'grel): bye ma snyed rnams kyi sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba shes par bya'o/ /lha'i rna bas de rnams kyi sgra dag mnyan par bya'o/ /de dag nyid kyi sems sems kyis shes par bya'o//de dag nyid ki sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran ns rdzu 'phrul gyis song ste ?
67a3(mdo 'grel): bstan par bya'o snyam du mi sems so/ /shA ri'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'di snyam du bdg gis nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnams kyi sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba shes par bya'o
67a4(mdo 'grel): lha'i rna bas de rnams kyi sgra dag mnyan par bya'o/ /de dag nyid kyi sems sems kyis shes par bya'o/ /de dag nyid kyi sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran nas rdzu 'phrul gyis song ste chos bstan par bya'o snyam du mi sems so/ /shA ri'i bu de bzhin du byang chub
67a5(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'di snyam du bdag gis lha'i mig gis byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ba snyed kyi sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba shes par bya'o/ /lha'i rna bas de rnams kyi sgra dag mnyan par bya'o/ /de dag nyid
67a6(mdo 'grel): kyi sems sems kyis shes par bya'o/ /de dag nyid kyi sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran nas rdzu 'phrul gyis song ste chos bstan par bya'o snyam du mi sems so/ /shA ri'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'di snyam du bdag gis lha'i mig
67a7(mdo 'grel): gis byang shar gyi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnams kyi sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba shes par bya'o/ /lha'i rna bas de rnams kyi sgra dag mnyan par bya'o/ /de dag nyid kyi sems sems kyis shes par bya'o//
67b1(mdo 'grel): de dag nyid kyi sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran nas rdzu 'phrul gyis song ste chos bstan par bya'o snyam du mi sems so/ /shA ri'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'di snyam du bdag gis lha'i mig gis shar lho'i phyogs kyi 'jig
67b2(mdo 'grel): rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnams kyi sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho pa dang skye pa shes par bya'o/ /lha'i rna bas de rnams kyi sgra dag mnyan par bya'o/ /de dag nyid kyis sems sems kyis shes par bya'o/ /de dag nyid kyi sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran nas
67b3(mdo 'grel): rdzu 'phrul gyis song ste chos bstan par bya'o snyam du mi sems so/ /shA ri'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'di snyam du bdag gis lha'i mig gis lho nub kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnams kyi seMs can rnams kyi
67b4(mdo 'grel): 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba shes par bya'o/ /lha'i rna bas de rnams kyi sgra dag mnyan par bya'o/ /de dag nyid kyi sems sems kyi shes par bya'o/ /de dag nyid kyi sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran nas rdzu 'phrul gyis song ste chos bstan par bya'o snyam du mi sems so/
67b5(mdo 'grel): shA ri'i bu de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'di snyam du bdag gis lha'i mig gis nub byang gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnams kyi sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho pa dang skye ba shes par bya'o/
67b6(mdo 'grel): lha'i rna bas de rnams kyi sgra dag mnyan par bya'o/ /de dag nyid kyi sems sems kyis shes par bya'o/ /de dag nyid kyi sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran nas rdzu 'phrul gyis song ste chos bstan par bya'o snyam du mi sems so/ /shA ri'i bu de bzhin du
67b7(mdo 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'di snyam du bdag gi lha'i mig gis 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnaMs kyi sems can? rnamS kyi 'chi ? skye ba shes par bya'o/ /lha'i rna bas de rnams kyi sgra dag
68a1(mdo 'grel): mnyan par bya'o/ /de dag nyid kyi sems sems kyi shes par bya'o/ /de dag nyid kyi sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran nas rdzu 'phrul gyis song ste chos bstan par bya'o snyam du mi sems so/ /shA ri'i bu de bzhin du byang chub
68a2(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'di snyam du bdag gis lha'i mig gis steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnams kyi sems can rnams kyi 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba shes par bya'o/ /lha'i rna bas de rnams kyi sgra
68a3(mdo 'grel): dag mnyan par bya'o/ /de dag nyid kyi sems sems kyis shes par bya'o/ /de dag nyid kyi sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran nas rdza 'phrul gyis song ste chos bstan par bya'o snyam du mi sems so/ /shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
68a4(mdo 'grel): po de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spod pa ni sems can gzhal du med grangS de tshad med pa rnams yongs su mya ngan las zlo bar byed par brtson pa yin no zhes brjod par bya'o/ /shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar
68a5(mdo 'grel): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na bdud sdig can gyis glags rnyed par mi 'gyur ro/ /'di'i 'jig rten pa'i nyon mongs pa gang ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad kyang rab tu gsal bar 'gyur ro/ /shA ri'i bu shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi
68a6(mdo 'grel): khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhags shing 'tsho skyong ba rnams dang/ de dag gis nyan thos gang dag yin pa rnams dang/ rang sangs rgyas gang dag yin pa rnams dang/ rgyal chen ris
68a7(mdo 'grel): bzhi pa dang/ /sum cu rtsa gsum pa dang/ 'thab bral dang/ dga' ldan dang/ 'phrul dga' dang/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang/ tshangs ris dang/ tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don dang/ tshangs 'khor dang/ tshangs chen dang/ 'od chung dang/
68b1(mdo 'grel): tshad med 'od dang/ 'od gsal dang/ dge chung dang/ tshad med dge dang/ dge rgyas dang/ sprin med dang/ bsod nams skyes dang/ 'bras bu che dang/ 'du shes med pa'i sems can dang/ mi spong ba dang/ ma gdung ba dang/ legs mthong dang/ rab
68b2(mdo 'grel): lta dang/ 'og min gyi lha gang dag yin pa de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la la la zhig bar chad byed par 'gyur ro 'ong ngo zhes yongs su srung bar byed do/ /de la lus kyi skyon gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad kyang mthong pa'i chos dang
68b3(mdo 'grel): ldan pa nyid du 'gyur te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des sems can thams cad la byams pas khyab par byed pa'i phyir ro/ /shA ri'i bu lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na
68b4(mdo 'grel): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang/ de dag gi nyan thos gang dag yin pa rnams dang/ rang sangs rgyas gang dag yin pa rnams dang/ rgyal chen ris bzhi pa dang/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa dang/ 'thab bral dang/ dga' 
68b5(mdo 'grel): ldan dang/ 'phrul dga' dang/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang/ tshangs ris dang/ tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don dang/ tshangs 'khor dang/ tshangs chen dang/ 'ong chung dang/ tshad med 'od dang/ 'od gsal dang/ dge chung dang/ tshad med dge dang/
68b6(mdo 'grel): dge rgyas dang/ sprin med dang/ bsod nams skyes dang/ 'bras bu che ba dang/ 'du shes med pa'i sems can dang/ mi spong ba dang mi gdung ba dang/ legs mthong dang/ rab lta dang/ 'og min gyi lha gang yin pa de dag kyang byang chub
68b7(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la la la zhig bar char byed par 'gyur du ong ngo zhes yongs su bsrung bar byed do/ /de la lus skyi skyon gang dag yod pa dag thams cad kyang mthong ba'i chos dang ldan pa kho nar 'gyur te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 
69a1(mdo 'grel): 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des sems can thams cad la byams pas khyab par byed ba'i phyir ro/ /shA ri'i bu nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sngs rgyas bcom
69a2(mdo 'grel): ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba rnams dang de dag gi nyan thos gang dag yin pa rnams dang/ rang sangs rgyas gang dag yin pa rnams dang/ rgyal chen ris bzhi par dang/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa dang/ 'thab bral dang/ dga'

69a4(mdo 'grel): dang/ sprin med dang/ bsod nams skyes dang/ 'bras bu che dang/ 'du shes med pa'i sems can dang/ mi spong ba dang/ mi gdung ba dang/ legs mthong dang/ rab lta dang/ 'og min gyi lha gang dag yin pa de dag kyang byang chub sems
69a5(mdo 'grel): dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la la la zhig par chad byed par 'gyur du 'ong ngo zhes yongs su bsrung bar byed do/ /de la lus kyi skyon gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad kyang mthong pa'i chos dang ldan pa nyid du 'gyur te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di
69a6(mdo 'grel): ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des sems can thams cad la byams pas khyab par byed pa'i phyir ro/ /shA ri'i bu byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bya ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji
69a7(mdo 'grel): snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho sbyong ba rnams dang/ de dag gi nyan thos gang yin pa rnams dang/ rang sangs rgyas gang ngag yin pa rnams dang/ rgyal chen rig bzhi pa dang/ sum cu rtsa gsum pa dang/ 'thab bral dang/ /
69b1(mdo 'grel): /dga' ldan dang /'phrul dga' dang/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang/ tshangs ris dang/ tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don dang/ tshangs 'khor dang/ tshangs chen dang/ 'od chung dang/ tshad med 'od dang/ 'od gsal dang/ dge chung dang/ tshad med dge dang/

69b4(mdo 'grel): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des sems can thams cad la byams pas khyab par byed pa'i phyir ro/ /shA ri'i bu byang shar gyi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi kams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sangs
69b5(mdo 'grel): rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong pa rnams dang/ de dag gi nyan thos gang dag yin pa rnams dang/ rang sangs rgyas gang dag yin pa rnams dang/ rgyal chen ris bzhi pa nas 'og min gyi zin rtag yin pa de dag kyang byang

70a1(mdo 'grel): snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba rnams dang/ de dag gi nyan thos gang dag yin pa rnams dang/ rang sangs rgyas gang dag yin pa rnams dang/ rgyal chen ris bzhi pa nas 'og min gyi bar gyi lha gang dag yin pa de dag
70a2(mdo 'grel): kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la la la zhig bar chad byed par 'gyur du 'ong ngo zhes yongs su bsrung bar byed do/ /de la lus kyi skyon du bya ba gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad kyang mthong ba'i chos dang ldan pa nyid du 'gyur te/
70a3(mdo 'grel): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nges sems can thams cad la byams pas khyab par byed pa'i phyir ro/ /shA ri'i bu lho ub kyi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sangs
70a4(mdo 'grel): rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba rnams dang/ de dag gi nyan thos gang dag yin pa rnams dang/ rangs sangs rgyas gang dag yin pa rnams dang/ rgyal chen ris bzhi pa nas 'og min gyi bar gyi lha gang yin pa de dag
70a5(mdo 'grel): kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la la la zhig bar chad byed par 'gyur du 'ong ngo zhes yongs su bsrung bar byed do/ /de la lus ki skyon gang dag yon pa de dg thamS cad kyang mthong ba'i chos dang ldan pa nyid du 'gyur te/ de ci'i phyir zhe
70a6(mdo 'grel): na/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des sems can thams cad la byams pas khyab par byed pa'i phyir ro/ /shA ri'i bu nub byang gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sangs rgys bcom ldan 'das
70a7(mdo 'grel): gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba rnams dang/ de dag gi nyan thos gang dag yin pa rnams dang/ rang sangs rgyas gang dag yin pa rnams dang/ rgyal chen ris bzhi pa nas 'og min gyi bar gyi lha gang yin pa de dag kyang byang chub
70b1(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la la la zhig bar chad byed par 'gyur du 'ong ngo zhes yongs su bsrung bar byed do/ /de la lus kyi skon gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad kyang mthong ba'i chos dang ldan pa nyid du 'gyur te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di
70b2(mdo 'grel): ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nges sems can thams cad la byams bas khyab par byed pa'i phyir ro/ /shA ri'i bu 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig
70b3(mdo 'grel): bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba rnams dang/ de dag gi nyan thos gang dag yin pa rnams dang/ rang sangs rgyas gang dag yin pa rnams dang/ rgyal chen ris bzhi pa nas 'og min gyi bar gyi lha gang dag yin pa de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems
70b4(mdo 'grel): dpa' chen po de la la la zhig bar chang byed par 'gyur du 'ong ngo zhes yongs su bsrung bar byed do/ /de la lus kyi skyon gang gang yod pa de dag thams cad kyang mthong ba'i chos dang ldan pa nyid du 'gyur te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar byang chub sems
70b5(mdo 'grel): dpa' sems dpa' chen po des sems can thams cad la byams pas khyab par byed pa'i phyir ro/ /shA ri'i bu steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang ji snyed cig bzhugs shing 'tsho
70b6(mdo 'grel): skong ba rnams dang/ de dag gi nyan thos gang dag yin pa rnams dang/ rang sangs rgyas gang dag yin pa rnams dang/ rgyal chen rigs bzhi pa nas 'og min gyi bar gyi lha gang dag yin pa de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de la l
70b7(mdo 'grel): la zhig bar chad byed par 'gyur du 'ong ngo zhes yongs su bsrung bar byed do/ /de la lus kyi skyon gang dag yod pa de dag thams cad kyang mthong ba'i chos dang ldan pa nyid du 'gyur te/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
71a1(mdo 'grel): chen po des sems can thams cad la byams pas khyab par byed pa'i phyir ro/ /shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab ki pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa la ni tshogs chung dus gzungs kyi
71a2(mdo 'grel): sgo dang ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnams mngon du 'gyur ro/ /skye ba'i skye mched thams cad du yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par byed par 'gyur te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
71a3(mdo 'grel): byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag dang nam yang bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ /shA ri'i bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni
71a4(mdo 'grel): btson zhes brjod par bya'o/ /shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa la ni 'di snyam du gang zhig chos rnams dang lhan cig ldan pa 'am/ bral ba 'am/ /dud pa las/
71a5(mdo 'grel): dbye ba'i chos 'ga' zhig yod do zhes sems par byed pa med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des gang zhig ldan pa'am/ bral ba 'am/ 'du ba 'am/ dbye ba'i chos nyid yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo/ /shA ri'i bu byang
71a6(mdo 'grel): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson zhes brjod par bya'o/ /shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
71a7(mdo 'grel): la ni 'di snyam du shin tu myur bar chos kyi dbyings mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par 'gyur ram/ 'on ta ma mi 'gyur zhes bya bar sems pa med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ chos kyi dbyings kyis chos kyi dbyings mngon par sangs
71b1(mdo 'grel): rgyas pa med do/ /mngon par 'tshang rgya ba med do/ /mngon par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur pa med do/ /shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni brtson zhes brjod par bya'o/ /shA ri'i bu dag ?
71b2(mdo 'grel): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'ga' yang chos kyi dbyings las tha dad par yang dag par rjes su mi mthong zhing chos gyi dbyings la chos sna tshogs ? byed par mi byed la/ de 'di snyam du
71b3(mdo 'grel): chos kyi dbyings 'di yang 'di ltar rtogs sam mi rtogs snyam du sems pa yang med/ 'di ltar chos gang gis chos de dag rtogs par 'gyur ba'i chos 'ga' yang des yang dag par rjes su mthong ba med do/ /'di ltar nges na chos kyi dbyings la stong pa la
71b4(mdo 'grel): zhes sbyor bar mi byed mi stong ngo zhes sbyor bar mi byed do/ /shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar spyod pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson zhes brjod par bya'o/ /shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
71b5(mdo 'grel): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mig gi khams la stong pa nyid kyis sbyor bar mi byed/ stong pa nyid la mig gi khams kyis sbyor bar mi byed do/ /gzugs kyi khams la stong pa nyid kyis sbyor bar mi byed/ stong pa nyid
71b6(mdo 'grel): la gzugs kyi khams kyis sbyor par mi byed do/ /mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams la stong pa nyid kyis sbyor bar mi byed/ stong pa nyid la ? gi rnam par shes pa'i khams la stong pa nyid kyis sbyor bar mi byed do/ /rna ba'i khams stong pa nyid kyis sbyor
71b7(mdo 'grel): ? mi byed/ /stong pa nyid la rna ba'i khams kyis sbyor par mi byed do/ /sgra'i khams la stong pa nyid kyis sbyor bar mi byed/ stong pa nyid la sgra'i khams kyis sbyor bar mi byed/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams la stong pa nyid kyis sbyor bar mi byed
72a1(mdo 'grel): stong pa nyid la rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyis sbyor bar mi byed do/ /sna'i khams la stong pa nyid kyis sbyor bar mi byed/ stong pa nyid la sna'i khams kyis sbyor bar mi byed do/ /dri'i khams la stong pa nyid kyis sbyar bar
72a2(mdo 'grel): mi byed/ stong pa nyid la dri'i khams kyis sbyor bar mi byed do/ /sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams la stong pa nyid kyis sbyor bar mi byed/ stong pa nyid la sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyis sbyor bar mi byed do/ /lce'i khams la stong pa nyid
72a3(mdo 'grel): kyis sbyor bar mi byed/ /stong pa nyid la lce'i khams kyis sbyor par mi byed do/ /ro'i khams la stong pa nyid kyis sbyor bar mi byed/ stong pa nyid la ro'i khams kyis sbyor bar mi byed do/ /lco'i rnam par shes pa'i khams la stong pa nyid kyis
72a4(mdo 'grel): sbyor bar mi byed/ stong pa nyid la lce'i rnam par shes pa'i khams kyis sbyor par mi byed do/ /lus kyi khams la stong pa nyid kyis sbyor bar mi byed/ stong pa nyid la lus kyi khams kyis sbyor par mi byed do/ /reg bya'i khams la stong pa nyid
72a5(mdo 'grel): kyis sbyor bar mi byed/ spyod pa nyid la rig bya'i khams kyis sbyor bar mi byed do/ /lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams la stong pa nyid kyis sbyor bar mi byed/ stong pa nyid la lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyis sbyor bar mi byed do/ /yid
72a6(mdo 'grel): kyi khams la stong pa nyid kyis sbyor bar mi byed/ stong pa nyid la yid kyi khams kyis sbyor bar mi byed do/ /chos kyi khams la stong pa nyid kyis sbyor bar mi byed/ stong pa nyid la chos kyi khams kyis sbyor bar mi byed do/ /yid kyi rnam par
72a7(mdo 'grel): shes pa'i khams la stong pa nyid kyis sbyor bar mi byed/ stong pa nyid la yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyis sbyor bar mi byed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rnal
72b1(mdo 'grel): 'byor daM? pa yin te/ 'di lta ? stong pa nyid kyi rnal 'byor ro/ /shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po stong pa nyid la spyod pa ni nyan thos kyi sangs rgyas kyi sar mi ltung ngo/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed do/ /sems
72b2(mdo 'grel): can yongs su smin par byed do/ /myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya par yang 'gyur ro/ /shA ri'i du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i rnal 'byor du bya ba gang ji snyed pa de dag gi nang na shes
72b3(mdo 'grel): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor ni rab ces bya'o/ /dam pa zhes bya'o/ /gtso bo zhes bya'o/ /mchog dang/ rab mchog dang/ bla ma dang/ bla na med pa dang/ mi mnyam pa dang mnyam par dang/ gya nom ba zhes bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/
72b4(mdo 'grel): shA ri'i bu rnal 'byor 'di ni bla na med pa yin te/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor ni stong pa nyid kyi rnal 'byor dang/ mtsham ma med pa'i rnal 'byor dang smon pa med pa'i rnal 'byor ro/ /shA ri'i bu de ltar brtson pa'i byang
72b5(mdo 'grel): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni lung du bstan pa dang nye bar gyur pa yin no/ /shA ri'i bu de ltar brtson pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can gzhal du med grangs med pa rnams kyi don byed par 'gyur yang 'di
72b6(mdo 'grel): snyam du bdag la ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams lung ston par 'gyur ro bdag ni lung bstan pa la nye bar gyur te/ /bdag gis ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su spyod par 'gyur ro/ /bdag gis ni sems can rnams yongs su smin par
72b7(mdo 'grel): bya'o/ /bdag gis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bya'o snyam du mi sems so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de chos kyi dbyings la rnam par bA la bar mi 
73a1(mdo 'grel): byed cing gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa 'am/ gang la sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi lung bstan par bya ba'i chos kyi dbyings las gzhan pa'i chos kyang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ngo/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/
73a2(mdo 'grel): 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe sems can gyi 'du shes mi skye'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar skye ba med pa dang/ 'gag pa med pa'i chos can yin pa'i phyir sems can shin tu
73a3(mdo 'grel): skye ba med cing 'gag pa med do/ /gang la skye ba med pa dang/ 'gag pa med pa de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par yang ji ltar 'gyur/ shA ri'i bu de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can skye ba med pas
73a4(mdo 'grel): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin/ sems can stong pa nyid kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin/ sems can mi dmigs pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin/ sems can dben pas shes rab kyi
73a5(mdo 'grel): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa yin te/ shA ri'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi rnal 'byor dam pa yin te/ 'di lta ste/ stong pa nyid kyi rnal 'byor te/ nges de ma yin pa'i rnal 'byor rnams zil gyis mnan te
73a6(mdo 'grel): gnas so/ /shA ri'i bu rnal 'byor 'di la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po na byams pa chen po mngon par sgrub po/ /snying rje chen po mngon par sgrb bo/ /ser sna'i sems mi bskyed do/ /tus khrims ngan pa'i sems mi bskyed do/ /
73a7(mdo 'grel): gnod pa'i sems mi bskyed/ le lo'i sems mi bskyed/ rnam par g.yer ba'i sems mi bskyed/ shes rab 'chal ba'i sems mi bskyed do zhes bya ba ni chos dkon mchog la gdams pa'o// //de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang/
73b1(mdo 'grel): tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i gnas pa 'dis gnas pa de gang nas shi 'phos te 'ding skyes pa la gis
73b2(mdo 'grel): 'di nas shi 'phos nas ni gang du skye bar 'gyur/ de skad ces gsol ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
73b3(mdo 'grel): gnas pa 'dis gnas pa 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan nas shi 'phos te 'dir skye ba 'am/ dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris dang/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nyid nas shi 'phos nas 'dir skyes par shes par bya'o/ /zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' brgyad
73b4(mdo 'grel): pa'o/ /shA ri'i bu de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang mi'i nang na shi 'phos nas mi dang skal pa mnyam pa nyid du skyes pa de ni phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ma gtogs par dbang po rtul?
73b5(mdo 'grel): po yin te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor la yang myur du mnyam par gzhog pa ma yin te/ de la gzungs kyi sko dang/ ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnams kyang myur du mngon du mi 'gyur ro/ /shA ri'i bu gang khyod kyis 'di skad ces byang chub sems dpa' 
73b6(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' chen po gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor 'di la snyoms par 'jug pa de 'di nas shi 'phos nas gang du skye bar 'gyur zhes smras pa ni/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor
73b7(mdo 'grel): 'di la snyoms par 'jug pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di nas shi 'phos nas? gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho sbyong? ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro zhing der sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mnyes
74a1(mdo 'grel): bar byed par 'gyur te/ nam bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du nam yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang bral bar mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems
74a2(mdo 'grel): dpa' dad pas rjes su 'brang ba'o// //shA ri'i bu de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan nas shi 'phos te 'dir skyes pa de'i dbang po rnams rno bar myur du rnal 'byor 'di 'grub par 'gyur te/
74a3(mdo 'grel): 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor ro/ /skye ba brjes kyang de la chos zab mo zab mo dag mngon du phyogs par 'gyur te/ des phyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor la snyoms par 'jug par 'gyur ro/ /
74a4(mdo 'grel): gang dang gang du skye ba de dang der de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par byed do/ /shA ri'i bu de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dga' ldan gyi lha'i? ris nas shi 'phos nas 'dir skyes
74a5(mdo 'grel): pa de yang dbang po shin tu rno bar 'gyur zhing pha rol tu phyin pa drug la nyams pa med pa dang/ gzungs kyi sgo dang/ ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo thams cad kyang mngon du phyog par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi rjes su
74a6(mdo 'grel): 'brang ba'o/ //shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing sbyor ba la brtson par byed pa na/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir thabs la mkhas pa'i stobs kyis rgyun du zhugs
74a7(mdo 'grel): pa'i bras bu mngon sum du byas kyang des nga rgyal du mi byed pa dag yod do zhes bya ba ni rgyun du zhugs pa'o// //bam po lnga pa/ /shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs mi mkhas pa gang dag bsam gtan
74b1(mdo 'grel): bzhi po rnams sgrub par byed cing/ pha rol tu phyin pa rnams la spyod par byed cing bsam gtan thob pa nges kyang lha tshe ring po rnams su skyes te/ de nas shi 'phos nas de gal te 'dod pa'i khams kyi lha dang mi rnams su skye zhing sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
74b2(mdo 'grel): mnyes bar 'gyur ba ni/ de dag gi dbang po rnams rtul por 'gyur zhing rnon por mi 'gyur ba dag kyang yod do/ /shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams bsam gtan pa yang mnyam par gzhog la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
74b3(mdo 'grel): la yang spyod de/ de dag thabs la mi mkhas pa bsam gtan rnams spangs nas phyir 'dod pa'i khams su skye ba yod de/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kyang dbang po rtul pa yin te/ dbang po rnos? ma yin no zhes bya ba ni 'bras
74b4(mdo 'grel): bu gnyis pa dang gsum pa la zhugs pa dad pas rjes su 'brang ba yin no// //shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan bzhi po rnams bskyed de/ tshad med pa bzhi la snyoms par 'jug pa dang/ gzugs
74b5(mdo 'grel): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang/ dbang po dang/ stobs dang/ byang chub kyi yan lag dang/ lam rnams la yang snyoms par 'jug cing/
74b6(mdo 'grel): bsam gtan gyi dbang dang/ tshad med pa'i dbang dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i dbang gis mi skye bar snying rje chen po can thabs mkhas bya gang du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par
74b7(mdo 'grel): byed par skye ba yang yod de/ de dag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor dang ma bral bas bskal pa bzang po 'di nyid la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgya'o zhes bya ba ni 'bras bu gnyis pa dang/
75a1(mdo 'grel): gsum pa la zhugs pa mthong bas thob pa'o// //shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshe gcig gis thogs pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa gang dag thabs mkhas pas bsam
75a2(mdo 'grel): gtan bzhi la yang snyoms par 'jug/ tshad med pa bzhi dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang dran pa nye bar bzhag pa dang/ yang dag par spong ba dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang/ dpang? po dang/ stobs dang/ byang chub? kyi?
75a3(mdo 'grel): yan lag dang/ lam rnams sgom par byed/ stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug par byed/ mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'jug par byed/ smon ba med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyams par 'jug par byed cing/ de dag gi dbang du
75a4(mdo 'grel): mi 'gro bar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mngon du gyur pa rnams mnyes par byas nas des tshangs par spyod pa spyad de/ slar yang dga' ldan gyi lha dang skal ba mnyam par skye ste/ de dag der tshe ji srid du gnas nas dbang po mnyams pa dang dran zhing
75a5(mdo 'grel): shes bzhin du lta bya ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas bskor te/ mdun du byas nas 'dir skye ba bstan te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs pa rnams su bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dag kyang yod do zhes
75a6(mdo 'grel): bya ba ni man cig phyir 'ong ba yin no// //shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon bar shes pa drug po rnams thob pa gang dag 'dod pa'i khams su yang mi skye/ gzugs kyi khams dang/ gzugs med pa'i khams
75a7(mdo 'grel): su yang mi skye'i?/ 'on kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la bkur stir byed/ bla mar byed/ ri mor byed/ mchod par byed cing sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dod pa dag kyang yod do//
75b1(mdo 'grel): shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa drug thob ba gang dag mngon par shes pa drug po thob pa de dag gis rnam par rtse zhing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dag na nyan thos kyi theg pa dang/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa'i sgra yang mi grag pa de lta bu'i sangs
75b2(mdo 'grel): rgyas kyi ni? nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dod ba dag kyang yod do/ /shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa drug thob ba gang dag mngon par shes pa de dag gis rnam par brtse zhing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dag na cho dbus? tu med pa
75b3(mdo 'grel): de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'dod bdag kyang yod do/ /shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mngon par shes pa drug thob pa 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'jig rten gyi khams su rgyu ba gang yin pa de dag der song
75b4(mdo 'grel): nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams gang na sangs rgyas kyi sgra mi grag ba dang/ chos kyi sgra mi grag pa dang/ dge 'dun gyi sgra mi grag pa der 'dug nas sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang/ chos kyi sgra dang/ dge 'dun gyi sgra rnams sgrogs par byed cing dkon mchog gsum po
75b5(mdo 'grel): rnams kyi bsngags pa brjod de/ sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang/ chos kyi sgra dang/ dge 'dun gyi sgra de ma de dag sems dang par 'byung te/ de nas shi 'bos nas gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs pa de dang der skye par 'gyur bar byed pa dag
75b6(mdo 'grel): kyang yod do zhes bya ba ni phyir mi 'ong pa yin no/ /shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan bzhi dang/ tshad med ba bzhi dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi skyed nas/ yang de dag thabs mkhas pas bsam
75b7(mdo 'grel): gtan dang/ ting nge 'dzin dang/ snyoms par 'jug pa rnams las log nas 'dod pa'i khams su skye bar byed de/ sems can yongs su smin par bya pa'i phyir rgyal rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu 'am/ /bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu 'am/
76a1(mdo 'grel): khyim bdag gi rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu rnams su skye ba yang yod do/ /zhes bya ba ni mi'i rigs nas rigs su skye ba'o/ /shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan bzhi la yang snyoms par
76a2(mdo 'grel): 'jug pa tshad med pa bzhi dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug cing de dag kyang thabs mkhas pa'i stobs kyis bsam gtan dang/ tshad med pa dang/ ting nge 'dzin dang/ snyoms par 'jug pa'i dbang gis mi skye bar
76a3(mdo 'grel): rgyal po chen po bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye/ sum cu rtsa gsum dang/ 'thab bral dang/ dga' ldan dang/ 'phrul dga' dang/ gzhan 'phrul dbang? byed kyi lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye ste/ de dag der gnas shing sems
76a4(mdo 'grel): can rnams yongs su smin par byed/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyang mnyes par byed pa dag kyang yod do/ /shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan bzhi dang/ tshad
76a5(mdo 'grel): med pa bzhi dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi bskyed nas 'pho bar 'gyur pa de dag thabs mkhas pas tshangs pa'i 'jig rten nas 'og min gyi bar du skye'o/ /de dag de na yang tshangs pa'i tshangs pa chen por 'gyur te/ tshangs pa'i
76a6(mdo 'grel): gnas de drag tu gnas par 'gyur ro/ /de dag der gnas nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas gyi zhing du 'gro ste/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag gi de bzhin gshegs ba dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gang dag yin pa'i de bzhin
76a7(mdo 'grel): gshegs pa de dag la chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i don du gsol ba 'debs par 'byed pa dag yod do zhes bya ba ni lha'i rigs su skye ba'o// //shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan bzhi thob pa nas sangs rgyas
76b1(mdo 'grel): kyi chos ma 'dres ba bco brgyad kyi bar du thob pa dang/ de dag rjes su rtogs gar byed pa'i phyir spyod pa gang dag 'phag pa'i bden pa bzhi po rnams thob pa yin yang de dag mngon du mi byed pa dag yod de/ shA ri'i bu'i? byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
76b2(mdo 'grel): de dag ni tshe gcig gis thogS par shes par bya'o zhes bya ba ni bar chad gcig pa yin no// //shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang po sems bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ bsam gtan bzhi thob par gyur pa dang/ tshad med
76b3(mdo 'grel): pa bzhi thob par gyur ba dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi thob par gyur pa dang/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang/ yang dag par spong ba dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang/ dbang po dang/ stobs dang/ byang chub kyi yan lag dang/ lam sgom
76b4(mdo 'grel): par byed pa dang/ stobs dang/ mi 'jigs ba dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa thob pa dag thabs la mkhas pas tshangs ris kyi lha rnams nas 'og min gyi lha rnams kyi bar du skye bar 'gyur zhing der bla na med pa yang
76b5(mdo 'grel): dag bar rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nas sems can gyi don byed pa dag yod do zhes bya ba ni bar mdor yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba' o// //shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag dang po sems bsky+d pa nyid kyis bla na med
76b6(mdo 'grel): pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya zhing chos kyi 'khor lo bskor te/ sems can gzhal du med grangs med pa rnams kyi don byas nas phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da' 
76b7(mdo 'grel): zhing/ /de dag yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang dam pa'i chos bskal pa 'am/ bskal pa las lhag par gnas pa dag kyang yod do zhes bya ba ni skys nas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba' o// // 
77a1(mdo 'grel): shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa gang dag 'jig rten gyi khams nas 'jig rten gyi khams su 'dor zhing de dag du yang sems can rnams byang chub tu yang dag par 'jog par byed do//
77a2(mdo 'grel): de dag sems can rnams kyi don la rtag par brtson de nam yang don med pa'i tshig mi smra'o/ /sems can gyi don du rtag tu brtson pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni sems
77a3(mdo 'grel): can rnams kyi don du bskal pa grangs med gzhal du med pa rnams kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs su bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dag kyang yod do zhes bya ba ni mngon par 'du byed pa dang bcas pas
77a4(mdo 'grel): yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba' o// //shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag dang po sems bskyed pa nyid kyis byang chub sems dpa' i skyon med pa las yang dag par 'das shing phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la yang nges
77a5(mdo 'grel): par gnas na sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyang bskrun par byed pa dag yod do/ /shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag sems dang po bskyed pa nyid kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rnal 'byor la snyoms par 'jug cing de dag
77a6(mdo 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang lhan cig sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams blta ba dang/ sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang/ rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'i don du 'dod zhing
77a7(mdo 'grel): sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs su bla na med pa yang dag bar rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba dag yod do zhes bya ba ni mngon par 'du byed pa med par yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba' o// //shA ri'i bu
77b1(mdo 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa gang dag 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por gyur nas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa lhung byas te/ sems can thams cad la bde ba'i yo byang thams cad nye bar sgrub cing/ zas 'dod pa rnams la zas
77b2(mdo 'grel): dang/ skom 'dod pa rnams la skom dang/ de bzhin du dri dang/ phreng ba dang/ byug pa dang/ bdug spos dang/ mal stan dang/ rten ma dang/ khyim dang/ nor dang/ 'bru dang/ mu tig dang/ gser dang/ dngul dang/ byu ru rnams dang/ 'tsho ba'i yo byad
77b3(mdo 'grel): rnams nye bar sgrub par byed pa nas dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams la sems can rnams rab tu bkod de/ tshangs ris nas 'og min gyi bar gyi lha rnams su skyes nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs rnams su bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
77b4(mdo 'grel): mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dag yod do zhes bya ba ni 'og min gyi mthar thug par 'gro ba'o// //shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag bsam gtan bzhi bsgrubs te/ bsam gtan rnams las yongs su nyams nas
77b5(mdo 'grel): bsam gtan dang po bsgrubs te/ tshangs ris kyi lha rnams su skye zhing de dag yang bsam gtan rnams bsgrubs nas 'og min gyi bar du skyes nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs rnams su bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang
77b6(mdo 'grel): rgya ba dag yod do zhes bya ba ni 'phar ba'o/ /shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag tshangs pa'i 'jig rten nas shi 'phoS naS gnas gtsang mar skyes te/ gnas gtsang ma'i gnas gcig gam gnyis las rgal te 'og min du skyes nas/
77b7(mdo 'grel): sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs su bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba yod do zhes bya ba ni phyed du 'phar ba'o/ //shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag bdag nyid kyi lus
78a1(mdo 'grel): de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku lta bur sprul nas dga' ldan gyi gnas sbyangs shing tshangs? ris kyi lha'i gnas nas 'og min gyi lha'i bar du skyes te/ thabs la mkhas pas sems can dmyal ba rnams la chos ston cing/ dud 'gro'i skyes gnas
78a2(mdo 'grel): dang/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa rnams la yang chos ston pa dag yod do/ /shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas shing bdag nyid kyis lus sangs rgyas kyi sku ci 'dra bde 'dra ba'i lus su mngon par?
78a3(mdo 'grel): sprul nas/ shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu dong zhing sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la bsnyen bkur byed pa dang/ chos nyan cing byang chub sems dpa' i dge 'dun dang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi
78a4(mdo 'grel): yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang mthong bar byed cing/ de dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag gi mtshan ma yongs su bzung ste/ de bas kyang rgya che ba khyad par du 'phags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mang po yongs su bsgrub cing/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu byang chub sems dpa' 
78a5(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' chen po tshe gcig gis thog pa sha stag skye bar byed pa dang/ de bzhin du lho dang/ nub dang/ byang dang/ byang shar dang/ shar lho dang/ lho nub dang/ nub byang dang/ 'og dang steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang+gA'i klung
78a6(mdo 'grel): gi bye ma snyed dag tu dong zhing sems can rnams la chos ston pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la bsnyen bkur bar byed pa dang/ chos nyan cing byang chub sems dpa' i dge 'dun dang/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang mthong
78a7(mdo 'grel): bar? byed cing de dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag gi mtshan ma yongs su bzung ste/ de bas kyang rgya che ba dang khyad bar du 'phags pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mang po yongs su bsgrub cing/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
78b1(mdo 'grel): tshe gcig gis thogs pa sha stag skye ba byed cing/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs su bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba yang yod do zhes bya ba ni gnas thams cad du 'chi 'pho ba'o// //shA ri'i bu byang chub
78b2(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag bsam gtan dang/ bzugs?  med pa sgrub par byed pa dag tshangs ris nas dge rgyas kyi bar gyi lha rnams su skye zhing/ de nas nam mkha' mdza' yas skye mched nas srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar du skye bar byed de/ de nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing
78b3(mdo 'grel): sna tshogs su skye bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni srid pa'i rtse mo'i mthar thugs par 'gro ba'o/ /shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gsam gtan dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms bar 'jug pa thob par 'gyur ba gang yin pa de dang/ nam
78b4(mdo 'grel): mkha' mdza' yas skye mched nas srid pa'i rtse mo'i bar du skye bar 'gyur zhing/ de nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs su skye bar 'gyur ba dag yod do zhes bya ba ni gzugs kyi 'dod chags dang bral ba'o// //shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
78b5(mdo 'grel): gang dag pha rol tu phyin pa drug pa spyod pa'i tshe/ lus la skyes bu chen po'i mtshan gsum cu rtsa gnyis kyiS brgyan cing dbang po yongs su dag pa bla na med pa rnams dang ldan te/ nam yang ngan song ngan 'gro log par ltung ba rnams su skye bar mi 'gyur ba nyid dang/ bdag nyid la
78b6(mdo 'grel): bstod par mi byed/ gzhan la smod par mi byed de/ de dag dbang po yongs su dag pa de rnams dang ldan bas skye bo mang po byams shing yid du 'ong bar 'gyur ro/ /sems can gang dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag mthong bde dag kyang seMs rab
78b7(mdo 'grel): tu dang bde nyid kyi theg pa gsum gyis rim gyis yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar byed pa dag kyang yod do/ /shA ri'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos lus yongs su dag pa la bslab par bya'o/ /ngag yongs su dag pa dang/ yid yongs su
79a1(mdo 'grel): dag pa la bslab bar bya'o/ /shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa gang dag dbang po shin tu gsal ba thob nas/ de dag dbang po shin tu gsal ba de dag gis bdag la mi
79a2(mdo 'grel): bstod cing gzhan la mi smod pa dag kyang yod do/ /shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag dang po sems bskyed pa nas nye par bzung ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing phyir
79a3(mdo 'grel): mi ldog pa'i sa ma thob kyi bar du nam yang ngan song ngan 'gro log par ltung ba rnams su mi skye bdag yod do/ /shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag dang po sems bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung nas/ phyir mi ldog pa'i sa
79a4(mdo 'grel): ma thob kyi bar du nam yang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam mi gtong pa dag yod do/ /shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ tshul khrims gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing 'khor los sgyur
79a5(mdo 'grel): ba'i rgyal por gyur nas/ sems can rnams la sbyin ba byin te/ de dag nyid dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams la rab tu dgong pa dag yod do/ /shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ tshul
79a6(mdo 'grel): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid brgya phrag du ma yongs su bzung/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal srid brgya stong phrag du ma yongs su bzung ste/ de la gnas nas sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma mnyes
79a7(mdo 'grel): par byed de/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad la bkur stir byed/ bla mar byed/ rim gror byed/ mchod par byed cing/ de'i 'og tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba dag yod
79b1(mdo 'grel): do zhes bya ba ni mthong ba'i chos la mya ngan las 'da' ba' o// //shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa gang dag bsam gtan bzhi thob pa dang/ tshad med pa bzhi dang/ gzugs
79b2(mdo 'grel): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi thob ba de dag bsam gtan dang/ tshad med pa dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis rnam par rtse zhing bsam gtan dang po la snyoms par 'jug go/ de las langs nas 'gog pa'i snyoms
79b3(mdo 'grel): par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug go/ de las langs nas bsam gtan gnyis pa la snyoms par 'jug go/ de las langs nas 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug go/ de las langs nas bsam gtan gsum pa la
79b4(mdo 'grel): snyoms par 'jug go/ de las langs nas 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug go /de las langs nas bsam gtan bzhi pa la snyoms par 'jug go/ de las langs nas 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms
79b5(mdo 'grel): par 'jug go/ de las langs nas nam mkha' mdza' yas skye mched la snyoms par 'jug go /de las langs nas 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug go/ de las langs nas rnam shes mdza' yas skye mched la snyoms par
79b6(mdo 'grel): 'jug go/ de las langs nas 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug go /de las langs nas cung zad med pa'i skye mched la snyoms par 'jug go/ de las langs nas 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug go
79b7(mdo 'grel): de las langs nas 'du shes med 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mtshad la snyoms par 'jug go/ de las langs ns 'gog pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug pa dag yod do/ /shA ri'i bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
80a1(mdo 'grel): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pa rnams bsam gtan dang/ tshad med pa dang/ ting nge 'dzin dang/ snyoms par 'jug pa 'di dag yang dang yang du rnam par mnan cing snyoms par 'jug
80a2(mdo 'grel): pas thos rgal la yang snyoms par zhugs nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing sna tshogs su bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o zhes bya ba ni lus kyi mngon sum du byed pa'o// //shA ri'i bu byang
80a3(mdo 'grel): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas nas sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi snang pa byed cing bdag nyid kyang nam bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs ma
80a4(mdo 'grel): rgyas kyi bar du sangs rgyas kyi chos snang ba de dang bral bar mi byed pa dag kyang yod do zhes bya ba ni dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu la zhugs pa'o// //shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag sangs rgyas mi bzhugS
80a5(mdo 'grel): shing nyan thos rnams kyang med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams su rang byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya ba dag yod do/ /de dag thabs la mkhas pas srog chags brgya stong bye ba phrag mang po theg pa gsum gyis yongs su smin par byas
80a6(mdo 'grel): nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya pa yin no zhes bya ba ni rang sangs rgyas so/ /shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang/ yang dag par spong ba dang/ rdzu
80a7(mdo 'grel): 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang/ dbang po dang/ stobs dang/ byang chub kyi yan lag thob pa dang/ stobs bcu dang/ mi 'jigs pa dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa btso brgyad rnams thob pa dag rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras
80b1(mdo 'grel): bu thob par mi byed/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang/ dgra bcom pa nyid dang/ rang byang chub thob par mi byed kyi/ de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing thabs mkhas pas sems can thams cad lam la btsud
80b2(mdo 'grel): cing rnam par sbyangs nas/ sems can de dag des rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ba dang/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang/ dgra bcom pa nyid dang/ rang byang chub thob par 'gyur bar byed pa dag yod de/ bdag
80b3(mdo 'grel): nyid kyis mngon sum du ma byas par gzhan de la rab tu dgong par byed do zhes bya ba ni nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas kyi lam gyis thob par bya ba'i 'bras bu rnams yin no// /shA ri'i bu nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi 'bras bu thob par bya
80b4(mdo 'grel): ba'i ye shes dang/ spong ba gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa'i bzod pa yin te zhes bya ba ni rang gis ma thob pa'i chos la gzhan 'god pa yin no// //shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' 
80b5(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' chen po gang dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa de lta bus de ltar rnam par spyod pa de dag ni phyir mi ldog pa yin par shes par bya'o/ /shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag pha rol tu phyin pa drug la
80b6(mdo 'grel): gnas shing dga' ldan gyi gnas yongs su sbyong ba dag kyang yod do/ /shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni bskal pa bzang po par shes par bya'o/ /shA ri'i bu 'di ni sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi mngon par rtog pa 'di
80b7(mdo 'grel): gang la yod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyir mi ldog pa yin par shes par bya'o/ /shA ri'i bu de lta pas na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos she rab kyi pha rol tu tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ kha na tho ba dang 
81a1(mdo 'grel): bcas pa'i lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las rnams kyi go mi dbya'i zhes bya ba/ 'di dag gis ni phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' i dge 'dun gsal bar bstan to/ /dge 'dun dkon mchog la gdams pa'o// //de skad ces
81a2(mdo 'grel): bka' stsal pa dang/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lus kyi las/ ban? ma tho ba dang bcas pa dang/ dag gi las kha na ma thob dang bcas pa dang/
81a3(mdo 'grel): yid kyi las kha na ma tho ba dang bcas pa gang lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di snyam du gang gis
81a4(mdo 'grel): lus kyi las yang dag par rtsom pa'i lus de ni gang yin/ /gang gis dag gi las yang dag dang rtsom pa'i ngag de ni gang yin gang gis yid kyi las yang dag par rtsom pa'i yid de ni gang yin snyam pa 'di ni/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' semS
81a5(mdo 'grel): dpa' chen po'i lus dang ngag dang yid kyi las brtson pa kha na mthob dang bcas pa'o/ /shwa ri'i pu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas ni lus gang dang/ ngag gang dang/ yid gang gis
81a6(mdo 'grel): ser sna dang/ tshul khrims 'chal pa dang/ gnod sems dang/ le lo dang/ rnam par g.yeng pa dang shes rab 'chal pa'i sems bskyed par byed pa'i lus mi dmigs so/ /dag mi dmigs so/ /yid mi dmigs so/ /shA ri'i bu byang chub sems
81a7(mdo 'grel): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i che/ lus dang ngag dang yid kyi gnas ngan len bskyed pa yang yin pa 'di ni gnas med cing go skabs med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems
81b1(mdo 'grel): dpa' chen pa pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa'i tshe/ lus kyi gnas ngan len spyong bar byed/ ngag gi gnas ngan len spyod par byed/ yid kyi gnas ngan len spyod par byed do/ /shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems
81b2(mdo 'grel): dpa' sems dpa' chen po lus kyi gnas ngan len sbyong ba dang/ ngag gi gnas ngan len sbyong ba dang/ yid kyi gnas ngan len spyod pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
81b3(mdo 'grel): chen po lus mi dmigs pa dang/ dag mi dmigs pa dang/ sems mi dmigs pa de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lus dang ngag dang yid kyi gnas ngan len yongs su sbyong ba yin no/ /shA ri'i bu gzhan yang gal te byang chub sems
81b4(mdo 'grel): dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar bzung ste/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams yang dag par blangs te gnas shing/ nyan thos kyi sems sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sems bskyed pa med par de rtag tu rgyun mi 'cha'
81b5(mdo 'grel): par sems can thams cad la snying rje chen po'i sems nye bar 'jog pa de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lus dang ngag dang yid kyi gnas ngan len yongs su dag pa zhes pas bshad do/ /shA ri'i bu byang chub sems
81b6(mdo 'grel): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa gang dag byang chub kyi lam yongs su sbyong zhing sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par byed/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par byed/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par
81b7(mdo 'grel): byed brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par byed/ bsam gtan pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byed/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par byed pa dag yod do/ /shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' 
82a1(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nam lus mi dmigs
82a2(mdo 'grel): pa dang/ dag mi dmigs pa dang/ yid mi dmigs pa dang/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pa dang/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi dmigs pa dang/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mi dmings pa dang/ brtson 'grus kyi pha
82a3(mdo 'grel): rol tu phin pa mi dmigs pa dang/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pa dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs pa dang/ nyan thos mi dmigs pa dang/ rang sangs rgyas mi dmigs pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' mi dmigs
82a4(mdo 'grel): pa dang/ sangs rgyas mi dmigs pa 'di ni/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub kyi lam yin te/ 'di lta ste/ chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'o/ /shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
82a5(mdo 'grel): lam 'dis 'gro zhing pha rol tu phyin pa drug pa rnams la spyod pa ni thub par mi nus pa yin no zhes bya ba ni ma zhen pa la gdams pa'o /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul ji lta bur spyod pa rnams
82a6(mdo 'grel): gzhan thams cad kyis thub pa me mchis pa las /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gzugs su mi rlom pa dang/ tshor bar
82a7(mdo 'grel): mi rlom pa dang/ 'du shes su mi rlom pa dang/ 'du byed rnams su mi rlom pa dang/ rnam par shes par mi rlom pa dang/ sa'i khams su mi rlom pa dang/ chu'i khams su mi rlom pa dang/ me'i khams su mi rlom pa dang/ rlung gi khams su mi rlom pa dang/
82b1(mdo 'grel): nam mkha' i khams su mi rlom pa dang/ rnam par shes pa'i khams su mi rlom pa dang/ mig gi khams su mi rlom pa dang/ gzugs kyi khams su mi rlom pa dang/ mig gi rnam par shes pa'i khams su mi rlom pa dang/ rna pa'i khams su mi rlom pa dang/ sgra'i
82b2(mdo 'grel): khams su mi rlom pa dang/ rna ba'i rnam par shes ba'i khams su mi rlom pa dang/ sna'i khams su mi rlom pa dang/ dri'i khams su mi rlom pa dang/ sna'i rnam par shes pa'i khams su mi rlom pa dang/ lce'i khams su mi rlom pa dang/ ro'i khams su mi rlom pa dang/ lce'i
82b3(mdo 'grel): rnam par shes pa'i khams su mi rlom pa dang/ lus kyi khams su mi rlom pa dang/ reg bya'i khams su mi rlom pa dang/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams su mi rlom pa dang/ yid kyi khams su mi rlom pa dang/ chos kyi khams su mi rlom pa dang/ yid kyi
82b4(mdo 'grel): rnam par shes pa'i khams su mi rlom pa dang/ dran pa nye bar gzhag par mi rlob pa dang/ yang dag par spong par mi rlob pa dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang par mi rlob pa dang/ dbang por mi rlom pa dang/ stobs su mi rlom pa dang/ byang chub kyi yan lag tu mi
82b5(mdo 'grel): rlom pa dang/ lam du mi rlom pa dang/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin par mi rlom pa dang/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin par mi rlom pa dang/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin par mi rlom pa dang/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin par mi rlom pa dang/ bsam
82b6(mdo 'grel): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin par mi rlom pa dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin par mi rlom pa dang/ mi 'jigs par mi rlom pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcur mi rlom pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad du mi rlom pa dang/
82b7(mdo 'grel): rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bur mi rlom pa dang/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bud? mi rlom pa dang/ phyir mi 'ong pa'i 'bras bur mi rlom pa dang/ dgra bcom pa nyid du mi rlom pa dang/ rang byang chub tu mi rlom pa dang/ lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid du
83a1(mdo 'grel): mi rlom pa dang/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu rlom pa med pa de ltar na shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug gis rnam par 'phel te/ sus kyang thub
83a2(mdo 'grel): pa med pa yin no// //shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag pha rol tu phyin pa drug la gnas te/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes yongs su rdzogs par byed pa dang/ ye shes de dang ldan pas ngan song thams
83a3(mdo 'grel): cad kyi sgo bcad par 'gyur ba dang/ mi dbul zhing 'phongs pa yang nyams su myong bar mi 'gyur ba dang/ lus gang dang ldan pas lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi nang na smad par 'gyur pa de lta bu'i lus yongs su 'dzin par mi 'gyur ba dag kyang yod de zhes
83a4(mdo 'grel): bya ba ni yongs su mi ngal ba la gdams pa'o// //de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes gang
83a5(mdo 'grel): lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ye shes gang dang ldan pas shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag
83a6(mdo 'grel): par rdzogs ba'i sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang mthong ngo/ /de dag gi chos bstan pa yang nyan to/ /byang chub sems dpa' i dge 'dun dang/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang mthong ngo/ /de bzhin du lho
83a7(mdo 'grel): dang/ nub dang/ byang dang/ byang shar dang/ shar lho dang/ lho nub dang/ nub byang dang/ 'og dang/ steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pI
83b1(mdo 'grel): sangs rgyas gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyang mthong ngo/ /de dag gi chos bstan pa yang nyan to/ /byang chub sems dpa' i dge 'dun la yang bsnyen bkur byed do/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan rnam par phye ba dag kyang mthong ngo/ /ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pa'i
83b2(mdo 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes mi skyed do/ /byang chub sems dpa' i 'du shes mi skyed do/ /nyan thos kyi 'du shes mi skyed do/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes mi skyed do/ /bdag gi 'du shes mi skyed do/ /gzhan gyi
83b3(mdo 'grel): 'du shes mi skyed do/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi 'du shes mi skyed do/ /ye shes de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par byed tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par byed/ bzod
83b4(mdo 'grel): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par byed/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par byed/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par byed/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par byed de/ pha rol tu phyin pa rnams su dmigs pa yang med do/ /ye
83b5(mdo 'grel): shes de lta bu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams sgom par byed de/ dran pa nye bar 'jog pa rnams su dmigs pa yang med do/ /yang dag par spong ba dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang/ dbang po dang/ stobs
83b6(mdo 'grel): dang/ byang chub kyi yan lag dang/ lam rnams sgom par byed de/ yang dag par spong ba dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang/ dbang po dang/ stobs dang/ byang chub kyi yan lag dang/ lam du dmigs pa yang med do/ /stobs dang/ mi 'jigs pa dang/
83b7(mdo 'grel): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams sgrub par byed la/ stobs dang/ mi 'jigs pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams su dmigs pa yang med do/ /shA ri'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i ye shes te/ ye shes de
84a1(mdo 'grel): dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sangs rgyas ki chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad du yang rlom pa med pa yin no zhes bya ba ni lam yongs su 'dzin pa la gdams pa'o// //
84a2(mdo 'grel): shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag mig lnga rab tu thob pa dang yongs su sbyong ba yod do/ /mig gang lnga rab tu thob pa dang yongs su spyod zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ sha'i mig dang/ lha'i mig dang/ shes rab kyi mig dang/ chos kyi
84a3(mdo 'grel): mig dang/ sangs rgyas kyi mig go/ shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sha'i mig yongs su dag pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
84a4(mdo 'grel): chen po sha'i mig gang gis dpag tshad brgya mthong ba yod do/ /shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sha'i mig gang gis dpag tshad nyis brgya dang/ sum brgya dang/ bzhi brgya dang/ lnga brgya dang/ stong gi bar du mthong ba yod de/ /shA ri'i bu
84a5(mdo 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sha'i mig gang gis 'dzam bu'i gling mthong pa yod do/ /shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i sha'i mig gang gis gling gnyis dang/ gling gsum dang/ gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams mthong ba
84a6(mdo 'grel): yod do/ /sha'i mig gang gis stong gi 'jig rten gyi khams mthong ba yod do/ /sha'i mig gang gis stong gnyis pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams mthong ba yod do/ /shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sha'i mig gis stong gsum gyi stong
84a7(mdo 'grel): chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams mthong ba yod do/ /shA ri'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sha'i mig yongs su dag pa'o/ /shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig yongs su
84b1(mdo 'grel): dag pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu rgyal po chen po bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so/ /sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang
84b2(mdo 'grel): chub sems dpas rab tu shes so/ /'thab bral gyi lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so/ /dga' ldan gyi lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so/ /'phrul dga' i lha rnams
84b3(mdo 'grel): kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so/ /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lta rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so/ /tshangs ris kyi lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems
84b4(mdo 'grel): dpas rab tu shes so/ /tshangs pa mdun na 'don gyi lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' rab tu shes so/ /tshangs 'khor gyi lha rnams gyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so/ /tshangs chen gyi
84b5(mdo 'grel): lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so/ /'od chung gi lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpa' rab tu shes so/ tshad med 'od kyi lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas
84b6(mdo 'grel): rab tu shes so/ /'od gsal gyi lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so/ /dge chung gi lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so/ /tshad med dge ba'i lha rnams kyi lha'i mig
84b7(mdo 'grel): gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so/ /dge rgyas kyi lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so/ /sprin med kyi lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so/ /bsod
85a1(mdo 'grel): rnams skyes kyi lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so/ /'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so/ /'du shes med pa'i sems can
85a2(mdo 'grel): gyi lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so/ /mi spyod ba'i lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yid pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu zhes so/ /mi gdung ba'i lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems
85a3(mdo 'grel): dpas rab tu shes so/ /legs mthong gi lha rnams kyi lta'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so/ /rab lha'i lha rnams kyi lha'i mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so/ /'og min gyi lha rnams kyi lha'i
85a4(mdo 'grel): mig gang yin pa de ni byang chub sems dpas rab tu shes so/ /shA ri'i bu shes byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i lha'i mig de ni rgyal chen bzhi'i lha rnams kyis mi shes so/ /sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyis mi shes so/ /'thab
85a5(mdo 'grel): bral gyi lha rnams kyis mi shes so/ /dga' ldan gyi lha rnams kyis mi shes so/ /'phrul dga' i lha rnams kyis mi shes so/ /gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams kyis mi shes so/ /tshangs ris pa'i lha rnams kyis mi shes so/ /tshangs
85a6(mdo 'grel): pa mdun na 'don kyi lha rnams kyis mi shes so/ /tshangs 'khor ba'i lha rnams kyis mi shes so/ /tshangs chen gyi lha rnams kyis mi shes so/ /'od chung gi lha rnams kyis mi shes so/ /tshad med 'od kyi lha rnams kyis mi shes so/ /'od gsal
85a7(mdo 'grel): gyi lha rnams kyis mi shes so/ /dge tshur gi lha rnams kyis mi shes so/ /tshad med dge'i lha rnams kyis mi shes so/ /dge rgyas kyi lha rnams kyis mi shes so/ /sprin med kyi lha rnams kyis mi shes so/ /bsod nams skyes kyi lha rnams
85b1(mdo 'grel): ? ni shes so/ /'bras bu che ba'i lha rnams kyis mi shes so/ /'du shes med pa'i sems can gyi lha rnams kyis mi shes so/ /mi spong ba'i lha rnams kyis mi shes so/ /mi gdung ba'i lha rnams kyis mi shes so/ /legs mthong gi lha rnams kyis mi? shes so/ /dang
85b2(mdo 'grel): lha'i lha rnams kyis mi shes so/ /'og min gyi lha rnams kyis mi shes so/ /lha'i mig yongs su dag pa de dag nyid kyis shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can thams cad kyi 'chi 'pho ba dang/ skye ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du
85b3(mdo 'grel): rab tu shes so/ /yongs su dag pa'i lha'i mig de nyid kyis lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can thams cad kyi 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /yongs su dag pa'i lha'i mig de nyid kyis nub phyogs
85b4(mdo 'grel): kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can thams cad kyi 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /yongs su dag pa'i lha'i mig de nyid kyis byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag gi sems can
85b5(mdo 'grel): thams cad kyi 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /de bzhin du byang shar gyi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can thams cad kyi 'chi 'pho pa dang skye ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /sher
85b6(mdo 'grel): lho'i phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gyi bye ma steng kyi sems can thams cad kyi 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /lho nub kyi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi phye ma snyed kyi sems can thams cad kyi
85b7(mdo 'grel): 'chi 'pho ba dang/ skye ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /nub byang gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi lams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can thams cad kyi 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba yang dag pa ji bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi
86a1(mdo 'grel): khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can thams cad kyi 'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi sems can thams cad kyi 'chi 'pho ba
86a2(mdo 'grel): dang skye ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /shA ri'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lha'i mig yongs su dag pa'o/ /shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi mig
86a3(mdo 'grel): yongs su dag pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi mig gang dang ldan pas 'dus byas sam/ 'dus ma byas sam/ dge ba'am/ kha na ma tho ba dang bcas
86a4(mdo 'grel): pa'am/ kha na ma tho ba med pa 'am/ zag pa dang bcas pa'am zag pa med pa'am/ nyon mongs pa dang bcas pa'am/ nyon mongs pa med pa'am/ 'jig rten pa'am/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'am/ kun nas nyon mongs pa'am/ rnam par byang ba yang rung ste/
86a5(mdo 'grel): chos gang yang rab tu mi shes pa med pa dang/ shes rab kyi mig gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos gang yang ma mthong ma thos/ ma bsams khong du ma chud pa med pa ni/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes
86a6(mdo 'grel): rab kyi mig yongs su dag pa'o/ /shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi mig yongs su dag pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
86a7(mdo 'grel): po'i chos kyi mig gi gang zag 'di ni dad pa'i rjes su 'brang ba'o/ /gang zag 'di ni chos kyi rjes su 'brang ba'o/ /gang zag 'di ni stong pa nyid la gnas pa ste/ gang zag 'di'i dbang po lnga ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid kyis skye bar 'gyur ro/ /dbang po lngas de ma
86b1(mdo 'grel): thag pa'i ting nge 'dzin la reg par 'gyur ro/ /de ma thag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba skye'o/ /rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong bas 'jig tshogs la lta ba dang/ the tshom dang/ tshul khrims dang/ brtul zhugs snyems pa'i kun tu
86b2(mdo 'grel): sbyor ba gsum rab tu spong bar 'gyur te gang zag pa 'di ni rgyun du zhugs pa zhes bya'o/ /des sgom pa'i lam rab tu thob nas/ 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang/ gnod sems rab tu bsrabs pa'i phyir na gang zag 'di ni lan cig phyir 'ong ba zhes bya'o/ /de sgom pa'i lam
86b3(mdo 'grel): cher bsgoms pa de nyid kyi 'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang/ gnod sems rab tu spangs pa'i phyir na gang zag 'di ni phyir mi 'ong ba zhes bya'o/ /de sgom pa'i lam cher bsgoms pa de nyid kyis gzugs kyi 'dod chags dang/ gzugs med pa'i 'dod chags dang/
86b4(mdo 'grel): ma rig pa dang/ nga rgyal dang/ rgod pa rab tu spangs pas gang zag 'di ni dgra bcom pa zhes bya'o/ /gang zag 'di ni mtshan ma med pa la gnas pa ste/ gang zag 'di ni dbang po lnga ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo mtshan ma med pas skye bar 'gyur ro/ /dbang po lngas de ma thag pa'i
86b5(mdo 'grel): ting nge 'dzin la reg par 'gyur ro/ /de ma thag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong bar skye bar 'gyur ba nas gang zag 'di ni smon pa med pa la gnas pa ste/ 'di'i dbang po lnga ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo smon pa med pas skye bar 'gyur ro/ /dbang po
86b6(mdo 'grel): ? de ma thag pa'i ting nge 'dzin thob par 'gyur ro/ /de ma thag pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba skye bar 'gyur ro/ /shA ri'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi mig yongs su dag pa'o/ /shA ri'i bu gzhan yang bya
86b7(mdo 'grel): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni 'di ltar rab tu shes te/ gang cung zad kun 'byung ba'i chos de thams cad ni 'gog pa'i chos can no zhes rab tu shes shing shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na dbang po lnga 'thob ste/ shA ri'i bu 'di ni byang chub
87a1(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi mig yongs su dag pa'o/ /shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di ltar rab tu shes te/ gang zhig sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ tshul khrims
87a2(mdo 'grel): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'di ni sems dang po bskyed pa yin te/ de ni de'i lam dad pa'i dbang po dang/ brtson 'grus kyi dbang po thob ste/ thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pa de ni bsams bzhin du bdag gi lus yongs su 'dzin to/ /byang
87a3(mdo 'grel): chub sems dpa' 'di ni dge ba'i rtsa ba brtan pa yin te/ rgyal rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu rnams su skye par 'gyur/ 'di ni bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu rnams su skye bar 'gyur /'di ni khyim bdag gi rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu rnams su skye bar
87a4(mdo 'grel): 'gyur/ 'di ni rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams su skye bar 'gyur/ 'di ni sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams su skye bar 'gyur/ 'di ni 'thab bral gyi lha rnams su skye bar 'gyur/ 'di ni dga' ldan gyi lha rnams su skye bar 'gyur/ 'di ni 'phrul dga' i lha rnams su skye bar 'gyur/
87a5(mdo 'grel): 'di ni gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha rnams su skye bar 'gyur/ 'di ni 'og min gyi bar du skye bar 'gyur te/ de der gnas nas sems can rnams yongs su smin par 'gyur te/ bde ba'i yo byed thams cad kyis de dag la rim gror byed par 'gyur ro/ /sangs rgyas kyi
87a6(mdo 'grel): zhing yongs su dag par byed do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mnyes par byed par 'gyur/ bkur stir byed par 'gyur/ bla mar byed par 'gyur/ ri mor byed par 'gyur /mchod par byed par 'gyur ro/
87a7(mdo 'grel): nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yang mi ltung ngo/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du phyir ldog par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya bar rab
87b1(mdo 'grel): tu shes te/ shA ri'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i chos kyi mig yongs su dag pa'o/ /shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di ltar shes te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di dag bla na med pa yang dag
87b2(mdo 'grel): par rtogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag ni lung ma bstan pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag ni phyir ldog par mi 'gyur ba'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag ni phyir ldog par 'gyur ba'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'di
87b3(mdo 'grel): dag gi mngon par shes pa ni yongs su rdzogs pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag gi mngon par shes pa ni yongs su ma rdzogs pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di dag ni mngon par shes pa yongs su rdzogs pas shar phyogs nas steng gi phyogS
87b4(mdo 'grel): kyi bar du 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag tu song zhing/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la bkur stir byed bla mar byed/ rjed par byed/ mchod par byed do/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'di ni mngon par
87b5(mdo 'grel): shes pa yongs su ma rdzogs pas mchod pa'i bar du mi byed do/ /'dis ni mngon par shes pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /'dis ni mngon par shes pa thob par mi 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni yongs su dag par 'gyur
87b6(mdo 'grel): ? /byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'di'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ni yongs su dag par mi 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'dis ni sems can yongs su smin par byas so/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'dis ni sems can yongs su smin par ma byas so/ /byang chub sems
87b7(mdo 'grel): 'di la ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bsngags pa brjod par mdzad do/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di la ni bsngags par rjod par mi mdzad do/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
88a1(mdo 'grel): rnams dang nye bar gnas par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag ni nye bar gnas par mi 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob nas tshe dpag tu med par
88a2(mdo 'grel): 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'di'i tshe ni dpag tu yod par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'di'i dge 'dun tshad med par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'di'i dge 'dun ni tshad yod par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
88a3(mdo 'grel): 'di ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas byang chub sems dpa' dge 'dun dang ldan par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
88a4(mdo 'grel): byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas byang chub sems dpa' i dge 'dun dang ldan par mi 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni dka' ba spyod pa 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni dka' ba spyod par mi 'gyur ba'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'di ni srid pa tha ma'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' 'di ni srid pa tha ma pa ma yin pa'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di ni snying po byang chub la 'dug par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' 
88a5(mdo 'grel): 'di ni snying po byang chub la 'dug par mi 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di dag la ni 'dud yod par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di dag la ni bdud yod par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya bar rab tu shes te/ de
88a6(mdo 'grel): ltar na shA ri'i bu byang chub mas dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi mig yongs su dag pa yin no/ /shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sangs rgyas kyi mig yongs su dag pa gang lags/
88b1(mdo 'grel): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub kyi sems kyi rjes la rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag nas/ sems kyi skad cig gcig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis rnam pa thams cad
88b2(mdo 'grel): mkhyen pa nyid rjes su thob pa gang yin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang ldan pa yin pa/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang/ byams pa chen po dang/ snying rje chen po
88b3(mdo 'grel): dang ldan pa yin te/ mig gang gi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rnam pa thams cad du ma mthong pa 'am/ ma thos pa 'am/ ma bsam pa'am/ rnam par ma shes pa ci yang med pa ste/ shA ri'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
88b4(mdo 'grel): po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mig yongs su dag pa'o/ /shA ri'i bu de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mig lnga yongs su sbyong bar 'dod pa dang thob par 'dod pas pha rol tu phyin pa drug
88b5(mdo 'grel): la brtson par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug tu dge ba'i chos thams cad 'dus te/ nyan thos kyi chos dang/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos dang/ byang chub sems dpa' i chos dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad 'dus so/ /shA
