157b5(mdo 'grel): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba'o/ /de bzhin du bsam gtan dang/ tshad med pa dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par
157b6(mdo 'grel): 'jug pa dang/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang/ yang dag par spong ba dang/ rdzu 'phrul kyi rkang pa dang/ dbang po dang/ stobs dang/ byang chub kyi yan lag dang/ lam dang/ pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ mngon par shes pa dang/ yi ge rnams dang/ stobs bcu
157b7(mdo 'grel): dang/ mi 'jigs pa dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu yang dag pa'i mdza' i bar yang yang dag pa'i mdza' i
158a1(mdo 'grel): rang bzhin dang bral ba ste/ de byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyong pas/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
158a2(mdo 'grel): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ma bral bar shes par bya'o/ shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gzugs kyi rang bzhi ni ji lta du/ tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ni ji lta bu/ skye
158a3(mdo 'grel): mched dang/ khams dang/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba so sor dang/ bsdus pa'i rang bzhin ji lta bu/ yang dag pa'i mdza' i bar gyi rang bzhi ni ji lta bu/ rab 'byor gyi smras pa tshe dang ldan pa shA'i bu gzuD kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o/ /tshor ba'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o//
158a4(mdo 'grel): 'du shes kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o/ /'du byed rnams kyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o/ /rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o/ skye mched dang/ khams dang/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o//
158a5(mdo 'grel): yang dag pa'i mdza' i bar gyi rang bzhin ni dngos po med pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/ khyod kyis 'di ltar gzugs ni gzugs kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba dang/ tshor ba ni tshor ba'i rang bzhin rang bral ba dang/ 'du byed rnams ni
158a6(mdo 'grel): 'du byed rnams kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba dang/ rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pa'i rang bzhin dang bral ba dang/ skye mched rnams ni skye mched rnams kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba dang/ khams rnams ni khams rnams kyi rang bzhin dang bral ba
158a7(mdo 'grel): dang/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i rang bzhin dang bral ba dang/ yang dag pa'i mdza' i bar ni yang dag pa'i mdza' i rang bzhin dang bral bar shes par bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang gzugs ni gzugs kyi
158b1(mdo 'grel): mtshan nyid dang bral ba'o/ tshor ba ni tshong pa'i mtshan nyid dang bral ba'o/ /'du shes ni 'du shes kyi mtshan nyid dang bral ba'o/ /'du byed rnams ni 'du byed rnams kyi mtshan 'di dang bral ba'o/ /rnam par zhes pa ni rnam par shes pa'i mtshan nyid dang bral ba'i
158b2(mdo 'grel): skye mched rnams ni skye mched rnams kyi mtshan nyid dang bral ba'o/ /khams rnams ni khams rnams kyi mtshan nyid ? dang bral pa'o/ /rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i bar ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid dang bral ba'o/ /yang dag pa'i mdza' i bar ni yang
158b3(mdo 'grel): dag pa'i mdza' i mtshan nyid dang bral ba'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu mtshan nyid kyang mtshan nyid kyi ngo bo dang bral ba'o/ /ngo bo yang ngo bo'i mtshan nyid dang bral ba'o/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
158b4(mdo 'grel): gang zhig bslab pa 'di la slob ba de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang zhig bslab pa 'di la slob pa de ni/
158b5(mdo 'grel): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni bzod pa chung ngu'i dmigs pa dang rnam pa'i khyad par yin no// //de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar chos thams cad ni ma skyes shing nges par ma byung ba'o/ /smras
158b6(mdo 'grel): pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor rgyu gang gis na/? chos thams cad ma skyes shing nges par ma byung ba yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzugs ni gzugs kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ de la skye ba 'am/ nges par 'byung pa yang mi?
158b7(mdo 'grel): dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu tshor ba ni tshor ba'i rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ de la skye ba 'am/ nges par 'byung ba yang mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu 'du shes ni 'du shes kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ de la skye ba 'am nges/
159a1(mdo 'grel): par 'byung pa yang mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'du byed rnams ni 'du byed rnams kyi rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ de la skye ba 'am nges par 'byung ba yang mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam par shes pa ni rnam par
159a2(mdo 'grel): shes pa'i rang bzhin gyis stong ste/ de la skye ba 'am nges par 'byung ba yang mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin du phung po dang/ khams dang/ skye mched dang/ rtan cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang/ yang dag pa'i mdza' i bar du yang dag pa'i mdza' i rang bzhin gyis stong ste/
159a3(mdo 'grel): de la skye ba 'am nges par 'byung ba yang mi dmigs so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang nye ba yin te/ de ji lta ji ltar rnam pa thams cad
159a4(mdo 'grel): mkhyen pa nyid du nye bar gyur pa de lta de ltar lus yongs su dag pa dang/ dag yongs su dag pa dang/ sems yongs su dag pa dang/ mtshan yongs su dag pa thob par 'gyur ro/ /de ji lta ji ltar lus yongs su dag pa dang/ ngag yongs su dgu pa dang/ sems yongs su dag pa dang/ mtshan
159a5(mdo 'grel): yongs su dag pa thob par gyur pa de lta de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'dod chags dang ldan pa'i sems mi skyed do/ /zhe sdang dang ldan pa'i sems mi bskyed do/ /gti mug dang ldan pa'i sems mi bskyed do/ /nga rgyal dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed do/ /g.yo dang sgyu dang ldan pa dang/ phrag dog
159a6(mdo 'grel): dang ser sna dang ldan pa dang/ sred pa dang ldan pa dang/ lta ba dang ldan pa'i sems mi skyed do/ /de 'dod chags kyi sems mi skyed cing/ zhe sdang dang/ gti mug dang/ nga rgyal dang/ g.yo dang/ phrag dog dang/ ser sna dang/ sred pa dang/ lta ba ngan pa dang ldan
159a7(mdo 'grel): ba'i sems mi skyed pas nam yang mi mngal du skye bar mi 'gyur te/ rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par brdzus te skye bar 'gyur ro/ /sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i don ma gtogs par nam yang ngan song rnams su skye bar mi 'gyur ro/ /de sangs rgyas kyi zhing
159b1(mdo 'grel): nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro zhing/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bsnyen bkur byed/ sems can rnams kyang yongs su smin par byed/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang spyod par byed de/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs
159b2(mdo 'grel): rgyas kyi bar du nam yong sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang bral bar mi 'gyur ro/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nye bar gyur pa
159b3(mdo 'grel): yin no zhes bya ba ni bzod pa 'bring gi dmigs pa dang rnam pa'i khyad par yin no// //de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
159b4(mdo 'grel): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas gzugs la spyod na mtshan ma la spyod de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/ /gal te tshor ba la spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ /'du shes pa spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ /'du byed tnams la
159b5(mdo 'grel): spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ /rnam par shes pa la spyod na mtshan ma la spyod de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/ /gal te gzugs rtag pa 'am/ mi rtag pa zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/ /
159b6(mdo 'grel): gal te tshor ba rtag pa 'am mi rtag pa zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ /'du shes rtag pa 'am/ mi rtag pa zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ /'du byed rnams rtag pa 'am/ mi rtag pa zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ /rnam par shes pa
159b7(mdo 'grel): rtag pa 'am/ /mi rtag pa zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/ /gal te gzugs bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba zhes bgyi par spyod na mtshan ma la spyod de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/ /gal te tshor ba bde
160a1(mdo 'grel): pa 'am/ sdug bsngal pa zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ /kun shes bde ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod ngo/ /'du byed rnams bde ba 'am sdug bsngal zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la
160a2(mdo 'grel): spyod do/ /rnam par shes pa bde ba 'am sdug bsngal ba zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/ /gal te gzugs bdag gam/ bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi
160a3(mdo 'grel): spyod do/ /tshor ba bdag gas bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ /'du shes bdag gam bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ /'du byed rnams bdag gam bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshen ma la spyod do//
160a4(mdo 'grel): rnam par shes pa bdag gam bdag med ces bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/ /gal te gzugs zhi ba 'am/ ma zhi ba zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do//
160a5(mdo 'grel): tshor ba zhi ba 'am/ ma zhi ba zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ /'du shes zhi ba 'am ma zhi zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ /'du byed rnams zhi ba 'am/ ma zhi pa zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ /rnam par shes pa zhi pa 'am/
160a6(mdo 'grel): ma zhi pa zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/ /gal te gzugs dben pa 'am/ mi dpon pa zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/ /tshor ba dpen pa 'am/ mi
160a7(mdo 'grel): dben pa zhis bgyi bar spyod do mtshan ma la spyod do/ /'du shes dben pa 'am/ mi dben zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ /'du byed rnams dpen pa 'am/ mi dben pa zhes bya bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyad do/ /rnam par shes pa dben pa 'am/ mi dben
160b1(mdo 'grel): pa zhes bgyi bar spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/ /bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i che/ thabs mi mkhas pas byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos
160b2(mdo 'grel): sum cu rtsa bdun gyi bar la spyod na mtshan ma la spyod de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/ /de bzhin du mngon par shes pa rnams dang/ pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bsam gtan rnams dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang/ mig? lnga rnams
160b3(mdo 'grel): dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu rnams dang/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi rnams dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi rnams dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i bar rnams la spyod na mtshan ma la spyod do/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do//
160b4(mdo 'grel): bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spong pa'i tshe/ thabs mi mkhas pas 'di snyam du/ bdag ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do snyam du sems na dmigs pa la spyod pa ste/ bdag
160b5(mdo 'grel): med do snyam du sems pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni mtshan ma la spyod do/ /bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'di snyam du gang de ltar spyod pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod do/ /de ni
160b6(mdo 'grel): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom mo snyam du sems na de mtshan ma nyid la spyod ba de/ de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs mi mkhas par rig par bgyi'o/ /kde nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ra'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces spras so//
160b7(mdo 'grel): tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'ang thabs mi mkhas par ji ltar rig par bya ba yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod ?
161a1(mdo 'grel): tshe/ gzugs la gnas pa dang/ lhag par mos pa dang/ kun shes pa dang/ tshor ba la gnas pa dang/ lhag par mos pa dang/ kun shes pa dang/ 'du shes le gnas pa dang/ lhag par mos pa dang/ kun shes par?
161a2(mdo 'grel): 'du byed rnams la gnas pa dang/ lhag par mos pa dang/ kun shes pa dang/ rnam par shes pa la gnas pa dang/ lhag par mos pa dang/ kun shes par byed na de gzugs la gnas pa dang/ lhag par mos pa dang/ kun shes pa dang/ tshor ba
161a3(mdo 'grel): la gnas pa dang/ lhag par mos pa dang/ kun shes pa dang/ 'du shes la gnas pa dang/ lhag par mos pa dang/ kun shes pa dang/ 'du byed rnams la gnas pa dang/ lhag par mos pa dang/ kun shes pa dang/ rnam par shes pa la gnas
161a4(mdo 'grel): pa dang/ lhag par mos pa dang/ kun shes pas gzugs mngon par 'du byed pa la sbyor/ tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa mngon par 'du byed pa la spyod pa'i yin to/ des na de skye pa dang/ rga ba dang/ na ba dang/ 'chi
161a5(mdo 'grel): ba dang/ mya ngan dang/ smre sngags 'don pa dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang/ yid mi bde ba dang/ 'khrug pa las yongs su mi grol bas/ sdug bsngal chen po las yongs su mi 'grol bar brjod do/ /gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
161a6(mdo 'grel): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ mig la gnas pa dang/ lhag par mos pa dang/ kun shes pa dang/ rna ba dang/ sna dang/ lce dang/ lus dang/ yid la gnas pa dang/ lhag par mos pa dang/ kun shes pa dang/ gzugs la gnas pa dang/
161a7(mdo 'grel): lhag par mos pa dang/ kun shes pa dang/ sgra dang/ dri dang/ ro dang/ reg dang/ chos la gnas pa dang/ lhag par mos pa dang/ kun shes pa dang/ mig gi rnam par shes pa la gnas pa dang/ lhag par mos pa dang/ kun shes pa dang/ rna
161b1(mdo 'grel): pa'i rnam par shes pa dang/ sna'i rnam par shes pa dang/ lce'i rnam par shes pa dang/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa la gnas pa dang/ lhag par mos pa dang/ kun shes pa dang/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa la gnas pa dang/ lhag par
161b2(mdo 'grel): mos pa dang/ kun shes pa dang/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa la gnas pa dang/ lhag par mos pa dang/ kun shes pa dang/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i
161b3(mdo 'grel): rkyen gyis tshor ba bde ba dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang/ bde ba yang ma yin/ sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa gang yin pa de la gnaS pa dang lhag par mos pa dang/ kun shas pa dang/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba
161b4(mdo 'grel): dang/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba bde ba'am/ sdug bsngal ba dang/ bde ba yang ma yin/ sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa gang yin pa de la gnaS
161b5(mdo 'grel): pa dang/ lhag par mos pa dang/ kun shes pa dang/ gal te byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gnas pa dang/ /lhag par mos pa dang/ kun shes pa dang/ de bzhin du mig lnga dang/ mngon par shes pa drug dang/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang/
161b6(mdo 'grel): bsam gtan dang/ tshad med pa dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang/ dgra bcom pa nyid
161b7(mdo 'grel): dang/ rang sangs rgyas nyid dang/ byang chub sems dpa' dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la gnaS pa dang lhag par mos pa dang/ kun shes na de sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams la gnas pa dang/ lhag par mos pa dang/ kun shes pas sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams
162a1(mdo 'grel): mngon par 'du byed pa la spyod pa yin te/ mngon par 'du byed pa la spyod pas skye ba dang/ rga ba dang/ na ba dang/ 'chi ba dang/ mya ngan dang/ smre dags 'don pa dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang/ yid mi bde ba las yongs su mi 'grol bas sdug
162a2(mdo 'grel): bsngal chen po las yongs su mi 'grol bar brjod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyis yang ngon du bya ba'i skal ba yang med na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
162a3(mdo 'grel): tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya blta ci smos te/ de ni gnas med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod na/ thabs mi mkhas par shes par bya'o/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan
162a4(mdo 'grel): pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la ji ltar spyod na thabs mkhas par shes par bya/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
162a5(mdo 'grel): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/ gzugs la gnas pa med pa dang/ lhag par mos pa med pa dang/ kun shes pa med pa dang/ tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa la gnas pa med pa dang/ lhag par mos pa med pa dang/ kun
162a6(mdo 'grel): shes pa med pa dang/ de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi bar la gnas pa med pa dang/ lhag par mos pa med pa dang/ kun shes pa med pas de gzugs la mi spyod/ tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa la
162a7(mdo 'grel): mi spyod de/ gzugs kyi mtshan ma la mi spyod/ tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa'i mtshan ma la mi spyod/ gzugs rtag pa'am/ mi rtag pa zhes bya bar mi sbyod/ tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang
162b1(mdo 'grel): rnam par shes pa rtag pa'am/ mi rtag pa zhes bya bar mi spyod/ gzugs bde pa 'am/ sdug bsngal ba zhes bya ba dang/ bdag yod pa 'am/ bdag med pa zhes bya ba dang/ zhi ba'am ma zhi zhes bya ba dang/ tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams pa yang
162b2(mdo 'grel): de bzhin te/ rnam par shes pa bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal bzhes bya ba dang/ bdag gam bdag med pa zhes bya ba dang/ zhi ba 'am ma zhi zhes bya bar mi spyod/ gzugs stong pa 'am/ mi stong pa zhes bya bar mi spyod/ mtshan ma yod pa 'am/ mtshan ma med pa zhes bya
162b3(mdo 'grel): par mi spyod/ smon pa yod pa 'am/ smon pa med pa zhes bya bar mi spyod/ tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams la de bzhin te/ rnam par shes pa stong pa 'am/ mi stong pa zhes bya bar mi spyod/ mtshan ma yod pa 'am/ mtshan ma med pa zhes bya bar
162b4(mdo 'grel): mi spyod/ smon pa yod pa'am/ smon pa med pa zhes bya bar mi spyod/ dben pa 'am/ mi dben pa zhes bya bar mi spyod na/ de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pa thabs mkhas par shes par bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i du 'di
162b5(mdo 'grel): ltar gzugs kyi stong pa nyid gang yin pa de gzugs ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gzhan na yang gzugs med/ gzugs las gzhan na yang stong pa nyid med de/ gzugs nyid stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid nyid gzugs so/ /tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed
162b6(mdo 'grel): rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid gang yin pa de yang rnam par shes pa ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gzhan yang rnam par shes pa med/ rnam par shes pa las gzhan na yang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid nyid rnam par shes pa'o/ /rnam
162b7(mdo 'grel): par shes pa nyid stong pa nyid do/ /de bzhin du skye mched dang/ khams dang/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun rnams dang/ pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang/ bsam gtan rnams dang/ tshad med pa rnams
163a1(mdo 'grel): dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos la 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar gyi stong pa nyid gang
163a2(mdo 'grel): yin pa de yang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams ma yin/ stong pa nyid las gzhan na yang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams med/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams las gzhan na yang stong pa nyid med de/ stong pa nyid nyid sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams/ sangs rgyas kyi
163a3(mdo 'grel): chos ma 'dres pa rnams stong pa nyid do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni thabs mkhas par shes par bya'o// //bam po bcu gcig pa/ /tsha dang
163a4(mdo 'grel): ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya pa'i skal ba yod do/ /de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ba
163a5(mdo 'grel): la spyod pa ni/ gal te chos 'ga' zhig nye bar rtogs na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/ /nye bar ma rtogs na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/ /nye par rtogs pa yang yin la/ nye bar ma rtogs pa yang yin na/ shes rab
163a6(mdo 'grel): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/ /nye bar rtogs pa yang ma yin la/ nye bar ma rtogs pa yang ma yin na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod do/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
163a7(mdo 'grel): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ nye bar rtogs na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod pa yin/ nye bar ma rtogs na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod pa yin/ nye bar rtogs pa yang yin la/ nye bar ma rtogs pa
163b1(mdo 'grel): yang yin na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spong pa yin/ nye bar rtogs pa yang ma yin la nye bar ma rtogs pa yang ma yin na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi spyod pa yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i pu de ni 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha
163b2(mdo 'grel): rol tu phyin pa la rang bzhin mi dmigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhes na 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs nges na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po she rab kyi pha
163b3(mdo 'grel): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe spyod do zhes bya bar nye bar mi rtogs so/ /mi spyod do zhes bya bar nye bar ma rtogs so spyod kyang spyod la mi spyod kyang mi spyod de zhes bya bar nye bar mi rtogs so/ /spyod pa yang ma yin mi spyod pa yang ma yin n zhes bya bar
163b4(mdo 'grel): nye bar mi rtogs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar nges chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin du khong du chung cing ngo ma blangs pa'i phyir te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
163b5(mdo 'grel): chen po'i sems mi zhum zhing kun tu mi zhum ste/ ming dang kun tu mi skrag kun tu skrag pas zin par ma byung na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la nye bar rig par bya'o zhes bya ba ni bzod pa chen po'i
163b6(mdo 'grel): dmigs pa dang rnam pa'i khyad par ro// //tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid do yang dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi phyir gnyis su med cing gnyis su byar med pa'o/ /de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
163b7(mdo 'grel): po rnams kyi ting nge ? na chos thams cad skye ba med pa zhes bya ba de/ yangs ba/ mdun du byas pa/ tshad med par nges pa/ nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis mi 'phrogs pa'o/ /shA ri'i bu ting nge 'dzin ni nges rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems
164a1(mdo 'grel): dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ting nge 'dzin gang dag gis gnas pa'i byang chub sems
164a2(mdo 'grel): dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
164a3(mdo 'grel): chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin dpa' bar 'gro ba zhes bya ba yod do/ de bzhin du rin chen phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge
164a4(mdo 'grel): 'dzin phong/ /seng+ge rnaM par rtse ba zheS bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ? zla ba bzang po zheS? bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ /zla ba'i rgyal mtshan tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /tshes thams cad las shin tu 'phags ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /chos thams cad kyi phyag rgya zhes
164a5(mdo 'grel): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /spyi gtsug rnam par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /chos kyi dbyings su nges pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /nges pa'i rgyal mtshan dpal zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod de/ /rdo rje lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do//  chos thams cad la 'jug pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /mnyam par bzhag pa'i gnas skabs su rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /rgyal po'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /stobs kyi brtson 'grus zhes bya
164a6(mdo 'grel): ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /chos thams cad las yang dag par 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /ting nge 'dzin la rgyal po ltar rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin yod de/ /'od zer rab tu 'gyed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do//
164b1(mdo 'grel): dpung rnam par bkod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /yang dag par 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /nges pa'i tshig la gdon mi za bar 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /lta bas chog mi shes pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do//
164b2(mdo 'grel): tshig bla dags la yang dag par 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /phyogs rnams par lta ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /nyams pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /chos thams
164b3(mdo 'grel): cad yang dag par 'du pa rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting 'dzin yod do/ /nam mkha' ltar rgyas par 'gengs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /rgyal mtshan rtse mo'i dpung rgyan zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
164b4(mdo 'grel): yod do/ /dbang po'i teg ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /rgyun gyi rjes su song ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /snrel zhi zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /nyon mongs pa spong bzhes bya ba'i?
164b5(mdo 'grel): ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /chol ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /gnas la brten pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /sems med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /dri ma med pa'i sgron ma
164b6(mdo 'grel): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /'od mdza' yas ba zhes bya pa'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /'od byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /dag pa dam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /'od dri ma med pa zhes
164b7(mdo 'grel): bya ba'i ting 'dzin yod do/ /dga' ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /rgyal bar bya ba ma yin pa zhes bya pa'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /glog gi sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /zad mi shes bzhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /mi 
165a1(mdo 'grel): 'pham pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /gzi brjid yod ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /zad pa dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /rnam par phye ba zhes
165a2(mdo 'grel): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /'jigs pa byed pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /nyi ma'i sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /zla ba dri ma med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /shes rab sgron ma zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do//
165a3(mdo 'grel): snang ba gsal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /snang ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /bya ba byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /ye shes tog /ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /rdo rje lta bu zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do//
165a4(mdo 'grel): sems gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /kun tu snang ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /rin chen mdza' zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /chos dam pa'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge
165a5(mdo 'grel): 'dzin yod do/ /chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /dga' ba spong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /chos kyi 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /rnam par 'thor ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do//
165a6(mdo 'grel): chos thams cad kyi tshig rab tu 'byed pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /yi ge mnyam par 'god pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /yi ge dang bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /dmigs pa gcod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do//
165a7(mdo 'grel): 'gyur pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /rnam pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /ming nges par 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /gnas med par spyod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /rab rib med pa zhes bya
165b1(mdo 'grel): ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /spyod pa dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /g.yo ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /yul las rgal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /yon tan thams cad kyi tshogs su gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do//
165b2(mdo 'grel): sems med par gnas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /dge ba'i me tog rgyas shing gsal ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /byang chub kyi yan lag yod pa zhes bya pa'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /spobs pa mdza' yas ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
165b3(mdo 'grel): yod do/ /mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /chos thams cad las 'da' ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /yongs su spyod pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /nem nur rnam par sel ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do//
165b4(mdo 'grel): gnas su bya ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /gcig tu rnam par bkod pa zhes pa ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /rnam pa mngon par sgrub pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /rnam pa gcig tu gyur pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /rnam par dor ba med pa zhes
165b5(mdo 'grel): bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /srid pa'i gzhi thams cad rtogs par khong du chud pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /brda dang/ sgra la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /sgra dbyangs dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /yi ge dang
165b6(mdo 'grel): bral ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /sgron ma 'bar ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /mtshan nyid yongs su sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /mngon par dmigs pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /rnam pa'i mchog thams
165b7(mdo 'grel): cad dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /bde ba dang/ /sdug bsngal thams cad la mngon par mi dga' ba med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /zad mi shes pa'i za ma tog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /gzungs kyi blo gros
166a1(mdo 'grel): zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /'jig rten thams cad rab tu sgom pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /ting nge 'dzin mnyam pa nyid ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /tshul dang tshul med pa las rnam par grol ba zhes bya ba'i
166a2(mdo 'grel): ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /rjes su 'brang ba thams cad yang dag par 'du ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /gzhi med par nges zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /de bzhin nyid la gnas par nges pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /lus kyi skyon yang dag par
166a3(mdo 'grel): 'joms pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /dag gi skyon rnam par 'jig ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /nam mkha' 'dra ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin yod do/ /nam mkha' ltar chags pa med pas rnam par grol zhing dgos pa med pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge
166a4(mdo 'grel): 'dzin yod de/ ting nge 'dzin des rnam par spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems
166a5(mdo 'grel): dpa' chen po rnams kyi ting nge 'dzin te/ ting nge 'dzin de dag gis rnam par sprod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/ de ltar ting nge 'dzin dang
166a6(mdo 'grel): Fgzungs kyi sgo gang la bslab pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba de lta bur tshad med grangs med pa gzhan dag kyang yod do//
166a7(mdo 'grel): de la dpa' bar 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin gang gis ting nge 'dzin thams cad kyi spyod yul nyams su myong bar 'gyur ba ste/ de ni dpa' bar 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/ /de la rin chen phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i
166b1(mdo 'grel): ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin gang gis ting nge 'dzin thams cad rgyas btab par 'gyur ba ste/ de ni rin chen phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin ces bya'o/ /de bzhin du de la nam mkha' ltar chags pa med pa rnam par grol zhing gos pa med pa zhes bya ba'i
166b2(mdo 'grel): ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ ting nge 'dzin gang la gnas na chos thams cad la nam mkha' ltar chags pa med cing rnam par grol bas gos pa med pa rjes su thob par 'gyur pa ste/ de ni nam mkha' ltar chags pa med pa rnam par grol zhing gos pa med pa'i ting nge
166b3(mdo 'grel): 'dzin ces bya ba'i bar du'o zhes bya ba ni chos kyi mchog chung du'i dmigs pa dang rnam pa'i khyad par yin no// //de nas sangs rgyas kyi mthus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang
166b4(mdo 'grel): ldan pa sha ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang ting nge 'dzin de dag gis gnas pa de ni sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
166b5(mdo 'grel): tu lung bstan to/ /da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba gang dag yin pa de dag gis kyang byang chub
166b6(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de lung bstan te/ des ni ting nge 'dzin yang yang dag par rjes su mi mthong/ bdag ni snyoms par zhugs so zhes bya bar ting nge 'dzin des rlom sems su 'gyur pa yang med do/ /nges ni ting nge 'dzin yang yang dag par rjes su mi
166b7(mdo 'grel): mthong ngo/ /bdag ni snyoms par 'jug go/ bdag gis mnyam par bzhag par bya'o/ /bdag ni mnyam par bzhag par gyur to zhes rlom sems su 'gyur ba med de/ de la rnam par rtog pa de dag med cing mi rgyu'o zhes bya ba ni chos kyi mchog 'bring gi
167a1(mdo 'grel): dmigs pa dang rnam pa'i khyad par yin no// //shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci ting nge 'dzin 'di la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
167a2(mdo 'grel): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi lung bstan pa yod dam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ni med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang gzhan la ting nge 'dzin yang gzhan
167a3(mdo 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan zhes bya ba med kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin te/ ting nge 'dzin kyang byang chub sems dpa' o/ /byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin to/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gal te
167a4(mdo 'grel): de ltar ting nge 'dzin kyang gzhan la/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan zhes bya ba med la/ byang chub sems dpa' yang gzhan la/ ting nge 'dzin kyang gzhan zhes bya ba med de/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir ting nge 'dzin nyid kyang byang chub sems
167a5(mdo 'grel): dpa' byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyang ting nge 'dzin yin na/ de la ting nge 'dzin bstan par nus sam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ni ma yin no/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor rigs kyi bu de ting nge 'dzin de la 'du shes su
167a6(mdo 'grel): byed dam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'du shes su byed pa med do/ /smras pa/ ji ltar de la 'du shes su byed par mi 'gyur/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ ji ltar rnam par rtogs pa med pa ltar ro/ /smras pa de la ji ltar rtogs pa med
167a7(mdo 'grel): pa yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ chos thams cad med pa'i phyir rtog pa med de/ de ltar na ting nge 'dzin de la rtog pa med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na/ rigs kyi bu de ting nge 'dzin de la rnam par shes par byed pa med do//
167b1(mdo 'grel): 'du shes su byed pa med do/ /smras pa/ ci'i phyir rnam par shes par byed pa med cing/ 'du shes su 'gyur pa med/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ ting nge 'dzin de yang med la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de yang med pa'i phyir/ rnam par
167b2(mdo 'grel): shes pa med do/ /'du shes 'gyur ba med do zhes bya ba ni chos kyi mchog chen po'i dmigs pa dang rnam pa'i khyad par yin no// //de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la legs so zhes bya ba gnang ste/ ji ltar
167b3(mdo 'grel): khyod nyon mongs pa med pa la gnas pa rnams kyi mchog tu bstan pa ltar ston pa ni lags so legs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos/ de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/ /de ltar bsam gtan gyi pha
167b4(mdo 'grel): rol tu phyin pa dang/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bslab par bya'o/ /de ltar byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang/ sangs rgyas
167b5(mdo 'grel): kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar la bslab par bya'o/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha
167b6(mdo 'grel): rol tu phyin pa la bslob pa lags sam/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa lags
167b7(mdo 'grel): sam/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar la slob pa lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar slob pa ni
168a1(mdo 'grel): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin /bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
168a2(mdo 'grel): dang/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang/ bsam gtan dang/ tshad med pa dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang/ stobs bcu dang/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang/
168a3(mdo 'grel): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin no/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
168a4(mdo 'grel): po de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa ni mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi
168a5(mdo 'grel): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin no/ /shA ri'i bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du mi dmigs pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir bdag mi dmigs so/ /shin tu rnam par
168a6(mdo 'grel): dag pa'i phyir sems can dang/ srog dang/ gso ba dang/ skyes bu dang/ gang zag dang/ shed las skyes dang/ shed bu dang/ byed pa po dang/ tshor ba po dang/ shes pa po dang/ mthong ba po mi dmigs so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir sdug bsngal
168a7(mdo 'grel): mi dmigs so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir kun 'byung ba dang/ 'gog pa dang/ lam mi dmigs so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir 'dod pa'i khams mi dmigs so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir gzugs kyi khams mi dmigs so//
168b1(mdo 'grel): shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ gzugs med pa'i khams mi dmigs so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ bsam gtan dang/ tshad med pa dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa mi dmigs so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir dran pa nye bar bzhag
168b2(mdo 'grel): pa dang/ yang dag par spong ba dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang/ dbang po dang/ stobs dang/ byang chub kyi yan lag dang/ lam mi dmigs so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ pha rol tu phyin pa rnams mi dmigs so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir stobs cu dang
168b3(mdo 'grel): mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i dmigs so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams mi dmigs so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ rgyun tu zhugs
168b4(mdo 'grel): pa mi dmigs so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ lan cig phyir 'od ba dang/ phyir mi 'ong ba dang/ dgra bcom pa dang/ dang sangs rgyas mi dmigs so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' mi dmigs so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i
168b5(mdo 'grel): phyir/ byang chub mi dmigs so/ /shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas mi dmigs so/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par dag pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ chos thams cad ma skyes pa dang/ 'byung
168b6(mdo 'grel): pa med pa dang/ dmigs pa med pa dang/ mngon par 'du bya ba med pa 'di ni rnam par dag pa zhes bya ste/ shA ri'i bu de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob pa yin no zhes bya
168b7(mdo 'grel): ba ni/ rnam par rtog pa dang ldan pa spyi'i dbang du byas nas bstan pa yin no// //gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos gang dang gang la slob pa lags/ bcom ldan
169a1(mdo 'grel): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni chos gang la yang slob pa med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shA ri'i bu tshom?  ma 'di dag ni/ byis pa so so'i skye bos ji ltar mngon par
169a2(mdo 'grel): chags par bya ba de lta bu'i rnam par yod pa ma yin no/ /gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das 'o na chos 'di dag rnam pa ji ltar mchis pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ ji ltar med pa de ltar yod de/ de ltar yod pa ma yin pa de'i phyir med ces
169a3(mdo 'grel): bya ba ni drod du gtogs pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang ldan pa'i dang po ma rig pa'i rtog pa yin no// /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slang du mchis pa mchis pa ma lags pa la ma mchis pa zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu
169a4(mdo 'grel): gzugs nang stong pa nyid dang/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir yod pa ma yin no/ /tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed? rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa nad stong pa nyid dang/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi phyir
169a5(mdo 'grel): yod pa ma yin no/ /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi bar du nang stong pa nyid dang/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi bar gyi phyir yod pa ma yin no/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du nang stong pa nyid dang/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid
169a6(mdo 'grel): kyi bar gyi phyir yod pa ma yin no zhes bya ba ni de nyid kyi rtog pa gnyis pa gzugs la sogs pa'i phung po la rtog pa yin no// //de la byis pa so so sbye? bo ni ma rig pa dang/ srid?  pa las mngon par zhen to/ /de dag gis ni ma rig pa dang/ sred
169a7(mdo 'grel): pas brtags so/ /brtags nas ma rig pa dang/ sred pa dag gis mngon par zhen te/ mdza' gnyis su chags pas de dag gis mdza' o gnyis yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin mi shes mi mthong ngo/ /de dag gi ji lta ba bzhin med pa'i chos de dag brtogs
169b1(mdo 'grel): nas ming dang gzugs la mngon par zhen pa nas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi par? la mngon par zhen par gyur to zhes bya ba ni de nyid kyi rtog pa gsum pa ming dang gzugs pa mngon par zhen pa'i rtog pa yin no// //chos rnams la mngon bar
169b2(mdo 'grel): zhen pa'i dag ni med pa'i mdza' gnyis dag tu rtog par byed/ brtags nas mi shes mi mthong ngo/ /ci zhig mi shes mi mthong zhe na/ gzugs mi shes mi mthong ngo/ /tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa mi shes mi
169b3(mdo 'grel): mthong ba nas/ /skye mched dang/ khams dang/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i bar du mi shes mi mthong ngo/ /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun mi shes mi mthong ba nas/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar du mi shes mi mthong ste/ de
169b4(mdo 'grel): ltar de dag ni byis pa zhes bya ba'i grangs su 'gro'o zhes bya ba ni de nyid kyi rtog pa bzhi pa mdza' gnyis la chags pa'i rnam par rtog pa yin no// //de dag ni ma rig pa dang/ sred pa'i rkyen gyis mi shes mi mthong ngo/ /ci zhig mi shes mi
169b5(mdo 'grel): mthong zhe na/ gzugs kun nas nyon mongs pa'o zhes mi shes mi mthong ngo/ /de bzhin du gzugs rnam par byang ba'o zhes mi shes mi mthong ngo/ /tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa kun nas nyon mongs pa'o zhes mi shes mi
169b6(mdo 'grel): mthong ngo/ /de bzhin du rnam par shes pa rnam par byang ba'o zhes mi shes mi mthong ngo/ /de dag ni nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /gang nas nges par mi 'byung zhe na/ 'dod pa'i khams nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /gzugs kyi khams nas nges
169b7(mdo 'grel): par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /gzugs med pa'i khams nas nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro/ /nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos dag las nges par 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni de nyid kyi rtog pa lnga pa kun nas nyon mongs pa dang/ rnam par
170a1(mdo 'grel): byang bar mi shes pa'i rnam par rtog pa yin no// //de dag mi dad do/ /ji ltar mi dad ce na/ gzugs gzugs kyi stong zhes bya bar mi dad do/ /byang chub kyi bar du byang chub kyi stong zhes bya bar mi dad do/ /de dag ni gnas pa ma
170a2(mdo 'grel): yin no/ /ji ltar gnas pa ma yin zhe na/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa ma yin/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa ma yin/
170a3(mdo 'grel): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas pa ma yin/ phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas pa ma yin/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar la gnas pa ma yin no/ /de dag ni mngon par zhen pa yin no/ /ji ltar mngon par zhen pa yin zhe na/ gzugs
170a4(mdo 'grel): la mngon par zhen pa yin/ tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa la mngon par zhen pa yin/ mig la mngon par zhen pa yin/ rna ba dang/ sna dang/ lce dang/ lus dang/ yid la mngon par zhen pa yin no/ /skye mched dang/
170a5(mdo 'grel): khams dang/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la mngon par zhen pa yin/ 'dod chags dang/ zhe sdang dang/ gti mug la mngon par zhen pa yin/ lta bar gyur pa rnams la mngon par zhen pa yin/ byang chub kyi bar la mngon par zhen pa yin te/ de'i phyir na byis
170a6(mdo 'grel): pa zhes bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi slob cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi 'byung ba lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
170a7(mdo 'grel): pa/ shA ri'i bu de ltar slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi slob pa yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi 'byung pa yin no/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du/ byang chub sems dpa' 
170b1(mdo 'grel): de shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi slob pa lags/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi 'byung pa lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po thabs mi mkhas pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
170b2(mdo 'grel): pa la rtog par byed/ mngon par zhen par byed/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rtog par byed/ mngon par zhen par byed/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rtog par byed/ mngon par zhen par byed/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la rtog par byed/ mngon par
170b3(mdo 'grel): zhen yang? byed/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rtog par byed/ mngon par zhen par byed/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la rtog par byed/ mngon par zhen par byed/ de bzhin du bsam gtan dang/ tshad med pa dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la rtog
170b4(mdo 'grel): par byed/ mngon par zhen par byed/ dran par nye bar gzhag pa dang/ yang dag par spong pa dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang/ dbang po rnams dang/ stobs rnams dang/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang/ lam la rtog par byed/ mngon par zhen par byed/ de bzhin gshegS
170b5(mdo 'grel): pa'i stobs bcu dang/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la rtog par byed/ mngon par zhen par byed pa nas/ chos thams cad dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la rtog par
170b6(mdo 'grel): byed/ mngon par zhen par byed do/ /shA ri'i bu rnam grangs nges na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mi slob pa yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du mi 'byung ba yin no zhes bya ba ni de nyid kyi rtog pa drug pa
170b7(mdo 'grel): 'phags pa'i lam la mi gnas pa'i rnam par rtog pa yin no// //gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar bslabs pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur
171a1(mdo 'grel): ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob ba ji lta bu lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe shes rab kyi pha rol
171a2(mdo 'grel): tu phyin pa de mi dmigs shing yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ba de ltar slob na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur/ de bzhin du bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa
171a3(mdo 'grel): dang/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bzod? pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar mi dmigs/ yang dag par rjes su mi thong? ba de ltar byang chub sems
171a4(mdo 'grel): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob na/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
171a5(mdo 'grel): pa dang/ de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa ni/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni de nyid kyi rtog pa bdun pa la dmigs pa la rtog pa yin no// //shA ri'i bus gsol pa/
171a6(mdo 'grel): bcom ldan 'das gang mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyi rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung ba lags/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir bdag mi dmigs shing mi mthong ngo/ /de bzhin du shin tu rnam par dag
171a7(mdo 'grel): pa'i phyir/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du mi dmigs shing mi mthong ngo zhes bya ba ni de nyid kyi rtog pa brgyad pa bdag la sogs par rtog pa yin no// //shA ri'i bu rnam par dag pa ni skye ba med pa ma byung ba mngon par 'du byed pa med
171b1(mdo 'grel): pa'o zhes bya ba ni de nyid kyi rtog pa dgu pa rnam par dag pa skye ba la sogs pa'i rnam par rtog pa yin no// //'di dag ni gzung pa'i rtog pa dang po yin no// //de thabs mi mkhas pas gzugs la rtog cing mngon par zhen pa yin/
171b2(mdo 'grel): rnam par shes pa'i bar la rtog cing mngon par zhen pa yin no zhes bya ba ni rtse mor gtogs pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang ldan pa dang po'i phung po'i don la rnam par rtog pa yin no// //mig la rtog cing mngon par zhen pa yin/ de bzhin du yid kyi bar dang
171b3(mdo 'grel): gzugs la rtog cing mngon par zhen pa yin/ de bzhin du chos kyi bar la rtog cing mngon par zhen pa yin zhes bya ba ni de nyid kyi rtog pa gnyis pa skye ba'i sgo'i don gyi rnam par rtog pa yin no// //ming dang gzugs dang/ mig gi rnam par shes pa'i
171b4(mdo 'grel): khams su rdog cing mngon par zhen pa yin/ de bzhin du yid dang chos dang yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i khams kyi bar la rtog cing mngon par zhen pa yin zhes bya ba ni de nyid kyi rtog pa gsum pa rigs kyi don la rnam par rtog pa yin no// //ma rig par rtog cing
171b5(mdo 'grel): mngon par zhen pa yin/ de bzhin du rga shing rtog cing mngon par zhen pa yin zhes bya ba'i bar du'o zhes bya ba ni de nyid kyi rtog pa bzhi pa skye ba'i don la rnam par rtog pa yin no// //de nang stong pa nyid dang/ phyi stong pa nyid dang/ phyi //pha rol tu phyin pa drug la rtog cing mngon par zhen pa yin
171b6(mdo 'grel): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la rtog cing mngon par zhen pa yin zhes bya ba ni de nyid kyi rtog pa lnga pa stong pa nyid kyi don la rnam par rtog pa yin no// //pha rol tu phyin pa drug la rtog cing mngon par zhen pa yin zhes bya ba ni de nyid kyi rtog
171b7(mdo 'grel): pa drug pa pha rol tu phyin pa'i don la rnam par rtog pa yin no// //byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la rtog cing mngon par zhen pa yin zhes bya ba ni/ de nyid kyi rtog pa bdun pa mthong ba'i lam la rnam par rtog pa yin no// //
172a1(mdo 'grel): de bsam gtan dang/ mngon par shes pa rnams dang/ tshad med pa rnams dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la rtog cing/ mngon par zhen pa yin zhes bya ba ni/ de nyid kyi rtog pa brgyad pa'i bsgom pa'i laM? la rnam par rtogs pa yin no//
172a2(mdo 'grel): de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcur rtog cing mngon par zhen pa yin/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la rtog cing mngon par zhen pa yin zhes bya ba ni de nyid kyi rtog pa dgu pa mi slob pa'i lam la rtog pa yin no// //'di dag ni gzung ba'i rtog
172a3(mdo 'grel): pa gnyis pa yin no// //shA ri'i bu bdag nye bar mi dmigs/ de bzhin du sems can dang/ srog dang/ gsol ba dang/ skyes bu dang/ gang zag dang/ shed las skyes dang/ shed bu dang/ byed pa po dang/ rig pa po dang/ shes pa po dang/
172a4(mdo 'grel): mthong pa po mi dmigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir bdag med cing mi dmigs zhes bya ba ni bzod par gtogs pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang ldan pa las/ rtog pa dang po bdag dang dbang can la rnam par rtog pa'o// //shA ri'i bu
172a5(mdo 'grel): gzugs nye bar mi dmigs zhes bya ba nas/ rnam par shes pa'i bar du nye bar mi dmigs zhes bya ba ni de nyid kyi rtog pa gnyis pa bdag gcig bu ? rnam par rtog pa yin no/ /shA ri'i bu mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin du yid kyi bar dang gzugs mi dmigs chos
172a6(mdo 'grel): kyi bar du mi dmigs so/ /zhes bya ba ni de nyid kyi rtog pa gsum pa rgyu'i bdag nyid la rnam par rtog pa yin no// //shA ri'i bu mig dang/ gzugs dang/ mig gi rnam par shes pa mi dmigs so/ /yid dang chos dang yid kyi rnam par shes
172a7(mdo 'grel): pa'i bar mi dmigs so zhes bya ba ni de nyid kyi rtog pa bzhi pa ltab po? la sogs pa'i bdag tu rnam par rtog pa yin no// //shA ri'i bu rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba mi dmigs so/ /gzugs med pa'i khams kyi bar du mi dmigs so zhes bya ba ni de
172b1(mdo 'grel): nyid kyi rtog pa lnga pa kun nas nyon mongs pa'i rten gyi bdag tu rnam par rtog pa yin no// //bsam gtan dang po mi dmigs so/ /gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i bar du mi dmigs so zhes bya ba ni de nyid kyi rtog pa drug pa 'dod chags dang bral pa'i
172b2(mdo 'grel): rten gyi bdag tu rnam par rtog pa yin no// //'phags pa'i bden pa rnams mi dmigs so zhes bya ba ni de nyid kyi rtog pa bdun pa mthong ba'i rten gyi bdag tu rnam par rtog pa yin no// don byas pa'i
172b3(mdo 'grel): rten gyi rnam par rtog pa yin no/ /'di dag ni par 'jug pa dgu mi dmigs so zhes bya ba ni de nyid kyi rtog pa brgyad bsgom pa'i rten gyi bdag tu rnam par rtog pa yin no// //stobs bcu mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du mi dmigs so/ /ji ltar mi dmigs shes na/
172b4(mdo 'grel): bdag nyid du'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bdag shin tu rnam par dag pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba ni de nyid kyi rtog pa dgu pa don byas pa'i rten gyi rnam par rtog pa yin no/ /'di dag ni 'dzin pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang po yin no// //de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor
172b5(mdo 'grel): gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das la la zhig 'di skad du 'dri zhing ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
172b6(mdo 'grel): nyid thob par 'gyur ram zhes mchin/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ ci sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol
172b7(mdo 'grel): tu phyin dang/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi bar la bslabs shing/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ 
173a1(mdo 'grel): sgyu ma'i skyes bu 'di sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar la bslabs shing/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur bas/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ma zhes mchin/ bcom ldan 'das de skad du
173a2(mdo 'grel): 'dri ba de la ji skad du bstan par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de lta bas na de khyod nyid la dris/ khyod kyis ji ltar bzod pa de ltar lung ston cig/ ces bya ba ni 'dzin pa'i rtog pa gnyis pa spyir bstan pa yin no// //rab 'byor de ji
173a3(mdo 'grel): snyam du sems/ gzugs kyang gzhan la/ sgyu ma'ang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa yang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ltar ma lags so
173a4(mdo 'grel): zhes bya ba ni chos kyi mchog tu gtogs pa'i rnam par rtog pa dang ldan pa rtog pa dang po yin no// //bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ mig kyang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam
173a5(mdo 'grel): rna ba dang/ sna dang/ lce dang/ lus dang/ yid kyang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ gzugs kyang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ sgra dang/ dri dang/ ro dang/ reg dang/ chos kyang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig
173a6(mdo 'grel): yin snyam mam/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so zhes bya ba ni de nyid kyi rtog pa gnyis pa skye mched du btags pa la rnam par rtog pa yin no// //bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du
173a7(mdo 'grel): sems/ mig dang/ gzugs dang/ mig gi rnam par shes pa yang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ rna ba dang/ sgra dang/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang/ sna dang/ dri dang/ sna'i rnam par shes pa dang/ lce dang/ ro dang/ lce'i rnam par
173b1(mdo 'grel): shes pa dang/ lus dang/ reg bya dang/ lus kyi rnam par shes dang/ yid dang chos dang/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa yang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das
173b2(mdo 'grel): kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang/ lce'i 'dus nye reg pa dang/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang/ yid kyi
173b3(mdo 'grel): 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yang
173b4(mdo 'grel): gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis grong? ba dang/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang/ yid kyi 'dus
173b5(mdo 'grel): te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba yang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ sa'i khams kyang gzhan la sgyu ma yang
173b6(mdo 'grel): gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sa'i khams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ sa'i khams nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang sa'i khams so/ /bcom ldan 'das chu'i khams kyang
173b7(mdo 'grel): gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ chu'i khams nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang chu'i khams so/ /bcom ldan 'das me'i khams kyang gzhan ma lags so/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ me'i khams nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid
174a1(mdo 'grel): kyang me'i khams so/ /bcom ldan 'das rlung gi khams nyid kyang gzhan ma lags/ /sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ rlung gi khams nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang rlung gi khams so/ /bcom ldan 'das nam mkha' i khams kyang
174a2(mdo 'grel): gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ nam mkha' i khams nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang nam mkha' i khams so/ /bcom ldan 'das rnam par shes pa'i khams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ rnam par shes pa'i khamS
174a3(mdo 'grel): nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'i khams so zhes bya ba ni nyid kyi rtog pa gsum pa khams su btags pa la rnam par rtog pa yin no// //bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma yang gzhan
174a4(mdo 'grel): la rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ma rig pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ ma rig pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang ma rig pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das
174a5(mdo 'grel): 'du byed kyang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ 'du byed nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang 'du byed do/ /bcom ldan 'das rnam par shes pa yang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ rnam par shes pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang rnam par
174a6(mdo 'grel): shes pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das ming dang gzugs kyang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ ming dang gzugs nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang ming dang gzugs so/ /bcom ldan 'das skye mched drug kyang gzhan pa sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ skye
174a7(mdo 'grel): mched drug nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang skye mched drug go/ bcom ldan 'das reg pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ reg pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang reg pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das tshor ba yang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan
174b1(mdo 'grel): ma lags te/ tshor ba nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang tshor ba'o/ /bcom ldan 'das sred pa yang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ sred pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang sred pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das len pa yang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ len pa
174b2(mdo 'grel): nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang len pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das srid pa yang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ srid pa nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang srid pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das skye ba yang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ skye ba nyid kyang sgyu ma/
174b3(mdo 'grel): sgyu ma nyid kyang skye ba'o/ /bcom ldan 'das rgya shi yang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ rga shi nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang rga shi lags so zhes bya ba ni/ de nyid kyi rtog pa bzhi pa rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba btags pa la rnam par rtog pa yin no// //
174b4(mdo 'grel): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi bar yang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/ /zhes bya ba ni de nyid kyi rtog pa lnga pa rnam par
174b5(mdo 'grel): byang bar btags pa la rnam par rtog pa yin no// //bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa yang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ rab
174b6(mdo 'grel): 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcoM ldan 'das stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa yang gzhan la/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags so zhes bya ba ni de nyid kyi rtog pa drug pa mthong ba'i lam du btags pa la rnam par rtog pa yin no// //bcom ldan
174b7(mdo 'grel): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ bsam gtan dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa yang gzhan la/ /sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ rab 'byor gyis gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so zhes bya ba ni de
175a1(mdo 'grel): nyid kyi rtog pa bdun pa sgom pa'i lam du btags pa la rnam par rtog pa yin no// //bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ stong pa nyid thams cad kyang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam lam?
175a2(mdo 'grel): rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so zhes bya ba ni de nyid kyi rtog pa brgyad pa khyad par gyi lam du btags pa la rnam par rtog pa yin no// //bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ de bzhin gshegs
175a3(mdo 'grel): pa'i stobs bcu dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar yang gzhan la sgyu ma yang gzhan zhig snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub kyang gzhan la sgyu
175a4(mdo 'grel): ma yang gzhan zhig yin snyam mam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das gzugs kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ gzugs nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang gzugs so/ /bcom ldan 'das tshor ba yang
175a5(mdo 'grel): gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ tshor ba nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang tshor ba'o/ /bcom ldan 'das 'du shes kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ 'du shes nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang 'du shes so/ /bcom ldan 'das
175a6(mdo 'grel): 'du byed rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ 'du byed rnams nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang 'du byed rnams so/ /bcom ldan 'das rnam par shes pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ rnam par shes pa nyid kyang
175a7(mdo 'grel): sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang rnam par shes pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das mig kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags/ bcom ldan 'das gzugs kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags/ bcom ldan 'das mig gi rnam par shes pa yang
175b1(mdo 'grel): gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags/ bcom ldan 'das mig gi 'dus te reg pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags/ bcom ldan 'das mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis skyes pa'i tshor ba bde ba 'am/ sdug bsngal ba 'am/ bde ba
175b2(mdo 'grel): yang ma yin sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags/ bcom ldan 'das rna ba dang/ sna dang/ lce dang/ lus kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags/ bcom ldan 'das yid kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma
175b3(mdo 'grel): yang gzhan ma lags/ bcom ldan 'das chos kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags/ bcom ldan 'das yid kyi rnam par shes pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags/ bcom ldan 'das yid kyi 'dus te reg pa yang
175b4(mdo 'grel): gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags/ bcom ldan 'das yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis skyes pa'i tshor ba bde pa 'am/ sdug bsngal pa 'am/ bde ba yang ma yin/ sdug bsngal ba yang ma yin pa yang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang
175b5(mdo 'grel): gzhan ma lags/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams nyid sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid byang chub kyi
175b6(mdo 'grel): phyogs kyi chos rnams so/ /bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad nyid sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcom
175b7(mdo 'grel): brgyad do/ /bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyang gzhan ma lags/ sgyu ma yang gzhan ma lags te/ byang chub nyid kyang sgyu ma/ sgyu ma nyid kyang byang chub bo/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ ci sgyu ma la skye ba 'am/
176a1(mdo 'grel): 'gag pa yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma la kun nas nyon mongs pa'am/ rnam par byang ba yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom
176a2(mdo 'grel): ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ gang la skye ba med cing 'gag pa med pa dang/ kun nas nyon mongs pa med cing rnam par byang ba med pa de/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob par 'gyur ram/?
176a3(mdo 'grel): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la slob bar 'gyur ram/ tshad med pa dang/ bsam gtan dang/ gzugs
176a4(mdo 'grel): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la slob par 'gyur ram/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang/ mngon par shes pa dang/ stobs bcu dang/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa la slob par
176a5(mdo 'grel): 'gyur ram/ thams cad shes pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ lam gyi rnam pa shes pa nyid dam/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal
176a6(mdo 'grel): pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po 'di dag la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya bar 'du shes pa dang/ kun shes pa dang/ gdags? pa dang/ tha snyad du bya ba yin nam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de lta ma
176a7(mdo 'grel): lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ 'du shes pa dang/ kun shes pa dang/ gdags pa dang/ tha snyad tsam gyi nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po skye ba 'am/ 'gag pa 'am/ kun nas nyon mongs pa 'am/ rnam
176b1(mdo 'grel): par byang ba dmigs par 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ gang la 'du shes med cing kun shes pa med pa dang/ gdags pa med pa dang/ tha snyad med pa dang/ ming
176b2(mdo 'grel): med pa dang/ ming du gdags pa med pa dang/ lus med pa dang/ lus kyi las med pa dang/ ngag med pa dang/ ngag gi las med pa dang/ yid med pa dang/ yid kyi las med pa dang/ skye ba med pa dang/ 'gag pa med pa dang/ kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang/ rnam
176b3(mdo 'grel): par byang ba med pa de/ ci shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan 'das
176b4(mdo 'grel): kyis bka' stsal ba/ rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur ro/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
176b5(mdo 'grel): de ltar lags na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sgyu ma'i skyes bus bslabs pa ltar bla na med pha yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bslab par bgyi'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcoM ldan 'das 'di nyid sgyu ma'i skyes bur
176b6(mdo 'grel): rig par bgyi ste/ 'di lta ste/ nye bar len pa'i phung po lnga po rnams so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ ci phung po lnga po 'di dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar
176b7(mdo 'grel): 'gyur ram/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i po lnga po rnams ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin no/ /de po lnga po rnams ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin no/ /de bzhin du phung po lnga ni rmi lam lta bu'o/ /rmi lam yang dngos po med 
177a1(mdo 'grel): pa'i rang bzhin lags te/ dmigs su ma mchis so/ /de bzhin du phung po lnga po dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin gyis dmigs su ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ sgra brnyan lta bu dang/ mig yong
177a2(mdo 'grel): lta bu dang/ sprul? pa lta bu dang/ gzugs brnyan lta bu'i phung po lnga po de dag shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la bslabs shing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur ram/ gsal ba/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mi 'gyur ro/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom
177a3(mdo 'grel): ldan 'das 'di ltar rmi lam ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin te/ sgra brnyan ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i rang bzhin no/ /de bzhin du mig yong? dang/ sprul pa dang/ gzugs brnyan ni dngos po ma mchis pa'i ngos? bzhin te/ dmigs su ma mchis so/ /de bzhin du phung po lnga
177a4(mdo 'grel): po ni dngos po med pa'i rang bzhin gyis na dmigs su ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar gzugs ni sgyu ma lta bu'o/ /tshor ba ni sgyu ma lta bu'o/ /'du shes ni sgyu ma lta bu'o/ /'du byed rnams ni sgyu ma lta bu'o/ /rnam par shes pa ni sgyu ma lta bu'o/ /rnam
177a5(mdo 'grel): par shes pa gang yin pa de yang dbang po drug dang phung po lnga'o/ /de dag kyang nang stong pa nyid kyis mi dmigs so/ /phyi stong pa nyid kyis mi dmigs pa nas/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyis mi dmigs so/ /bcom ldan 'das gal te de skad du
177a6(mdo 'grel): bshad pa na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang zhig mi zhum/ kun tu mi zhum/ 'gyod par mi 'gyur/ mi dngang/ kun tu mi skrag/ kun tu skrag pas zin par mi 'gyur na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni thams cad shes pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar
177a7(mdo 'grel): 'gyur/ lam shes pa nyid du nges par 'byung bar 'gyur te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rjes su 'thob par 'gyur bar rig par bya'o zhes bya ba ni dgu pa mi slob pa'i lam du btags pa'i rnam par rtog pa ste 'dzin rtog gnyis pa'o// //de nas ?
177b1(mdo 'grel): dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa la gsar du zhugs pas bstan pa 'di thos nas zhum zhing kun tu zhum la 'gyod de/ dbang ba dang/ kun tu skrag po dang/
177b2(mdo 'grel): kun tu skrag pas zin par mi 'gyur lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa na/ thabs mi mkhas pa dang/ dge ba'i
177b3(mdo 'grel): bshes gnyen gyi lag tu song bar ma gyur na ni dngang zhing kun tu skrag pas zin par 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das gang la spyod pas mi dngang/ kun tu mi skrag/ kun tu skrag pas zin par mi 'gyur ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
177b4(mdo 'grel): la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs mkhas pa de gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad
177b5(mdo 'grel): mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar so sor rtog kyang de mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar so sor rtog kyang de mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
177b6(mdo 'grel): dang ldan pa'i sems kyis 'du shes mi rtag ces bya bar so sor rtog kyang de mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis 'du byed rnams mi rtag ces bya bar so sor rtog kyang de mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang
177b7(mdo 'grel): ldan pa'i sems kyis rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar so sor rtog kyang de mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas par rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor
178a1(mdo 'grel): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya bar rtog? kyang de mi dmigs so rnan? pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ du
178a2(mdo 'grel): byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal zhes bya bar so sor rtog kyang de mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis gzugs stong zhes bya bar rtog/
178a3(mdo 'grel): gzugs bdag med ces bya ba dang/ gzugs zhi zhes bya ba dang/ gzugs dben zhes bya ba dang/ gzugs stong pa zhes bya ba dang/ gzugs mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang/ gzugs smon pa med ces bya bar so sor rtog kyang de mi dmigs so/ /rnam pa thams
178a4(mdo 'grel): cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya bar so sor rtog kyang de mi dmigs so/ /rnam par shes pa bdag med ces bya ba dang/ rnam par shes pa zhi zhes bya ba dang/
178a5(mdo 'grel): rnam par shes dben zhes bya ba dang/ rnam par shes pa stong zhes bya ba dang/ rnam par shes pa mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang/ rnam par shes pa smon pa med ces bya bar so sor rtog kyang de mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems
178a6(mdo 'grel): dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyi shes par kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa yin par rig pa bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod
178a7(mdo 'grel): pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pas mi dmigs pa'i tshul du chos ston pa gang yin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
178b1(mdo 'grel): yid la byed pa can de dag nyid kyi mchog tu 'dzin pa med pa nyid gang yin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa can de dag nyid kyi bzod pa dang/
178b2(mdo 'grel): 'dod pa dang so sor rtog pa gang yin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa can de dag nyid kyi de mi 'dor ba gang yin pa 'di na byang chub sems dpa' 
178b3(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' chen po'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa can de dag nyid kyi nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa 'am/ mi dge ba'i chos gzhan gyi skabs mi 'byed pa gang
178b4(mdo 'grel): yin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ ming dang/ kun tu mi skrag/ kun tu skrag pas
178b5(mdo 'grel): zin par mi 'gyur ro// //bam po bcu gnyis pa/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen ba nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas rnam
178b6(mdo 'grel): pa 'di ltar rab tu rtog ste/ gzugs kyi stong pa nyid kyis gzugs stong ba ma yin gyi/ gzugs nyid stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid nyid gzugs so/ /tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyis tshor ba stong pa ma yin gyi/ tshor ba nyid stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid nyid tshor ba'o/ /
178b7(mdo 'grel): 'du shes kyi stong pa nyid kyis 'du shes stong pa ma yin gyi/ 'du shes nyid stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid nyid 'du shes so/ /'du byed rnams kyi stong pa nyid kyis 'du byed rnams stong pa ma yin gyi/ 'du byed rnams nyid stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid nyid 'du byed
179a1(mdo 'grel): rnams so/ /rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis rnam par shes pa stong la ma yin gyi/ rnam par shes pa nyid stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid nyid rnam par shes pa'o/ /mig gi stong pa nyid kyis mig stong pa ma yin gyi/ mig nyid
