179a2(mdo 'grel): stong pa nyid do/ /stong pa nyid nyid mig go/ rna ba'i stong pa nyid kyis rna ba stong pa ma yin gyi/ rna ba nyid stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid nyid rna ba'o/ /sna'i stong pa nyid kyis sna stong pa ma yin gyi/ sna nyid stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid nyid sna'o/ /lce'i stong pa nyid kyis
179a3(mdo 'grel): lce stong pa ma yin gyi/ lce nyid stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid nyid lce'o/ /lus kyis stong pa nyid kyis lus stong pa ma yin gyi/ lus nyid stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid nyid lus so/ /yid kyi stong pa nyid kyis yid stong pa ma yin gyi/ yid nyid
179a4(mdo 'grel): stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid nyid yid ngo/ /gzugs kyi stong pa nyid kyis gzugs stong pa ma yin gyi/ gzugs nyid stong pa nyid/ sbyong ba nyid nyid gzugs so/ /sgra'i stong pa nyid kyis sgra stong pa ma yin gyi/ sgra nyid sdod pa nyid/ stong pa nyid nyid sgra'o/ /dri'i stong
179a5(mdo 'grel): pa nyid kyis dri stong pa ma yin gyi/ dri nyid stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid nyid dri'o/ /ro'i stong pa nyid kyis ro stong pa ma yin gyi/ ro nyid stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid nyid ro'o/ /reg gi stong pa nyid kyis reg? stong pa ma yin gyi/ reg nyid stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid nyid
179a6(mdo 'grel): reg go/ chos kyi stong pa nyid kyis chos stong pa ma yin gyi/ chos nyid stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid nyid chos so/ /mig gi rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis mig gi rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ mig gi rnam par shes pa nyid stong pa nyid/
179a7(mdo 'grel): stong pa nyid nyid mig gi rnam par shes pa'o/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis rna ba'i rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa nyid stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid nyid rna ba'i rnam par shes pa'o/ /sna'i rnam par shes pa'i stong ba
179b1(mdo 'grel): nyid kyis sna'i rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ sna'i rnaM par shes pa nyid stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid nyid sna'i rnam par shes pa'o/ /lce'i rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid kyis lce'i rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin te/ lce'i rnam par shes pa nyid stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid
179b2(mdo 'grel): nyid lce'i rnam par shes pa'o/ /lus kyi rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid kyis lus kyi rnam par shes pa stong pama yin gyi/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa nyid stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid nyid lus kyi rnam par shes pa'o/ /yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i stong pa nyid
179b3(mdo 'grel): kyis yid kyi rnam par shes pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa nyid stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid nyid yid kyi rnam par shes pa'o/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid kyis mig gi 'dus te reg pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ mig gi 'dus te
179b4(mdo 'grel): reg pa nyid stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid nyid mig gi 'dus te reg pa'o/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid kyis rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa nyid stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid nyid rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'o/ /sna'i
179b5(mdo 'grel): 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid kyis sna'i 'dus te reg ba'i stong pa ma yin gyi/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa nyid stong pa nyid /stong pa nyid nyid sna'i 'dus te reg pa'o/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid kyis lce'i 'dus te reg pa stong pa ma yin gyi lce'i
179b6(mdo 'grel): 'dus te reg pa nyid stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid nyid lce'i 'dus te reg pa'o/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid kyis lus kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid nyid lus kyi 'dus te rig
179b7(mdo 'grel): pa'o/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i stong pa nyid kyis yid kyi 'dus te reg pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa nyid stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid nyid yid kyis 'dus te reg pa'o/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyis mig 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa nyid ma yin gyi/ mig? gi 'dus? te
180a1(mdo 'grel): reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid nyid mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyis rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong ba ma yin gyi
180a2(mdo 'grel): rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid nyid rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o/ /sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyis sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa ma yin gyi sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i
180a3(mdo 'grel): rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid nyid sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o/ /lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyis lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stod pa ma yin gyi/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshong ba/
180a4(mdo 'grel): nyid stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid nyid lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o/ /lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshong ba'i stong pa nyid kyis lus gyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa ma yin gyi/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid
180a5(mdo 'grel): stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid nyid lus kyi 'dus re reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o/ /yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'i stong pa nyid kyis yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba stong pa ma yin gyi/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nyid stong pa
180a6(mdo 'grel): nyid/ stong pa nyid nyid yid kyi 'dus nye reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba'o/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i bar gyi stong pa nyid kyis dran pa nye bar gzhag pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa nyid stong pa nyid/ stong pa nyid nyid dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'o//
180a7(mdo 'grel): yang dag par stong ba dang/ rgyu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang/ dbang po dang/ /stobs rnams kyang de bzhin te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i bar gyi stong pa nyid kyis sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa stong pa ma yin gyi/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid stong ba nyid/
180b1(mdo 'grel): stong pa nyid nyid sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'o/ /rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la slong pa ni skrag par mi 'gyur
180b2(mdo 'grel): kun tu skrag par mi 'gyur/ kun tu skrag pa dang ldan par mi 'gyur ro zhes bya ba ni yongs su 'dzin pa dang po thabs la mkhas pas yongs su zin pa yin no// //rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gang dag gis yongs su bzung bas shes
180b3(mdo 'grel): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bstan pa thos nas mi da dang/ kun tu mi skrag kun tu skrag pa dang ldan par mi 'gyur ba byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang
180b4(mdo 'grel): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni gang de la gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyis
180b5(mdo 'grel): 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi par? yongs su bsdong ba'i dug pa dang/ tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad
180b6(mdo 'grel): mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsdor mi 'jug pa ste/ rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems
180b7(mdo 'grel): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni/ gang de la gzugs sdug bsngal zhes bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang/ gzugs bdag med ces bya ba dang/ zhi zhes bya ba dang/ bden zhes bya ba dang/ stong zhes bya ba dang/ 
181a1(mdo 'grel): mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang/ smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su?
181a2(mdo 'grel): bsdor mi 'jug pa dang/ gang de la tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang/ rnam par shes pa bdag med ces bya ba dang/ zhi zhes bya ba dang/ dpen zhes bya ba dang/
181a3(mdo 'grel): stong zhes bya ba dang/ mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang/ smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad kyang rnam par thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi
181a4(mdo 'grel): sar yongs su bsdor mi 'jug pa ste/ rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni gang de la mig mi
181a5(mdo 'grel): rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang/ sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang/ bdag med ces bya ba dang/ zhi zhes bya ba dang/ dben zhes bya ba dang/ stong zhes bya ba dang/ mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang/ smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs
181a6(mdo 'grel): pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar bsdor mi 'jug pa dang/ gang de la rna ba dang/ sna dang/ lce dang/ lus dang/ ming mi rtag
181a7(mdo 'grel): ces bya ba dang/ sdug bsngal ces bya ba dang/ bdag med ces bya ba dang/ /zhi zhes bya ba dang/ dben zhes bya ba dang/ stong zhes bya ba dang/ mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang/ smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba de
181b1(mdo 'grel): dag thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsdor mi 'jug pa ste/ rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan
181b2(mdo 'grel): yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni gang de gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang/ sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang/ bdag med ces bya ba dang/ zhe zhes bya ba dang/ dben zhes bya ba dang/
181b3(mdo 'grel): stong zhes bya ba dang/ mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang/ smon pa med ces bya bar re mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsdor mi
181b4(mdo 'grel): 'jug pa dang/ sgra dang/ dri dang/ ro dang/ reg dang/ chos mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang/ sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang/ bdag med ces bya ba dang/ zhi zhes bya ba dang/ dpen zhes bya ba dang/ stong zhes bya ba dang/ mtshan ma med
181b5(mdo 'grel): ces bya ba dang/ smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsdor mi 'jug pa ste/ rab 'byor 'di ni
181b6(mdo 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni gang de la mig gi rnam par shes pa dang/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa dang
181b7(mdo 'grel): mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang/ sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang/ bdag med ces bya ba dang/ zhi zhes bya ba dang/ dben zhes bya ba dang/ stong zhes bya ba dang/ mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang
182a1(mdo 'grel): smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtoD par nyan thos kyis 'am rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsdor mi 'dug pa dang/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang/ rna ba'i
182a2(mdo 'grel): 'dus te reg pa dang/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang/ sna'i rnam par shes pa dang/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang/ sna'i 'dus ta dag pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang/ lce'i rnam par shes pa dang/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang/ lce'i 'dus ta reg pa'i rkyen
182a3(mdo 'grel): gyis tshor ba dang/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshar ba dang/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa dang/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dang/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi? rtag ces bya bar de
182a4(mdo 'grel): mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang/ sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang/ bdag med ces bya ba dang/ zhi zhes bya ba dang/ dben zhes bya ba dang/ stong zhes bya ba dang/ mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang/ smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston
182a5(mdo 'grel): cing/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsdor mi 'jug pa ste/ /rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du
182a6(mdo 'grel): rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni gang de la byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi bar du mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang/ sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang/ bdag med ces
182a7(mdo 'grel): bya ba dang/ zhi zhes bya ba dang/ dpen zhes bya ba dang/ stong zhes bya ba dang/ mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang/ smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston cing/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
182b1(mdo 'grel): ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsdor mi 'jug pa dang/ yang dag par spong ba dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang/ dbang po dang/ stongs? dang/ byang chub kyi yan lag dang/ 'phags pa'i lam yin lag brgya dang mi rtag ces
182b2(mdo 'grel): bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang/ sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang/ bdag med ces bya ba dang/ zhi zhes bya ba dang/ dben zhes bya ba dang/ stong zhes bya ba dang/ mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang/ smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul kyis chos ston?
182b3(mdo 'grel): cing/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsdor mi 'jug pa dang/ bsam gtan dang/ tshad med pa dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms pas 'jug pa dang/ mngon
182b4(mdo 'grel): par shes pa rnams mi rtag ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar du mi rtag ces bya bar de mi
182b5(mdo 'grel): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston pa dang/ sdug bsngal zhes bya ba dang/ bdag med ces bya ba dang/ zhi zhes bya ba dang/ dben zhes bya ba dang/ stong zhes bya ba dang/ mtshan ma med ces bya ba dang/ smon pa med ces bya bar de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston
182b6(mdo 'grel): cing/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag thams cad kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma gtogs par nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su bsngor mi 'jug pa'o/ /rab 'byor 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen du
182b7(mdo 'grel): rig par bya ste/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen des yongs su zin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di? bstan pa thos na/ ming dang/ kun tu mi skrag/ kun tu skrag pa dang ldan par mi 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor gyis
183a1(mdo 'grel): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di thos nas da'ang zhing kun tu skrag pa kun tu skrag pa dang ldan par
183a2(mdo 'grel): 'gyur ba thabs mi mkhas par 'gyur ba dang/ sdig pa'i grogs pa'i lag tu sor bar 'gyur ba ji lta bu zhig lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen bpo shes rab kyi pha rol tu byin pa la
183a3(mdo 'grel): spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yin 'khyad? pa dang bral pas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom zhing dmigs te/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa des kyang rlom sems su byed pa dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i yid la byad pa dang
183a4(mdo 'grel): bral bas bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu byin pa sgom zhing dmigs te/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa des kyang ? sems su byed pa dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i yid la byed pa dang bral bas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stom? zhing dmigs te/
183a5(mdo 'grel): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa des kyang? rlom sems su byed pa dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i yid la byed pa dang bral bas bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin bsgom zhing dmigs te/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa des kyang rlom sems su byed pa dang/ rnam pa thams
183a6(mdo 'grel): cad mkhyen pa'i yid la byed par 'bral bas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom zhing dmigs te/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa des kyang rlom sems su byed pa dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i yid la byed pa dang bral bas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa
183a7(mdo 'grel): sgom zhing dmigs te/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa des kyang rlom sems su byed pa de lta bu ni/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mi mkhas par rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang
183b1(mdo 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dang bral bas gzugs nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ gzugs phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ gzugs phyin pa
183b2(mdo 'grel): stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byang/ gzugs dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la byed pa dang bral bas tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar
183b3(mdo 'grel): yid la byed pa dang/ rnam par shes pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed pa dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yid la byed pa dang bral bas rnam par shes pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed cing dngos bo med pa'i ngo bo nyid kyi bar
183b4(mdo 'grel): de yang dmigs te/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis? stong pa nyid de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /mig nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ mig phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ mig phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ mig dngos po med pa'i ngau nyid ? 'di
183b5(mdo 'grel): kyi bar zhe bya bar yid la byed cing stong pa nyid de yang dmigs te/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed pa dang/ rna ba dang/ sna dang/ lce dang/ lus dang/ yid? nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ yid phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la
183b6(mdo 'grel): byed/ yid phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ yid dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed/ ci nang stong pa nyid de yid dmigs te/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed pa dang/ gzugs
183b7(mdo 'grel): nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ gzugs phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ gzugs phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ gzugs dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed/ sgra dang/ dri dang/ ro dang/ reg dang/ chos
184a1(mdo 'grel): nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ chos kyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ chos phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ chos dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed cing nang stong? pa nyid ? yang dmigs te
184a2(mdo 'grel): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid des kyang nom? sems su byed pa dang/ migs rnam par shes pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ mig gi rnam par shes pa phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ mig gi rnam par shes pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid
184a3(mdo 'grel): la byed/ mig gi rnam par shes pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang/ sna'i rnam par shes pa dang/ lce'i rnam par shes pa dang/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa
184a4(mdo 'grel): nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed
184a5(mdo 'grel): cing nang stong pa nyid de yang dmigs te/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid nges kyang rlom sems su byed pa dang/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa
184a6(mdo 'grel): phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang/ yid kyi
184a7(mdo 'grel): 'dus te reg pa nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya
184b1(mdo 'grel): par yid la byed cing nang stong pa nyid de yang dmigs te/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis nang stong pa nyid des kyang rlom sems su byed pa dang/ mig gi rnam par shes pa nas yid kyi rnam par shes pa'i bar dang/ de bzhin du mig gi 'dus te reg pa nas yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i
184b2(mdo 'grel): bar dang/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ mig gi
184b3(mdo 'grel): 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang/ lus kyi 'dus te reg
184b4(mdo 'grel): pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba phyi stong pa zhes bya bar yid la byed/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba phyi nang stong pa zhes bya bar yid pa
184b5(mdo 'grel): byed/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed cing nang stong pa nyid de yang dmigs te/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid des kyang rlom sems su byed pa dang/ sa'i khams nang stong pa zhes
184b6(mdo 'grel): bya bar yid la byed/ sa'i khams kyi stong pa nyid ces bya bar yid la byed/ sa'i khams phyi nang stong pa nyid ces bya bar yid la byed sa'i khams dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar des bya bar yid la byed/ chu'i khams dang/ me'i khams dang/ rlung?
184b7(mdo 'grel): gi khams dang/ nam mkha' i khams dang/ rnam par shes pa'i khams nang stong nyid ces bya bar yid la byed/ rnam par shes pa'i khams phyi stong pa nyid ces bya bar yid la byed/ rnam par shes pa'i khams phyi nang stong pa nyid ces bya bar yid la byed/ rnam par 
185a1(mdo 'grel): shes pa'i khams dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed/ ma rig pa nang stong pa nyid ces bya bar yid la byed/ ma rig pa phyi stong pa nyid ces bya bar yid la byed/ ma rig pa phyi nang stong pa nyid ces bya bar yid la
185a2(mdo 'grel): byed/ ma rig pa dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed/ 'du byed dang/ rnam par shes pa dang/ ming dang gzugs dang/ skye mched drug dang/ reg pa dang/ tshor ba dang/ sred pa dang/ len pa dang/ srid pa dang/ skyeg dang/ rga
185a3(mdo 'grel): shi nang stong pa nyid ces bya bar yid la byed/ rga shi phyi stong pa nyid ces bya bar yid la byed/ rga shi phyi nang stong pa nyid ces bya bar yid la byed/ rga shi dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar zhes bya bar yid la byed cing nang stong pa nyid de yang dmigs te/
185a4(mdo 'grel): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stong pa nyid nges kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa dang bral
185a5(mdo 'grel): bas dran pa nye par gzhag pa rnams sgom zhing/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa de dag kyang dmigs te/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dran pa nye par gzhag pa de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /de bzhin du yang dag par spong pa dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi nang pa dang/ dbang
185a6(mdo 'grel): po dang/ stobs dang/ byang chub kyi yan lag dang/ lam dang/ bsam gtan dang/ tshad med pa dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang/ mngon par shes pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang/ so
185a7(mdo 'grel): so yang dag bar rig pa bzhi dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rnams sgom par byed cing sangs rgyas kyi chos de dag kyang dmigs te/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sangs rgyas kyi chos de dag gis kyang rlom sems su byed do/ /rab 'byor byang chub
185b1(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor ba'i tshe/ de ltar thab mi mkhas pas na/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa 'di thos nas/ dbang zhing kun tu skrag la/ skrag bas zin par 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor gyis gsol ba/ bcom ldan
185b2(mdo 'grel): 'das sdig pa'i grogs bos zin pa gang gis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bstan pa thos nas/ dbang zhing kun tu skrag la skrag pas zin bar 'gyur pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sdig pa'i grogs pos zin pa ji ltar 'gyur ba lags su/ bcom ldan
185b3(mdo 'grel): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs po na gang zhig shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar byed pa dang/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/
185b4(mdo 'grel): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang bral bar byed pa ste/ 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa ma yin/ 'di ni chos ma yin/ 'di ni 'dul ba ma yin gyis/ /'di gang slab par bya pa'i mi bya 'o/ mdo sde
185b5(mdo 'grel): 'di dag ni rang bzor byas pa ste/ 'di dag ni mnyan par mi bya'o/ /gzung bar mi bya'o/ /bcing bar mkhyi'o/ /klag par mi bya'o/ /kun chub par mi bya'o/ /tshul bzhin du yid la mi bya'o/ /'di dag ni gzhan la bstan par mi bya'o zhes zer ba 'di ni rab 'byor byang chub
185b6(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs po ni 'di ltar bdud sdig to can sangs rgyas kyi cha bar du byas pa dag byang chub sems dpa' sems
185b7(mdo 'grel): dpa' chen po'i drung du 'ongs nas/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug las zlog cing mos pa med par byed /rigs kyi bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pas? khyod la ci zhig bya/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol
186a1(mdo 'grel): tu phyin pa bsgoms pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgoms pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyi nang bsgoms pas khyod la ci zhig bya zhes ?
186a2(mdo 'grel): pa 'od do zhes bdud kyi las mi ston/ bdud kyi nyes pa mi ston pa 'di ni/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig pa bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig can dag sangs rgyas kyi cha byang du byas shing byang chub
186a3(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/ nyan thos dang ldan pa'i mdo dang/ dbyangs kyi bsnyad pa dang/ lung bstan pa dang/ tshigs su bcad pa dang/ ched du brjod pa dang/ gleng bzhi dang/ 'di ltar 'das pa dang/ skyes pa'i rabs dang/ shin tu rgyas pa
186a4(mdo 'grel): dang/ chos rmad du byung ba dang/ rtogs pa brjod pa dang/ gtan la bab bar bstan pa dag ston te/ 'grel lo/ /rnam par 'byed do/ /gsal bar byed do/ /yongs su ston to zhes bdud kyi las rnam pa 'di lta bu dag mi smra? mi ston pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' 
186a5(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig can dag sangs rgyas kyi cha byang du byas shing/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/ bde skad du rigs kyi bu khyod la ni byang chub kyi
186a6(mdo 'grel): sems cung zad kyang med/ khyod ni phyir mi ldog pa yang ma yin/ khyod kyis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya par yang mi nus so zhes zer pa 'di lta bu'i bdud kyi las dag mi smra mi ston pa 'di ni/ rab 'byor
186a7(mdo 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig can dag sangs rgyas kyi cha byang du byas shing/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/ 'di skad du rigs kyi
186b1(mdo 'grel): bu mig ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo/ /rna ba dang/ sna dang/ lce dang/ lus dang/ yid ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo/ /gzugs ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo/ /sgra dang/ dri dang/ ro dang/ reg dang/ chos ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo/ /mig gi rnam
186b2(mdo 'grel): par shes pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo/ /rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang/ sna'i rnam par shes pa dang/ lce'i rnam par shes pa dang/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang/ yin gyi rnam par shes pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa ni
186b3(mdo 'grel): bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo/ /rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo/ /mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rgyen gyis tshor? ba ni bdag gam
186b4(mdo 'grel): bdag gis stong ngo/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor pa dang/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang/ lce'i? 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen skyis tshor ba dang/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba ni
186b5(mdo 'grel): bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i par ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang
186b6(mdo 'grel): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni bdag gam bdag gis stong ngo/ /yang dag par spong pa dang/ rdzu 'phrul phyi rkang pa dang/ dbang po dang/ stobs dang/ byang chub kyi yan lag dang/ lam rnams nas
186b7(mdo 'grel): sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar ni bdag gam bdag gis stong na/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te yang ci zhig bya zhes zer ba de lta bu'i bdud kyis las dag mi smra mi ston pa 'di ni byang chub
187a1(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs po'i rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig can dag dang sangs rgyas kyi cha byang du byas shing/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/ 'di skad
187a2(mdo 'grel): du rigs kyi bu shar phyogs ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang/ byang chub sems dpa' dang/ nyan thos rnams kyis stong ste/ 'di la ni sangs rgyas zhes bya ba yang med do/ /byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba yang med do/ /nyan thos zhes bya ba yang med do//
187a3(mdo 'grel): lho dang/ nub dang/ byang dang/ byang shar dang/ shar lho dang/ lho nub dang/ nub byang dang/ 'og dang/ steng gi phyogs bcu kun kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang/ byang chub sems dpa' dang/ nyan thos rnams kyis stong ste/ 'di la ni sangs rgyas zhes
187a4(mdo 'grel): bya ba yang med do/ /byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya ba yang med do/ /nyan thos zhes bya ba yang med do/ /zhes zer ba de lta bu'i bdud kyi las dag mi smra mi ston pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o/ /
187a5(mdo 'grel): rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig can dag nyan thos kyi cha byang du byas shing byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba las zlog cing nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i
187a6(mdo 'grel): yid la bya bas gdams pa dang/ rjes su bstan pa de lta bu'i bdud kyi las dag mi smra mi ston pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig can dag mkhan po dang slob dpon
187a7(mdo 'grel): gyi tsha byang du byas shing/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/ byang chub sems dpa' i spyod pa las zlog? cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba las zlog ste/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams la sbyor ba dang
187b1(mdo 'grel): yang dag par spong pa rnams dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang/ dbang po rnams dang/ stobs rnams dang/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa la sbyor ba dang/ stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon? pa med pa'i bar gyi
187b2(mdo 'grel): chos rnams la sbyor zhing/ de ltar rigs kyi bu khyod kyis chos de dag yongs su sgoms la nyan thos kyis mngon du gyis shig /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyis khyod la ci zhig bya zhes zer ba de lta bul bdud kyi las dag mi smra mi ston pa 'di
187b3(mdo 'grel): ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig can dag pha dang ma'i cha byang du byas shing/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i drung du phyin te/ 'di skad du bla na med pa yang dag par
187b4(mdo 'grel): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pas khyod la ci zhig bya/ de'i don du ni bskal pa tshad med grangs med par 'khor bar 'khor zhing/ rkang lag dang mgo bcad pa tshad med pas nyon mongs par 'gyur gyis/ gang la rgyun tu zhugs
187b5(mdo 'grel): pa'i 'bras bu mngon du bya bar yod pa dang/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mngon du bya bar yod pa dang/ phyir mi 'ong pa'i 'bras bu mngon du bya bar yod pa dang/ dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu mngon du bya bar yod pa de la brtson par gyis shig ces zer
187b6(mdo 'grel): ba de lta bu'i bdud kyi las dag mi smra mi ston pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang bdud sdig can dge slong gi cha byad du byas shing/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
187b7(mdo 'grel): po'i drung du byin te/ gzugs mi rtag ces bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang/ gzugs sdug bsngal pa dang/ bdag med pa dang/ zhi ba dang/ dben pa dang/ stong pa dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul
188a1(mdo 'grel): gyis ston pa dang/ tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang/ rnam par shes pa sdug bsngal ba dang/ bdag med pa dang/ zhi ba dang/ dpen pa dang/
188a2(mdo 'grel): stobs? dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang/ mig mi rtag ces bya ba dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang/ bdag med pa dang/ zhi ba dang/ dben pa dang/ stong pa dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa zhes
188a3(mdo 'grel): bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang/ rna ba dang/ sna dang/ lce dang/ lus dang/ yid mi rtag ces bya ba dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang/ bdag med ba dag/ zhi ba dang/ dben pa dang/ stong pa dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa zhes bya par
188a4(mdo 'grel): dmigs ba'i tshul gyis ston pa dang/ gzugs mi rtag ces bya ba dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang/ bdag med pa dang/ zhi ba dang/ dben pa dang/ stong pa dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang/
188a5(mdo 'grel): sgra dang/ dri dang/ ro dang/ reg dang/ chos mi rtag ces bya ba dang/ sdug bsngal pa dang/ bdag med pa dang/ zhi pa dang/ dben pa dang/ stong pa dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa zhes bya ba rang migs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang/ mig gi 
188a6(mdo 'grel): rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya ba dang/ sdug bsngal pa dang/ bdag med pa dang/ zhi ba dang/ dben pa dang/ stong pa dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa zhes bya ba dang migs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang/ rna pa'i rnam par shes pa
188a7(mdo 'grel): dang/ sna'i rnam par shes pa dang/ lce'i rnam par shes pa dang/ lus kyi rnam par shes ba dang/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa mi rtag ces bya ba dang/ sdug bsngal pa dang/ bdag med pa dang/ zhi ba dang/ dben pa dang/ stong pa dang/
188b1(mdo 'grel): mtshan ma med pa dang/ skyon pa med pa zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa mi rtag ces bya ba dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang/ bdag med pa dang/ zhi ba dang/ dben pa dang/ stong pa dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med ba
188b2(mdo 'grel): zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stan pa dang/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa dang/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa dang/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa mi rtag ces bya ba dang/ sdug bsngal pa dang/ bdag med pa dang/ zhi pa dang/
188b3(mdo 'grel): dben pa dang/ stong pa dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang/ mig gi 'dus te reg ba'i rkyen gyis tshor pa mi rtag ces bya ba dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang/ bdag med pa dang/ zhi ba dang/ dben pa dang/ stong pa dang/
188b4(mdo 'grel): mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis stan pa dang/ rna ba'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis
188b5(mdo 'grel): tshor pa dang/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba mi rtag ces bya ba dang/ sdug bsngal pa dang/ bdag med pa dang/ zhi ba dang/ dben pa dang/ stong pa dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang/ dran pa nye bar gzhag
188b6(mdo 'grel): pa rnams kyi bar du mi rtag ces bya ba dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang/ bdag med pa bar/ zhi ba dang/ / /dben pa dang/ stong pa dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa zhe bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa dang/ de bzhin du
188b7(mdo 'grel): yang dag par spong ba dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang/ dbang po dang/ stobs dang/ byang chub kyi yan lag dang/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa rnams mi rtag ces bya ba dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar du mi rtag ces bya ba dang/
189a1(mdo 'grel): sdug bsngal ba dang/ bdag med pa dang/ zhi ba dang/ dben pa dang/ stong pa dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pa zhes bya bar dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ston pa de lta bu'i bdud kyi las dag mi smra mi ston pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
189a2(mdo 'grel): chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya'o/ /de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sdig pa'i grogs por rig par bya ste/ de ltar shes nas kyang yongs su spang bar bya'o zheS bya ba ni yongs su 'dzin pa gnyis pa dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su dzin pa yin no//
189a3(mdo 'grel): 'di dag gis ni nges par 'byed pa'i yan lag bzhi bstan to// //de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' zhes bgyi ba'i tshig 'di'i don gang lags/
189a4(mdo 'grel): de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad bka' stsal to/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' i tshig gi don ni tshig gi don med pa ste/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ byang chub la ni skye ba 'am/ yod pa nyid dam med pa nyid yod
189a5(mdo 'grel): pa 'am dmigs pa ma yin te/ rab 'byor de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' i tshig gi don med pa'o zhes bya ba ni rigs kyi rang gi ngo bo min no// //rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ nam mkha' la bya'i rjes med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub
189a6(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ rmi lam la gnas med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma la gnas med cing mi
189a7(mdo 'grel): dmigs so/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ smig rgyu la gnas med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so//
189b1(mdo 'grel): rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgra brnyan dang/ mig yor dang/ gzugs brnyan dang/ dri za'i grong khyer dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa la gnas med cid mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so zhes bya ba ni drod
189b2(mdo 'grel): du gtogs pa'i rten can yin no// //rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ yang dag pa'i mdza' la gnas med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin nyid la gnas
189b3(mdo 'grel): med cing mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' i tshig gis don med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang/ chos nyid dang/ chos kyi dbyings dang/ chos kyi gnas nyid dang/ chos nges pa nyid
189b4(mdo 'grel): dang/ dben pa nyid la gnas med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' i tshig gis don med cing mi dmigs so zhes bya ba ni rtse mor gtogs pa'i rten can yin no// //rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sbya ma'i skyes bu'i gzugs lag nas med
189b5(mdo 'grel): cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ bdu byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa la gnas
189b6(mdo 'grel): med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i mig la tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so
189b7(mdo 'grel): rab 'byor de bzhin du 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i rna ba dang/ sna dang/ lce dang/ lus dang/ yid la tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub
190a1(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i gzugs la tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/ /sgra dang/ dri dang/ ro dang/ reg dang/ chos la tshig gi don med cing mi
190a2(mdo 'grel): dmigs so/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i mig dang
190a3(mdo 'grel): gzugs dang/ mig gi rnam par shes pa la tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so//
190a4(mdo 'grel): rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ lnga ma'i skyes bu'i rna ba dang/ sgra dang/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa la tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub semS
190a5(mdo 'grel): dpa' i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i sna dang dri dang/ sna'i rnaM par shes pa la tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
190a6(mdo 'grel): phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i lce dang ro dang lce'i rnam par shes pa la tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems
190a7(mdo 'grel): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skye bu'i lus dang reg bya dang/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa la tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du
190b1(mdo 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i yid dang/ chos dang/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa la tshig gi don
190b2(mdo 'grel): med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' i tshig gi don md cing mi dmigs so/ /zhes bya ba ni bzod par gtogs pa'i rten bstan pa yin no// //
190b3(mdo 'grel): bam? po bcu gsum pa/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i nad stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
190b4(mdo 'grel): rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i phyi stong pa nyid la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/
190b5(mdo 'grel): sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i dngos go med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang
190b6(mdo 'grel): chub sems dpa' i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i skyes bu'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang/ yang dag par spong ba rnams dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang/ dbang po rnams dang/
190b7(mdo 'grel): stobs rnams dang/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang/ stobs bcu dang/ mi 'jigs pa dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang/ phung po rnams dang/ khams
191a1(mdo 'grel): rnams dang/ skye mched rnams dang/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rnams dang/ bsam gtan dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang
191a2(mdo 'grel): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so zhes bya ba ni chos kyi mchog tu gtogs pa'i rten bstan pa yin no// //rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper
191a3(mdo 'grel): na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi gzugs la tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub
191a4(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa la tshig gi don med
191a5(mdo 'grel): cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa
191a6(mdo 'grel): dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mig la tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' i tshig gi
191a7(mdo 'grel): don med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rna ba dang/ sna dang/ lce dang/ lus dang/ yid la tshig gi don med cing? mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor/
191b1(mdo 'grel): de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
191b2(mdo 'grel): sangs rgyas kyi nang stong pa nyid nas dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
191b3(mdo 'grel): la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/ rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu
191b4(mdo 'grel): dang/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi pa dag sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
191b5(mdo 'grel): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ 'dus ma byas kyi dbyings la 'dus byas kyi khwa ci gnas med cing mi dmigs so/ /'dus byas kyi khams la 'dus ma byas kyi dbyings kyi gnas med cing
191b6(mdo 'grel): mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so zhes bya ba ni mthong ba'i lam gyi rten bstan pa yin no// //rab 'byor
191b7(mdo 'grel): 'di lta ste dper na/ skye ba med pa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' i sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' i tshig gi don med cing mi dmis so/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste
192a1(mdo 'grel): dper na/ 'gag pa med ba dang/ mngon par 'du bya ba med pa dang/ 'byung ba med pa dang/ mi dmigs pa dang/ kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems
192a2(mdo 'grel): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ rnam par byang ba med pa'i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' 
192a3(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor gzugs kyi skye ba la tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/ /gzugs kyi 'gag pa dang/ mngon par
192a4(mdo 'grel): 'du byed pa dang/ 'byung ba dang/ dmigs pa dang/ kun nas nyon mongs pa dang/ rnam par byung ba la tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/ /tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa'i skye ba la tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs
192a5(mdo 'grel): so/ /rnam par shes pa'i 'gag pa dang/ mngon par 'du byed pa dang/ 'byung ba dang/ dmigs pa dang/ kun nas nyon mongs pa dang/ rnam par byang pa la tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/ /skye mched dang/ khams dang/ rten cing 'brel par
192a6(mdo 'grel): 'byung ba'i skye ba la tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/ /skye mched dang khams dang/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i ? byang ba'i bar la tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/ /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi bar dang/ bsam gtan rnams dang/ tshad med
192a7(mdo 'grel): mod pa rnams dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang/ mngon par shes pa rnams dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma
192b1(mdo 'grel): 'dres pa rnams kyi skye ba la tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres ba rnams kyi rnam par byang ba'i bar la tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor de zhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi
192b2(mdo 'grel): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ shin tu dben pa'i phyir gzugs la mtshan ma'i gnas med cing mi dmigs so/ /shin tu dben pa'i phyir tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang
192b3(mdo 'grel): 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa la mtshan ma'i gnas med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen por shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' i tshig gi don med cing mi
192b4(mdo 'grel): dmigs so/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ shin tu dben pa'i phyir/ skye mched dang/ khams dang/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba so so ba dang/ bsdus pa rnams la mtshan ma'i gnas med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems
192b5(mdo 'grel): dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor 'di lta te dper na/ dran pa nye bar gzhag par shin tu rnam par dag pa la gnas med cing mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin du
192b6(mdo 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/ /de bzhin du yang dag par spong ba dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi dang? pa dang/ dbang po dang/ stobs dang/ byang chub
192b7(mdo 'grel): kyi lan lag rnams dang/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang/ 'phags pa'i bden pa dang/ bsam gtan dang/ tshad med pa rnams dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang/ mngon par shes pa rnams dang/ de bzhin
193a1(mdo 'grel): gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'des pa rnams shin tu rnam par dag pa la gnas med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub
193a2(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sprod? pa'i byang chub sems dpa' i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ bdag med pa'i phyir bdag rnam par dag pa la gnas med? cing mi dmigs so//
193a3(mdo 'grel): sems can dang/ srog dang/ gso ba dang/ skyes bu dang/ gang zag dang/ shod las skyes dang/ shed bu dang/ byed pa po dang/ tshor ba po dang/ shes pa po dang/ mthong ba po med pa'i phyir/ sems can dang/ srog dang/ gso ba dang/ skyes bu dang/
193a4(mdo 'grel): gang zag dang/ shes las skyes dang/ shed bu dang/ byed pa po dang/ ched pa po dang/ shes pa po dang/ mthong ba po rnams kyi shin tu rnam par dag pa la gnas med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
193a5(mdo 'grel): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so zhes bya ba ni bsgom pa'i lam gyi ? yin no// //rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ nyi ma'o dkyil 'khor mngon par 'char pa'i
193a6(mdo 'grel): 'od la mun pa'i gnas med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so zhes bya ba ni gnyen
193a7(mdo 'grel): po'i phyogs kyi rten yin no// //rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ bskal pa'i me 'bar pa'i tshe/ 'du byed kyi rnam pa thams cad kyi gnas med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
193b1(mdo 'grel): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/ /zhes bya ba ni mi mthun pa'i phyogs spong pa'i rten yin no// //rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dag bcom pa yang
193b2(mdo 'grel): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims la tshul khrims ngan pa'i gnas med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' i tshig gi don med
193b3(mdo 'grel): cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin la rnam par g.yeng ba'i gnas med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems
193b4(mdo 'grel): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi shes rab la shes rab
193b5(mdo 'grel): 'chal ba'i gnas med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de
193b6(mdo 'grel): bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rnam par grol ba la rnam par mgrol ba'i gnas med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
193b7(mdo 'grel): pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa la rnam par
194a1(mdo 'grel): grol ba'i ye shes ma gzigs pa'i gnas med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' i tshig gi don
194a2(mdo 'grel): med cing mi dmigs so zhes bya ba ni gnyen po dang mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi rnam par rtog pa spong ba'i rten yin no// //rab 'byor 'di lta ste dber? na nyi ma dang zla pa'o 'od la gnas med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor de
194a3(mdo 'grel): bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' tshig gi don cing mi dmigs so zhes bya ba ni shes rab dang snying rje'i rten yin no// //rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/
194a4(mdo 'grel): nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas dang/ gza' dang/ skar ma dang/ nor bu rin po che dang/ slob? gi 'od la gnas med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i
194a5(mdo 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so zhes bya ba ni thun mong ma yin pa'i yon tan gyi rten yin no// //rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi 'od la gnas med cing mi dmigS
194a6(mdo 'grel): so/ /sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang/ 'thab bral dang/ dga' ldan dang/ 'phrul dga' dang/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang/ tshangs ris dang/ tshangs pa mdun na 'don dang/ tshangs 'khor dang/ tshangs chen dang/ 'og min gyi par
194a7(mdo 'grel): gyi lha rnams kyi 'od la gnas med cing mi dmigs so/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so zhes
194b1(mdo 'grel): bya ba ni gzhan gyi don gyi go rim gyi rten yin no// //rab 'byor 'di ltar ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi 'od la gnas phyin pa la spyod ril? byang chub sems dpa' i tshig gi don med
194b2(mdo 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod ril? byang chub sems dpa' i tshig gi don med cing mi dmigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di ltar byang chub gang yin pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' dang/ byang
194b3(mdo 'grel): chub sems dpa' i tshig gi don gang yin pa'i chos de dag kyang ldan pa ma yin ma ldan pa yang ma yin te/ gzugs med pa dang/ bstan du med pa dang/ thogs pa med pa/ mtshan nyid gcig pa/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid med pa'o/ /rab 'byor byang
194b4(mdo 'grel): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni/ rtog pa med pa dang/ rnam par rtog pa med pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi chaD pa med pa nyid dang/ yod par gyur pa ma yin pa nyid la bslab par bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
194b5(mdo 'grel): pos chos thams cad rtog par bya'o zhes bya ba ni ye shes lhun gyis grub par 'jug pa'i rten yin no// //'di dag gis ni sgrub pa'i rten bstan to/ /gsol pa bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad ni gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das
194b6(mdo 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ji ltar chos thams cad kyi yod par gyur pa ma yin pa nyid la bslab par bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad rtogs par bgyi/ bcom ldan
194b7(mdo 'grel): 'das kyis bka' stsal? pa/ rab 'byor chos thams cad ces bya ba ni/ dge ba dang/ /mi dge ba dang/ lung du ma bstan pa dang/ 'jig rten pa dang/ 'jig rten las 'das pa dang/ zag pa dang bcas pa dang /zag pa med pa dang/ 'dus
195a1(mdo 'grel): byas dang/ 'dus ma byas dang/ kha na mtho ba dang bcas pa dang/ kha na ma tho ba med pa dang/ thun mong pa dang/ thun mong ma yin pa dag ste/ rab 'byor de dag ni chos thams cad ces bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' 
195a2(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' chen pos kyang/ chos de dag thams cad kyi yod par gyur ba ma yin pa nyid la bslab par bya'o/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos 'di dag rtogs par bya'o zhes bya ba ni dmigs pa'i ? gi ngo bo yin no// //
195a3(mdo 'grel): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten pa'i chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'jig rten pa'i chos dge ba zhes bya ba ni par shes pa dang/ mar shes pa dang/ dge spyod du shes pa dang/ bram zer shes pa
195a4(mdo 'grel): dang/ rigs kyi rgan pa la rim grong byed pa dang/ sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang/ tshul khrims las byang ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang/ bsgoms pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bya ba'i dngos po dang/ nyams su blang
195a5(mdo 'grel): pa dang ldan pa'i dngos po dang/ thabs mkhas pa dang/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam rnams dang/ 'jig rten pa'i 'du shes dgu ste/ 'di lta ste/ rnam par bam pa'i 'du shes dang/ rnam par 'bus gzhigs pa'i 'du shes dang/ rnam par rnags
195a6(mdo 'grel): pa'i 'du shes dang/ rnam par dmar pa'i 'du shes dang/ rnam par bsngos pa pa'i 'du shes dang/ rnam par zos pa pa'i 'ud shes dang/ rnam par mthor ba pa'i 'du shes dang/ rus pa pa'i 'du shes dang/ rnam par tshig pa'i 'du shes dang/
195a7(mdo 'grel): 'jig rten pa'i bsam gtan bzhi dang/ tshad med pa bzhi dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang/ 'jig rten pa'i mngon par shes pa lnga dang/ 'jig rten pa'i rjes su dran pa bcu ste/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa dang/
195b1(mdo 'grel): chos rjes su dran pa dang/ dge 'dun rjes su dran pa dang/ tshul khrims rjes su dran pa dang/ gtong pa rjes su dran pa dang/ lha rjes su dran pa dang/ dbugs phyi nang du rgyu ba rjes su dran pa dang/ skyo ba rjes su dran pa dang/ 'chi pa rjes su dran pa dang/ lus kyi rnam pa rjes su
195b2(mdo 'grel): dran pa dag ste/ de dag ni 'jig rten pa'i dge ba'i chos zhes brjod do/ /gsol pa bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten pa'i mi dge ba'i chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dag ste/ 'di lta ste/ rab 'byor srog
195b3(mdo 'grel): gcod pa ni 'jig rten pa'i chos mi dge ba'o /ma byin par len pa dang/ 'dod pas log par g.yem pa dang/ rdzun du smra ba dang/ phra ma dang/ tshig rtsub mo dang/ dag 'khyal pa dang/ /brnab sems dang/ gnod sems dang/ log par lta ba dang/ khro
195b4(mdo 'grel): ba dang/ khon du 'dzin pa dang/ 'chab pa dang/ 'tshig pa dang/ rnam par 'tshe pa dang/ phrag dog dang/ ser sna dang/ nga rgyal dang/ log pa'i nga rgyal te/ rab 'byor de dag ni 'jig rten pa'i mo dge pa'i chos zhes brjod do/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das
195b5(mdo 'grel): lung du ma bstan pa chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ lung du ma bstan pa'i lus kyi las dang/ lung du ma bstan pa'i ngag gi las dang/ lung du ma bstan pa'i yid kyi las dang/ lung du ma bstan pa'i 'byung ba chen po bzhi dang
195b6(mdo 'grel): lung ma bstan pa'i dbang po lnga dang/ lung bum bstan pa'i skye mched drug dang/ lung ma bstan pa'i gzugs med pa dang/ lung du ma bstan pa'i phung po dang khams dang skye mched rnams dang/ rnam par smin pa thams cad de/ de dag ni lung du mi bstan pa'i
195b7(mdo 'grel): chos zhes brjod do/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten pa'i chos gang lags/ com ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor phung po lnga dang/ skye mched bcu gnyis dang/ khams bco brgyad dang/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang//
196a1(mdo 'grel): bsam gtan bzhi dang/ tshad med pa bzhi dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang/ mngon par shes pa lnga dang/ 'jig rten pa'i chos gzhan gang/ gzhan yang 'jig rten pI choS gang dag yin pa ste/ 'di dag ni 'jig rten
196a2(mdo 'grel): pa'i chos zhes bya'o/ /gsol pa bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyis rkang pa
196a3(mdo 'grel): dang/ dbang po lnga dang/ stobs lnga dang/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang rnam par thar pa'i sgo mtshan ma med pa dang/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo smin pa med pa dang mi
196a4(mdo 'grel): shes pa kun shes par byed pa'i dbang po dang/ kun shes pa'i dbang po dang/ kun shes pa dang ldan pa'i dbang po dang/ rtog pa dang bcas dpyod pa dang bcas pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ rtog pa med la dpyod pa tsam gyi ting nge 'dzin dang/ rtog pa med cing
196a5(mdo 'grel): dpyod pa mod pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ rig pa dang/ rnam par grol ba dang/ dran pa dang/ shes bzhin dang/ tshul bzhin yid la byed pa dang/ rnam par thar pa brgyad de/ brgyad gang zhe na/ gzugs can gzugs la lta ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa dang
196a6(mdo 'grel): po'o/ /nang gzugs med par 'du shes pas phyi rol gyi gzugs rnams la lta ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa gnyis pa'o/ /sdug par mos pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa gsum pa'o/ /gzugs kyi 'du shes pa las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs
196a7(mdo 'grel): pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing sna tshogs kyi 'du shes rnams yid la mi byed pas nam mkha' mdza' yas so zhes te/ nam mkha' mdza' yas skye mched nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa bzhi pa'o/ /de rnam pa thamS
196b1(mdo 'grel): cad du nam mkha' mdza' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te ni par shes pa mdza' yas so zhes rnam shes mdza' yas skye mched nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par mthar? pa lnga pa'o/ /de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mdza' yas skye? mtshad
196b2(mdo 'grel): pas yang dag par 'das te/ cung zad med do snyam pas ci yang med pa'i skye mched nye bar pa sgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa drug pa'o/ /de rnam pa thams cad du cung zad med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes med 'du shes
196b3(mdo 'grel): med min skye mched nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa bdun pa'o/ /de rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa nye bar bsgrub te gnas pa 'di ni rnaM par thar pa
196b4(mdo 'grel): brgyang? ste/ /'di dag ni rnaM pa thar pa brgyad/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ste/ dgu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/ 'dod pas dben sdig to mi dge ba'i chos kyi dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas/ dpyod pa dang/ bcas dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde
196b5(mdo 'grel): bcan? pas ma gtan dang po nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa dang/ de rnam par rtog pa dang rnam par dpyod pa nye bar zhi nas nang yongs su dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pas rnam par rtag pa med pa rnam par dpyod pa med pa ting nge 'dzin la skyes pa'i dga' 
196b6(mdo 'grel): ba dang bde ba can bsam gtan gnyis pa nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa dang/ de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral bas dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du btang snyoms su gnas te/ bde ba lus kyis myong la 'phags ba rnams kyis de la dran pa dang
196b7(mdo 'grel): ldan pa pa deb la rnam par dpyod pa btang snyoms pa'o zhes brjod pa dga' ba med pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa dang/ de bde ba yang spangs sdug bsngal pa yang spangs shing yid bde ba dang yid mi bde ba lnga nas kyang nub 
197a1(mdo 'grel): pas bde pa yang med/ sdug bsngal ba yang med/ btang snyoms dang dran pa yongs su dag pa'i bsam gtan bzhi pa nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa dang/ de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes pas yang dag par 'das
197a2(mdo 'grel): te thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la mi byed pas nam mkha' mdza' yas so snyam te/ nam mkha' mdza' yas skye mched nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa dang/ de rnam pa thaMs cad du nam pa'i mdza' yas skye mched las yang dag pad? 'das
197a3(mdo 'grel): te/ rnam par shes pa mdza' yas so snyam pas/ rnam shes mdza' yas skye mched nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa dang/ de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mdza' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ cung zad med do snyam pas cung zad med
197a4(mdo 'grel): pa'i skye mched nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa dang/ de rnam pa thams cad du cung zad med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa dang/ de rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes
197a5(mdo 'grel): med 'du shes med mad men? skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gag pa nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa ste/ 'di dag ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu'o/ /nang stong pa nyid dang/ phyi stong pa nyid dang/ phyi nang stong pa nyid dang
197a6(mdo 'grel): dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dag ste/ de dag ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i
197a7(mdo 'grel): chos zhes bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor phung po lnga dang/ skye mched bcu gnyis dang/ khams bco brgyad dang/ bsam gtan bzhi dang/ tshad
197b1(mdo 'grel): med pa bzhi dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi ste/ de dag ni zag pa dang bcas pa'i chos zhes bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das zag pa ma mchis pa'i chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor
197b2(mdo 'grel): dran pa nye par gzhag pa bzhi dang/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang/ dbang po lnga dang/ stobs lnga dang/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs
197b3(mdo 'grel): pa'i stobs bcu dang/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag ste/ de dag ni zag pa med pa'i chos zhes bya'o/ /bcom ldan 'das byas kyi chos gang lags/ bcom
197b4(mdo 'grel): ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'dus byas kyi ches zhes bya ba ni/ 'dod pa'i khams dang/ gzugs kyi khams dang/ gzugs med pa'i khams dang/ gzhan yang khams gsum par gtogs pa'i chos gang cung zad yod pa rnams dang/
197b5(mdo 'grel): byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag ste/ de dag ni 'dus byas kyi chos shes bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das 'dus ma byas kyi chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 
197b6(mdo 'grel): stsal ba/ rab 'byor gang la skye ba med cing 'jig pa med pa dang/ gnas pa las gzhan du 'gyur ba mi mngon pa ste/ 'di lta ste/ 'dod chags zad pa/ zhe sdang zad pa/ gti mug zad pa/ de bzhin nyid ma nor ba de bzhin nyid/ gzhan ma yin pa de
197b7(mdo 'grel): ? bzhin nyid/ chos nyid chos kyi dbyings/ chos gnas pa nyid dang chos des pa nyid? dang bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dbyings dang yang dag pa'i mdza' ste/ rab 'byor de dag ni 'dus ma byas kyi chos zhes bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das thun mong gi chos
198a1(mdo 'grel): gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor bsam gtan bzhi dang/ tshad med pa bzhi dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang/ mngon par shes pa lnga dag ste/ de dag ni byis pa so so skye bo rnams
198a2(mdo 'grel): dang thun mong gi chos zhes bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das thun mong ma lags pa'i chos gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa rab 'byor byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang/
198a3(mdo 'grel): mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar dag ste/ de dag ni thun mong ma yin pa'i chos zhes bya'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu
198a4(mdo 'grel): phyin pa la spyod pas ni rtog pa med cing rnam par rtog pa med pa'i phyir rang gi mtshan nyid kyis stong pa'i chos thams cad la chags par mi bya zhing/ chos thams cad gnyis su med pa'i tshul du rtogs par bya'o zhes bya ba ni sgrub pa'i dmigs pa bstan pa yin no/
198a5(mdo 'grel): de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba gang brjod pa ni'i? slad du/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
198a6(mdo 'grel): zhes bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la sems can gyi phung po chen po dang sems can gyi sde chen po'i mchog nyid du byed par 'gyur ba de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o/ /gsol pa/
198a7(mdo 'grel): bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gi mchog nyid du byed par 'gyur pa sems can gyi phung po chen po dang/ sems can gyi sde chen po de gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor sems can gyi
198b1(mdo 'grel): phung po chen po dang/ sems can gyi sde chen po zhes bya ba ni 'di lta ste/ rigs kyi sa dang/ brgyad pa dang/ rgyun tu zhugs pa dang/ lan cig phyir 'od pa dang/ phyir mi 'ong ba dang/ dgra bcom pa dang/ rang sangs rgyas dang/ sems bskyed pa'i byang chub sems
198b2(mdo 'grel): dpa' dang/ phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bar dag ste/ rab 'byor de ni sems can gyi phung po chen po dang/ sems can gyi sde chen po zhes bya ste/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ ni de'i phul byed par
198b3(mdo 'grel): 'gyur ro/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rdo rje lta bu'i sems bskyed do/ /sems can gyi phung po chen po dang sems can gyi sde? chen po'i mchog? tu 'gyur bar bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje lta bu'i sems bskyed pa gang lags/ bcom ldan 'das kyis
198b4(mdo 'grel): bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di snyam du bdag gis 'khor ba dpag tu med pa sems can thams cad kyi don du go cha bgos nas bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtang bar bya'o/ /bdag gis sems
198b5(mdo 'grel): can thams cad la sems mnyam pa nyid bskyed par bya'o/ /bdag gis sems can thams cad theg pa gsum gyis mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o/ /bdag gis sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzlas kyang sems can gang yang yongs su mya ngan
198b6(mdo 'grel): las 'das par 'gyur ba med de/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bdag gis chos thams cad skye ba med par rtogs par bya ba yin no/ /bdag gis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems ma 'dres pas pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyad par bya'o/ /bdag gis
198b7(mdo 'grel): chos thams cad rjes su rtogs pa thams cad du spong ba la bslab par bya'o/ /bdag gis chos rnams kyi tshul gcig tu mngon par sgrub pa rtogs par bya'o/ /bdag gis pha rol tu phyin pa mngon par sgrub pa rtogs par bya ba'i don du chos rnams la bslab par
199a1(mdo 'grel): bya'o/ /bdag gis byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun mngon par sgrub pa rtogs pa'i don du chos rnams la bslab par bya'o/ /bdag gis bsam gtan dang/ tshad med pa dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang/
199a2(mdo 'grel): mngon par shes pa mngon par sgrub pa rtogs par bya ba'i don du chos rnams la bslab par bya'o/ /bdag gis stobs bcu dang/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad mngon par sgrub pa
199a3(mdo 'grel): rtogs par bya ba'i don du chos rnams la bslab par bya'o snyam du sems bskyed de/ rab 'byor 'di ni gang la gnas nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams sems can gyi tshogs chen po dang/ sems can gyi sde chen po'i mchog
199a4(mdo 'grel): nyid du mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed par 'gyur ba rdo rje lta bu'i sems bskyed pa yin no/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos 'di snyam du sems can dmyal ba pa dang/ byol song gi skye gnas pa dang/ gshin
199a5(mdo 'grel): rje'i 'jig rten pa'i sems can ji snyed cig gis sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba nyams su myong bar 'gyur ba de dag gi don du sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba de bdag gis nyams su myong bar bya'o snyam du sems bskyed do/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
199a6(mdo 'grel): chen pos sems bskyed par bya ba ni/ 'di ltar ji srid du/ sems can de dag phung po lhag ma med par yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyi bar du bdag gis sems can re re'i don du yang bskal pa byi ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang por sems can dmyal
199a7(mdo 'grel): pa dang/ dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i sdug bsngal nyams su myong bar bya'o snyam zhing tshul 'di nyid kyi sems can thams cad phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'das kyi bar du sems?
199b1(mdo 'grel): can thams cad kyi don du sems can dmyal ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal de dag thams cad nyams su myong bar byas te/ de nas 'dod bdag gi ngon? du? dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed de/ bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas byang chub kyi tshogs bsags nas bla na
199b2(mdo 'grel): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o snyam du sems bskyed par bya ste/ rab 'byor 'di ni gang gis sems can gyi tshogs chen po dang/ sems can gyi sde chen po'i mchog nyid su byed par 'gyur pa rdo rje lta bu'i
199b3(mdo 'grel): sems bskyed pa yin no/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems bskyed pa gang gis sems can thams cad kyi mchog tu 'gyur bar bya ba rlabs po? che'i sems su bya'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
199b4(mdo 'grel): chen po'i sems rlabS po che ni 'di yin te/ sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar gzung nas 'dod chags kyi sems mi skyed/ zhe sdang gi sems mi skyed/ gti mug gi sems mi skyed/ gtso ba'i sems mi skyed/ nyan thos kyi sems dang/ rang sangs rgyas kyi
199b5(mdo 'grel): sems kyang mi skyed pa gang yin pa ste/ rab 'byor 'di ci gang gis sems can thams cad kyi mchog nyid du byed kyang nges rlom sems su mi byed pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems rlabs po che'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub semS
199b6(mdo 'grel): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ma sgul pa'i sems dang ldan par bya ste de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi sgul ba nyid ni bde yin te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa yid la byed cing de rlom sems su mi byed pa gang
199b7(mdo 'grel): yin pa ste/ rab 'byor 'di ni gang gis sems can thams cad kyi mchog nyid du 'gyur ba byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems sprul pa'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can thams
200a1(mdo 'grel): cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i sems bskyed par bya'o/ /de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i phan pa dang bde ba'i sems ni 'di yin te/ sems can thams cad skyob cing sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong
200a2(mdo 'grel): gang yin pa des kyang rlob sems su 'gyur ba med pa gang yin pa ste/ rab 'byor 'di ni gang la gnas na sems can gyi tshogs chen po dang/ sems can gyi sde chen po'i mchog tu de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byed par 'gyur pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 
200a3(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' chen po'i phan pa dang/ bde ba'i sems so/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni chos la dga' ba dang/ chos la kun dga' ba'i rnal 'byor la brtson par bya'o/ /de la chos gang zhe na/ chos thams
200a4(mdo 'grel): cad dbyer med pa gang yin pa ste/ 'di ni chos shes bya'o/ /de la chos la dga' ba gang zhe na/ chos la mngon par dga' ba gang yin pa ste/ 'di ni chos la dga' ba zhes bya'o/ /de la chos la kun dga' ba gang zhe na/ chos sgom zhing mang du byed pa gang
200a5(mdo 'grel): yin pa ste/ 'di ni chos la kun dga' ba zhes bya'o/ /de la chos la dga' ba dang/ kun dga' ba'i rnal 'byor la brtson pa gang zhe na/ mngon par sbyor ba ste/ 'di ni chos la dga' ba dang/ chos la kun dga' ba'i rnal 'byor la brtson pa zhes bya'o
200a6(mdo 'grel): rab 'byor de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas sems can gyi phung po chen po dang/ sems can gyi sde chen po'i mchog nyid du 'gyur par de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bya'o/ /rab 'byor
200a7(mdo 'grel): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas nang stong pa nyid la gnas/ dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la pa nyid ki bar la gnas te/ sems can gyi phung po chen po dang
