200b1(mdo 'grel): sems can gyi sde chen po'i mchog tu 'gyur bar mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams la gnas/ de bzhin gsheD
200b2(mdo 'grel): pa'i stobs bcu dang/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi rnams dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang/ byams pa chen po dang/ snying rje chen po dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la gnas te/ sems can gyi phung po chen po dang/ sems can gyi sde chen po'i
200b3(mdo 'grel): mchog tu 'gyur bar mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bya'o/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas/ nam mkha' ltar chags la med pas/ rnam
200b4(mdo 'grel): par grol zhing gos pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi bar la gnas te/ sems can gyi phung po chen po dang/ sems can gyi sde chen po'i mchog nyid du 'gyur bar mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis byas te/ rab 'byor de dag la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa' 
200b5(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pas/ chos 'di dag la gnas te/ sems can gyi tshogs chen po dang/ sems can gyi sde chen po'i mchog nyid du 'gyur bar bya ba yin no/ /des na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
200b6(mdo 'grel): zhes brjod do zhes bya ba ni/ sems can thams cad kyi mchog nyid du sems pa'i sems chen po nyid do/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das don gang gi slad du/ byang chub
200b7(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba de la bdag kyang spobs so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ shA ri'i bu/ don gang gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes brjod pa la khyod spobs par byos shig/ shA ri'i 
201a1(mdo 'grel): bus gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das bdag tu lta ba dang/ sems can du lta ba dang/ srog tu lta ba dang/ skye ba bor lta ba dang/ gso bar blta ba dang/ skyes bur lta ba dang/ gang zag dang/ shed las skyes dang/ shed bu dang/ byed pa po dang/
201a2(mdo 'grel): tshor ba po dang/ shes pa po dang/ mthong ba por lta ba dang/ chad par lta ba dang/ rtag par lta ba dang/ yod par lta ba dang/ med par lta ba dang/ phung por lta ba dang/ khams su lta ba dang/ skye mched du lta ba dang/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba lta ba dang
201a3(mdo 'grel): pha rol tu phyin par lta ba dang/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos su lta ba dang/ stobs dang/ mi 'jigs par lta ba dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa'i bar du lta ba dang/ sems can yongs su smin par lta ba dang/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyong bar lta
201a4(mdo 'grel): ba dang/ byang chub rnam par rtogs par lta ba dang/ sangs rgyas su lta ba dang/ chos su lta ba dang/ dge 'dun du lta ba dang/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar lta ba rnams te/ lta ba 'di dag thams cad rab tu spang ba'i slad du/ sems can rnams la chos
201a5(mdo 'grel): ston par bgyid kyang de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis bgyid de/ de'i slad du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi'o/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i
201a6(mdo 'grel): bu ci'i phyir ma byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos gzugs su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba nas/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i bang? lta bar 'gyur
201a7(mdo 'grel): pa yin/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing/ thabs mi mkhas pas gzugs su dmigs shing/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba bskyed do/ /tshor ba
201b1(mdo 'grel): dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba bskyed de bde bzhin du rgya cher skye mched dang/ khams dang/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung bar so so ba dang/ bsdus pa'i bar du dmigs shing
201b2(mdo 'grel): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba bskyed do/ /de bzhin du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams dang/ yang dag par spong ba rnams dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang/ dbang po rnams dang/ stobs rnams dang/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang/ 'phags
201b3(mdo 'grel): pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa dang/ pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang/ yi ge rnams dang/ bsam gtan rnams dang/ tshad med pa rnams dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams su dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba bskyed do/
201b4(mdo 'grel): rnam par thar pa dang/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang/ stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ ston pa med pa dang/ mngon par shes pa dang/ ting nge 'dzin dang/ gzungs kyi sgo dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang/
201b5(mdo 'grel): mi 'jigs pa dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres par dmigs shing dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba bskyed do/ /chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i bar du gnas shing/ dmigs pa'i tshul gyis lta ba bskyed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa rab
201b6(mdo 'grel): rab 'byor de'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzugs su lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes par lta bar 'gyur ba yin/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i bar du lta bar 'gyur pa
201b7(mdo 'grel): yin te/ de'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas/ lta ba'i rnam pa de dag spang ba'i phyir/ mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis chos ston to zhes bya ba ni spong ba chen po nyid do/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa
202a1(mdo 'grel): rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das don gang gi slad du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi ba de la bdag kyang spobs so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/
202a2(mdo 'grel): rab 'byor khyod kyis spobs pa bskyed cig/ rab 'byor gyis gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi sems mi mnyam pa dang/ mnyam pa'i sems nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma lags pa'i sems/ zag pa ma mchis shing
202a3(mdo 'grel): khams gsum du ma gtogs pa'i sems gang lags pa de la yang rang bzhin gyis stong pa'i slad du/ chags pa ma mchis pa de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi pa'i grangs su mchi'o/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na 'di ltar sems de
202a4(mdo 'grel): ni sems ma legs te/ des na de la chags pa ma mchis so/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi mnyam pa dang
202a5(mdo 'grel): mnyam pa nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa'i sems gang yin/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos ni sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye bar gzung ste/
202a6(mdo 'grel): chos 'ga' yang skye ba'am/ 'gag par yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ngo/ /'phel ba 'am/ 'grib pa 'am/ 'ong ba dang/ 'gro ba dang/ kun nas nyon mongs pa dang/ rnam par byang bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu
202a7(mdo 'grel): gang la skye ba med cing 'gag pa med pa dang/ 'phel ba med cing 'grib pa med pa dang/ 'ong ba med cing 'gro ba med? pa dang/ kun nas nyon mongs pa med cing rnam par byang ba med pa de la nyan thos kyi sems med do/ /rang sangs rgyas kyi sems med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ 'di ni
202b1(mdo 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa ste/ nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mongs ma yin pa'i sems so/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gang khyod kyis 'di skad du/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi
202b2(mdo 'grel): sems zag pa med pa khong du chung ba med pa'i sems de la yang chags pa med do zhes gang smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor rang bzhin gyis stong pa nyid kyi phyir gzugs chags pa med pa yin nam/ tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams
202b3(mdo 'grel): dang/ rnam par shes pa yang chags pa med pa yin nam/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar yang chags pa med pa yin nam/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de de bzhin te/ gzugs kyang chags pa med pa'o/ /tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/
202b4(mdo 'grel): 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa yang chags pa med pa'o/ /skye mched dang/ khams dang/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i bar yang chags pa med pa'o/ /bsam gtan dang/ tshad med pa dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa yang chags
202b5(mdo 'grel): pa med pa'o/ /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyi bar yang chags pa med pa'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar yang chags pa med pa'o/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar yang chags pa med pa'o/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan 
202b6(mdo 'grel): pa rab 'byor khyod kyis 'di skad du thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sems de yang zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med pa zhes bya ba gang smras ba/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyi sems kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su
202b7(mdo 'grel): ma gtogs pa yin nam/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sems dang/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad kyi sems kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag? pa med cing khongs su ma gtogs pa yin nam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa
203a1(mdo 'grel): shA ri'i bu de ni de bzhin te/ byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyi thugs kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do/ /nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi sems kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir
203a2(mdo 'grel): zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs kyang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do/ /smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de ltar yin na/ gzugs kyang rang bzhin stong pa
203a3(mdo 'grel): nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su ma gtogs pa yin nam/ tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su ma gtogs pa yin nam/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos
203a4(mdo 'grel): sum cu rtsa bdun dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su
203a5(mdo 'grel): chud pa med pa yin nam/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med pa yin nam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/ gzugs kyang
203a6(mdo 'grel): rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do/ /tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos
203a7(mdo 'grel): ma 'dres pa rnams kyi bar yang rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir zag pa med cing khongs su chud pa med do/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gang yang khyod kyis 'di skad du sems med pa'i phyir sems de la yang chags pa med do zhes smras pa/ tshe dang
203b1(mdo 'grel): ldan pa rab 'byor gzugs kyang gzugs med pa la chags pa med pa yin nam/ tshor ba yang tshor ba med pa la chags pa med pa yin nam/ 'du shes kyang 'du shes med pa la chags pa med pa yin nam/ 'du byed rnams kyang 'du byed med pa la
203b2(mdo 'grel): chags pa med pa yin nam/ rnam par shes pa yang rnam par shes pa med pa la chags pa med pa yin nam/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams kyang byang chub kyi phyogs chos rnams med pa la chags pa med pa yin nam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams
203b3(mdo 'grel): kyi bar yang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams med pa la chaD pa med pa yin nam rnaM pa thaMs cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid med pa la chags pa med pa yin nam/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/
203b4(mdo 'grel): tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzugs kyang gzugs med pa la chags pa med do/ /tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa yang/ rnam par shes pa med pa la chags pa med do/ /de bzhin du khams dang/ skye mched dang/ rten
203b5(mdo 'grel): cing 'brel par 'byung ba so so ba dang/ bsdus pa rnams dang/ bsam gtan dang/ tshad med pa dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang/ rnam par shes pa yang rnam par shes pa med pa la chags pa med do/ /pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ mngon par
203b6(mdo 'grel): shes pa dang/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos dang/ stobs dang/ mi 'jigs pa dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams med pa la chags pa med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i
203b7(mdo 'grel): bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni byang chub kyi sems mi mnyam pa dang mnyam pa'i sems nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa'i sems nges kyang chos thams
204a1(mdo 'grel): cad la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis rlom sems su 'gyur ba med mngon par chags par 'gyur ba med de/ de'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bya'o zhes bya ba ni rtogs pa chen po nyid ngo 'di dag
204a2(mdo 'grel): gis ni sgrub pa'i ched du bya ba bstan to// //de nas tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang pos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das don gang gi slad du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
204a3(mdo 'grel): zhes bgyi ba de la bdag kyang spobs so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ gang po khyod kyis spobs pa skyed cig/ gang pos gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni go cha chen po bgos pa'i sems can lags te/ bcom ldan 'das
204a4(mdo 'grel): de ni theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'i sems can lags la/ de ni theg pa chen por yang dag par gnas pa'i sems can lags te/ de'i slad du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po zhes bgyi'o/ /de nas tshe
204a5(mdo 'grel): dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus tshe dang ldan pa byams ma'i bu gang po la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa gang po ji tsam gyis na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos go cha chen po bgos zhes bya/ gang pos smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i
204a6(mdo 'grel): bu ? la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni byang chub kyi don du spyod pa na sems can nyung zad nyi tshe zhig gi don du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing sbyin pa yongs su gtong pa ma yin gyi/ sems can thams cad kyi don du sbyin
204a7(mdo 'grel): pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas nas sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo/ /de bzhin du byang chub kyi don du spyod pa na sems can nyi tshe ba zhig gi don du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu
204b1(mdo 'grel): phyin pa dang/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing sheS rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom pa ma yin gyi 'on kyang sems can thams cad kyi don du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
204b2(mdo 'grel): bsgom par byed do/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can 'di snyed cig ni phung po ma lus pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar bya'o/ /sems can 'di snyed cig ni yongs su mya ngan las bzla bar mi bya'o zhe 'am/
204b3(mdo 'grel): sems can 'di snyed cig ni byang chub tu dgod par bya'o/ /sems can 'di snyed cig ni dgod par mi bya'o zhes sems can yongs su bcad pas go cha mi gyon gyi/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can thams cad kyi don du go cha chen? po byon? to/
204b4(mdo 'grel): de 'di snyam du sems te/ bdag gis kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /sems can 'di dag kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyar bar bya'o/ /bdag gis kyang tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang/
204b5(mdo 'grel): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad kyang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyar bar bya'o/ /de bzhin du bdag gis kyang byang chub kyi
204b6(mdo 'grel): chos rnams dang/ bsam gtan dang/ tshad med pa dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bsgom par bya/ gzhan yang de dag la dgod par bya'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang/ so so yang dag par rig
204b7(mdo 'grel): pa bzhi dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la gnas par bya'o/ /sems can thams cad kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la sbyar bar bya'o zhes bya bar sems bskyed do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de tsam gyis na byang chub
205a1(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos zhes bya ba ni bsgrub pa'i rang gi ngo bo yin no/ //bam po bcu bzhi pa/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
205a2(mdo 'grel): dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sbyin pa gang yongs su gtong pa de dag rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas yongs su gtong ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing
205a3(mdo 'grel): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ste/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa
205a4(mdo 'grel): shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya pas sbyin pa yongs su gtong zhing/ nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sa
205a5(mdo 'grel): yid? la byed pa spong pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing sbyin pa yongs su brtang pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu
205a6(mdo 'grel): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sbyin pa gtong pa na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas chos de dag la bzod pa dang/ mos pa dang/ rtog pa 'di ni
205a7(mdo 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing/ sbyin pa yongs su gtong ba'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sheS
205b1(mdo 'grel): rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ brtson 'grus mi gtong ba 'di? byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing sbyin pa yongs su gtong pa'i brtson 'grus
205b2(mdo 'grel): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par tshe/ sbyin pa yongs su gtor ba na 'di ltar rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya
205b3(mdo 'grel): bas sems rtse gcig tu byed cing/ de la dmigs pa gcig pas nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa rnams kyi go mi 'byed pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing sbyin pa
205b4(mdo 'grel): yongs su gtong ba'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing sbyin pa yongs su btang ba'i tshe/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
205b5(mdo 'grel): nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas chos thams cad sgra mad? byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas te/ sbyin pa po yang mi dmigs/ len pa po yang mi dmigs/ sbyin par bya ba yang mi dmigs pa'o gang yin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
205b6(mdo 'grel): po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing sbyin pa yongs gtor ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha'o/ /tshe dang ldan par shA ri'i bu nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa 'di dang ldan pa'i yid la
205b7(mdo 'grel): bya bas pha rol tu phyin pa ded? pa la mtshan mar mi byed pa de'i ?/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i go cha chen po bgos? par shes par bya'o zhes bya ba ni sbyin ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug pa'i go cha
206a1(mdo 'grel): ste dang po'o// //tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas
206a2(mdo 'grel): sbyin pa gang yongs su gtong pa de dag sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi
206a3(mdo 'grel): pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing
206a4(mdo 'grel): nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas kyis la yang mos pa ni mi skyed na/ so so'i skye bo'i sa la lta smos kyang ci smos pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o//
206a5(mdo 'grel): tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing/ chos de dag la bzod pa dang/ mos pa dang/ rtog pa
206a6(mdo 'grel): 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
206a7(mdo 'grel): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing brtson 'grus nyams par mi byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu
206b1(mdo 'grel): phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing gnas pa'i tshe/ nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas kyi seMs
206b2(mdo 'grel): kyi go mi 'byed cing dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzoD pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba'i da ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bsam gtan
206b3(mdo 'grel): gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos thams cad sgyu mar byas pa'i
206b4(mdo 'grel): 'du shes nye bar gnas shing/ tshul khrims nges rlom sems su mi byed de/ rang bzhin stong pa nyid kyi phyir/ tshul khrims de yang mi dmigs shing/ dge ba'i rtsa ba nges sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzoD
206b5(mdo 'grel): pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sprod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul
206b6(mdo 'grel): khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad yongs su 'dzin te/ de'i phyir go cha chen po bgos zhes bya'o zhes bya ba ni tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug po'i go cha ste gnyis pa'o// //
206b7(mdo 'grel): tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas sbyin pa gtong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams? cad?
207a1(mdo 'grel): dang thun mong du byas shing/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzoD pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA
207a2(mdo 'grel): ri'i bu gzhan yang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing/ nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas 
207a3(mdo 'grel): tshul khrims yongs su bsrung zhing/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu
207a4(mdo 'grel): phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya
207a5(mdo 'grel): bas chos de dag la bzod pa dang mos pa dang/ rtog pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
207a6(mdo 'grel): dpa' chen po nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing/ brtson 'grus nyams par mi byed pa 'di ni/
207a7(mdo 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas
207b1(mdo 'grel): dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing sems rtse gcig tu byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la
207b2(mdo 'grel): spyod pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid
207b3(mdo 'grel): la bya bas bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing chos thams cad sgyu mar byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas te/ bzod pa des rlom sems su mi byed cing/ bzod pa mi dmigs pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin
207b4(mdo 'grel): pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad yongs su 'dzin te/ de'i phyir go cha chen po bgos
207b5(mdo 'grel): pa zhes bya'o zhes bya ba ni/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa drug pa'i go cha ste gsum pa'o// //tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing/ nyan thos dang/
207b6(mdo 'grel): rang sangs rgyas dang? ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas sbyin pa yongs su gtong zhing/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
207b7(mdo 'grel): pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus
208a1(mdo 'grel): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshul khrims bsrung zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can dang thun mong du byas te/
208a2(mdo 'grel): bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems
208a3(mdo 'grel): dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing/ chos de dag la de ltar bzod pa dang
208a4(mdo 'grel): mos pa dang/ rtog pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan 
208a5(mdo 'grel): thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing/ sems can thams cad kyi don du brtson 'grus nyams par mi byed
208a6(mdo 'grel): cing/ brtun mi nges pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
208a7(mdo 'grel): nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas sems rtse gcig tu byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu
208b1(mdo 'grel): phyin pa la spyod pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgom pa na nyan thos dang/ rang sangs
208b2(mdo 'grel): rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas chos thams cad la sgyu mar byas pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas te/ brtson 'grus des rlom sems su mi byed cing/ brtson 'grus de yang mi dmigs te/
208b3(mdo 'grel): dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol
208b4(mdo 'grel): tu phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad yongs su 'dzin te/ de'i phyir go cha chen po bgos zhes bya ba ni brtson 'grus kyi
208b5(mdo 'grel): pha rol tu phyin pa drug po'i go cha ste bzhi pa'o// //tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing/ nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i
208b6(mdo 'grel): yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas sbyin pa yongs su gtong zhing dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo
208b7(mdo 'grel): ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod? pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa
209a1(mdo 'grel): la spyod cing/ nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshul khrims bsrung zhing/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang
209a2(mdo 'grel): thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu
209a3(mdo 'grel): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing/ nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas bzod pa
209a4(mdo 'grel): yongs su bsgom ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa
209a5(mdo 'grel): la spyod pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan
209a6(mdo 'grel): pa'i yid la bya bas bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing/ brtson 'grus nyams par mi byed de/ de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni
209a7(mdo 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la
209b1(mdo 'grel): spyod cing/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas sems rtse gcig tu byed de/ de la dmigs pa cig pa'i phyir nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba rnams kyi go mi 'byed cing/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad
209b2(mdo 'grel): dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu
209b3(mdo 'grel): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom par byed na/ nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
209b4(mdo 'grel): nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pas/ chos thams cad sgyu ma'i rnam pa'i 'du shes nye bar gnas te/ bsam gtan des kyang rlom sems su mi byed cing bsam gtan de yang me dmigs te/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas
209b5(mdo 'grel): shing/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' 
209b6(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa ni/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug po thams cad yongs su 'dzin te/ de'i phyir go cha chen po bgos zhes bya'o zhes bya ba ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa drug po'i go cha ste lnga pa'o// //tshe dang
209b7(mdo 'grel): ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po/ /shes rab kyi pha rol tu byin pa la spyod cing/ /nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya
210a1(mdo 'grel): bas 'khor gsum yongs su dag pas sbyin pa yongs su gtong zhing/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/
210a2(mdo 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod ba'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing/
210a3(mdo 'grel): nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas tshul khrims yongs su bsrung zhing/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na
210a4(mdo 'grel): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod ba'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub
210a5(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing/ nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas/ chos de dag la de
210a6(mdo 'grel): ltar bzod pa mos shing rtog ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas shing/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i du gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing/ nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas ma
210b1(mdo 'grel): yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas brtson 'grus nyams par mi byed cing/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/
210b2(mdo 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing/
210b3(mdo 'grel): nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bsam yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas sems rtse gcig tu byed cing dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du byas te/ bla na med pa yang dag
210b4(mdo 'grel): par rtogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
210b5(mdo 'grel): chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgom par byed de/ de yang nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas dang ldan pa'i yid la byed bas ma yin gyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa
210b6(mdo 'grel): pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang/ chos thams cad la sgyu ma dang/ rmi lam dang/ mig yod dang/ brag cha dang/ gzugs brnyan dang/ srul ba'i 'du shes nye bar gnas par 'gyur pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang sems can thams cad dang thun mong du
210b7(mdo 'grel): byas shing/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu nam byang chub
211a1(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems kyis pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag dang/ sems can dang/ byang chub la mtshan mar mi byed/ mi dmigs pa de ltar na/ tshe dang
211a2(mdo 'grel): ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni/ go cha chen po bgos par 'gyur ba yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ltar na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu
211a3(mdo 'grel): byin pa re res gnas nas pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par byed pa yin no zhes bya ba ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa? drug po'i go cha ste drug pa'o// //tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
211a4(mdo 'grel): chen po bsam gtan rnams la snyoms par 'jug par byed kyang bsam gtan rnams kyi ro myang bar mi byed/ de dag gis 'phrog par yang mi gyur te/ de dag gi dbang gis skye ba yang ma yin/ de bzhin du tshad med pa dang/ gzugs med pa la snyoms
211a5(mdo 'grel): par 'jug par byed kyang de dag gi ro myang bar mi byed/ de dag gis 'phrog par yang mi 'gyur/ de dag gi dbang gis skye ba yang ma yin pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin
211a6(mdo 'grel): pa dang ldan par rig par bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang/ tshad med pa dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dag la stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med ba dang/ smon
211a7(mdo 'grel): pa med pa mthong bas gnas kyang yang dag pa'i mdza' mngon du byed pa ma yin pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i thabs mkhas pa'i go cha chen po ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu
211b1(mdo 'grel): de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa des na sems dpa' chen po zhes brjod do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ltar go cha chen po bgs pa la phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan
211b2(mdo 'grel): 'das rnams ched du brjod pa ched du brjod cing yongs su sgrogs pa mdzad de/ 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos pa 'di lta bu zhig sems can yongs su smin par byed do/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su
211b3(mdo 'grel): dag par byed do/ /rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rtse'o zhes sgra brjod pa mdzad cing dbyangs rjes su sgrog go zhes bya ba ni drug pa'i go cha'i mjug bsdu ba'o/ /go cha'i sgrub pa bstan zin to// //shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po mi btsam? gyis na/ byang
211b4(mdo 'grel): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la yang dag par 'jug pa dang/ theg pa chen po la 'jog par 'gyur ba yin/ gang bos smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
211b5(mdo 'grel): tu phyin pa la spyod cing 'dod pas dben sdig to mi dge ba'i chos kyi dben pa rtog pa dang bcas dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ /dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang/ bde ba can bsam gtan dang po nye par bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de bzhin du bsam gtan gnyis pa
211b6(mdo 'grel): dang/ gsum pa dang/ bzhi pa nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de bzhin du nam mkha' mdza' yas skye mched dang/ rnam shes mdza' yas skye mched dang/ ci yang med pa'i skye mched la snyoms dang 'jug
211b7(mdo 'grel): pa ste/ 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan dang gzugs med pa'o/ /gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa 'di dag gis sbyin pa'i pha rol tu
212a1(mdo 'grel): phyin pa la spyod pa na/ nam mkha' i rnam par dang/ rtags dang/ mtshan mas mnyam par 'jog cing ldang ba na dge ba'i rtsa ba de yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo par byed pa'i yin? byang chub sems dpa' 
212a2(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' chen po'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /de bzhin du tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang brjod par bya'o/ /shA ri'i bu
212a3(mdo 'grel): gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni// bsam gtan bzhi la mnyam par 'jog par byed/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la yang snyoms par 'jug par byed/ gang gi tshe
212a4(mdo 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan 'di dag dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa 'di dag gis gnas shing/ de bsam gtan dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa 'di dag la snyoms par 'jug pa dang
212a5(mdo 'grel): ldan pa na/ nam mkha' i rnam pa dang/ rtags dang/ mtshan ma yid la byed bas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing dge ba'i rtsa ba de dang gzhan yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pas/ sems can thams cad dang
212a6(mdo 'grel): thun mong du byas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar? byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /shA ri'i bu de bzhin? du byang chub sems dpa' sems
212a7(mdo 'grel): dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod? ? theg pa chen po la rab tu zhugs pa yin no/ /sems can thams cad yongs su smin par byed do/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang yongs su dag par byed do zhes bya ba ni bsam gtan dang/ /gzugs
212b1(mdo 'grel): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa la snyoms par 'jug pa dang ldang ba'i 'jug pa yin no// //shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas sems can thams cad
212b2(mdo 'grel): kyi nyon mongs pa rab tu spang pa'i phyir chos bstan par bya'o snyam pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya
212b3(mdo 'grel): bas bsam gtan dang/ tsher med pa dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag la mnyam par gzhog cing rnam par ldang yang 'di lta ste/ nyan thos sam/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sems sam/ sems bskyed pa gzhan gyi go mi 'byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub
212b4(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mchog tu 'dzin pa med pa'o/ /nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas bsam gtan dang/ tshad med pa dang/ gzugs
212b5(mdo 'grel): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gi gnas pa na 'di snyam ste/ sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs bzad par bya ba'i phyir chos ston to snyam du sems shing yid la byed pa de dag la 'dod pa dang/ bzod pa dang/ nye bar rtog pa dang/ rtogs pa dang/
212b6(mdo 'grel): nges par sems par byed pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas bsam gtan dang/ tshad
212b7(mdo 'grel): med pa dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag gis rnam par spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can thams cad kyi don dang/ phan pa dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi phyir/ brtson 'grus mi gtong ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems
213a1(mdo 'grel): dpa' chen po'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas bsam gtan dang/ gzugs mang pa la snyoms par 'jug
213a2(mdo 'grel): kyang/ mi dmigs pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya bas bsam gtan dang pa'i
213a3(mdo 'grel): yan lag dang/ bsam gtan gnyis pa dang/ gsum pa dang/ bzhi ba'i yan lag rnams la mi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang/ sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang/ bdag med pa'i rnam pa dang/ zhi ba'i rnam pa dang/ stong pa'i rnam pa dang/ mtshan ma med pa'i rnam
213a4(mdo 'grel): pa dang/ smon pa med pa'i rnam par rab tu rtogs kyang/ bsam gtan dang/ tshad med pa dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag mi dmigs shing de dag gis rlom sems su mi byed ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
213a5(mdo 'grel): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa'i theg pa chen po'o zhes bya ba ni pha rol tu phyin pa drug gi 'jug pa yin no// //tshe dang ldan pa
213a6(mdo 'grel): shA ri'i bu gzhan yang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni rnam pa thams cad du byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun bsgom pa dang/ rnam pa thams cad du rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa
213a7(mdo 'grel): dang/ smon pa med pa bsgom pa dang/ rnam pa thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang/ sangs rgyas kyi sgom? 'dres pa rnams sgom? par byed pa 'di ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA
213b1(mdo 'grel): ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'i zhes bya ba ni/ 'phags pa'i lam la 'jug pa'o// //tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byams pa dang ldan pa sems yongs
213b2(mdo 'grel): pa/ rgya chen por gyur pa mi gnyis pa/ tshad med pa/ kho na med pa/ 'gran zla med pa/ sgrim pa med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ thams cad du song pa shin tu bsgoms pas phyogs gcig gi 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha' i mthas gtugs pas thams cad
213b3(mdo 'grel): dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten khyab par byas shing/ nye bar bsgrubs nas gnas pa nas/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bar du khyab par byas shing nye bar bsgrubs nas gnas so/ /de snying rje dang ldan pa dang/ dga' ba dang ldan pa dang/ btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i
213b4(mdo 'grel): sems yangs pa/ rgya chen por gyur pa/ mi gnyis pa/ tshed med pa/ kho na med pa/ 'gran zla med pa/ sgrib pa med pa/ gnod pa med pa/ thams cad du song ba shin tu bsgoms pas phyogs gcig gi 'jig rten chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa nam mkha' mthas gtugs pa
213b5(mdo 'grel): thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'jig rten khyab par byas shing/ nye bar bsgrubs nas gnas pa nas/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi bar du khyab par byas shing nye bar bsgrubs nas gnas so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang nam byang chub sems dpa' 
213b6(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' chen po byams pa'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par 'jog cing bdag gis sems can thams cad yongs su bskyab par bya'o zhes de la gzhol bar byed/ snying rje'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par 'jog cing/ sems can rnams la snying rje ba dang/ snying
213b7(mdo 'grel): brtse ba la gzhol bar byed/ dga' ba'i ting 'dzin la mnyam par 'jog cing/ bdag nyid kyi sems can dga' bar bya'o zhes sems can rnams la gzhol bar byed/ btang snyoms kyi ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par 'jog cing/ sems can rnams zag pa
214a1(mdo 'grel): zad ba la rab tu gzhol bar byed de/ 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ched med pa rnams la sbyod pa'i sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang/
214a2(mdo 'grel): tshad med pa rnams kyi rnam pa dang/ rtags dang/ mtshan ma la mnyam par gzhog cing/ rnam pa ldan yang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du bsngo ba ma gtogs par nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar yongs su mi bsngo ba 'di ni/ byang chub
214a3(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mchog tu 'dzin pa med pa'o/ /nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan dang/ tshad med pa dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms
214a4(mdo 'grel): par 'jug pa de dag 'dres par rnam par spyod cing/ sa gnyis po nyan thos kyi sa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas kyi sar 'dod pa mi skyed kyi/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du bzod pa dang/ 'dod pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med
214a5(mdo 'grel): pa rnams la sbyong ba'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin ba'o/ /nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas mi dge ba'i chos rnams rab tu spang ba dang/ dge ba'i chos phun sum tshogs
214a6(mdo 'grel): par bya ba'i don du brtson 'grus mi gtong bas rnam par sbyod pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan
214a7(mdo 'grel): dang/ tshad med pa dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag la yang mnyam par 'jog la/ bsam gtan dang/ tshad med pa dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i dbang gis mi skye zhing/ de dag gi ro myong bar byed pa yang med
214b1(mdo 'grel): la/ de dag gis 'phrogs par yang mi 'gyur ba 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /nam byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i
214b2(mdo 'grel): yid la bya bas bsam gtan dang/ tshad med pa dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa de dag la yang mnyam par 'jog cing/ rnam par ldang ba dang/ de dag la mi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang/ sdug bsngal ba'i rnam pa dang/ bdag med pa'i rnam pa dang/ zhi ba'i rnam
214b3(mdo 'grel): pa dang/ stong pa'i rnam pa dang/ mtshan ma med pa'i rnam pa dang/ smon pa med pa'i rnam par rab tu rtog kyang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi skyon med par 'jug par mi byed pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i tshad med pa rnams la spyod pa'i
214b4(mdo 'grel): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o zhes bya ba ni tshad med pa la 'jug pa'o// //tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg
214b5(mdo 'grel): pa chen po ni nang stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin/ phyi stong pa nyid shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin pa dang/ phyi nang stong pa nyid dang/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du shes kyang dmigs pa'i tshul gyis ma yin
214b6(mdo 'grel): pa gan gyin pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni/ chos thams cad la sems rnam par
214b7(mdo 'grel): g.yeng ba med bar mnyam bar bzhag pa'i shes pa gang yin pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i
215a1(mdo 'grel): theg pa chen bo ni rtag ces bya bar shes pa mi 'jug/ mi rtag pa dang/ bde ba dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang/ bdag dang/ bdag med pa dang/ zhi ba dang/ ma zhi ba zhes bya ba dang/ stong pa dang/ mi stong pa dang/ mtshan ma
215a2(mdo 'grel): yod pa dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa yod pa dang/ smon pa med ces bya bar shes pa mi 'jug pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang
215a3(mdo 'grel): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni gang 'das pa'i dus la shes pa mi 'jug/ ma 'ongs pa dang/ da ltar gyi dus la shes pa 'jug par mi byed de/ de gsum po 'di gsum pa la mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shes pa mi
215a4(mdo 'grel): 'jug pa 'di ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shAri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'dod pa'i khams su shes pa mi
215a5(mdo 'grel): 'jug par mi byed/ gzugs dang gzugs med pa'i khams su shes pa 'jug par mi byed do/ /'dod pa dang/ gzugs dang/ gzugs med pa'i khams la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shes pa 'jug pa gang yin pa 'di ni/ byang chub sems
215a6(mdo 'grel): dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa chen po ni 'jig rten pa dang/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos dang/ zag pa dang bcas pa dang/ zag pa
215a7(mdo 'grel): med pa dang/ 'dus byas dang/ 'dus ma byas kyi chos la shes pa 'jug par mi byed de/ de 'jig rten pa dang/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos mi shes pa yang med/ zag pa dang bcas pa dang/ zag pa med pa dang/ 'dus byas dang/ 'dus ma
215b1(mdo 'grel): byas kyi chos rnams la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis shes pa mi 'jug pa 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i theg pa then po'o zhes bya ba ni mi dmigs pa la sbyor ba'i 'jug pa'o// //shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa gang po ci tsam gyis
215b2(mdo 'grel): na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la zhugs pa zhes bya/ gang pos smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la
215b3(mdo 'grel): 'dzeg kyang/ des sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs te/ sbyin pa po dang/ len pa po dang/ sbyin pa rnams mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dmigs su med pa de lta na tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la 'dzeg pa
215b4(mdo 'grel): zhes bya'o/ /de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu ph yin pa la 'dzeg kyang de mi dmigs pa dang/
215b5(mdo 'grel): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la mdzeg kyang des shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mi dmigs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' mi dmigs pa'i yid la byed pa mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis dmigs su med pa de ltar na tshe
215b6(mdo 'grel): dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la 'dzeg pa zhes bya'o zhes bya ba ni 'khor gsum yongs su dag pa la 'jug pa'o// //tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems
215b7(mdo 'grel): dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas sgom pa rnam par gzhig pa'i don du/ nyang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sgom par byed de/ shA ri'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems
216a1(mdo 'grel): dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la 'dzeg pa zhes bya'o/ /shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la byed pa ma 'dres pas sgom pa
216a2(mdo 'grel): rnam par gzhig pa'i don du stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin rnams de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sgom par byed de/ shA ri'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa
216a3(mdo 'grel): chen po la 'dzeg pa zhes bya'o/ shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i yid la bya ba ma 'dres pas sgom pa rnam par gzhig pa'i don du de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
216a4(mdo 'grel): bcu dang/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rnams de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis sgom par byed de/ shA ri'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa
216a5(mdo 'grel): chen po la 'jog pa zhes bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos byang chub sems dpa' dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ 'di ni tha snyad tsam de/ byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o zhes bya ba de ltar shes so/
216a6(mdo 'grel): gzugs su dmigs su med pa'i phyir 'di ni tha snyad tsam ste/ 'di lta ste/ gzugs zhes bya bar shes so/ /tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dagn/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa dmigs su med pa'i phyir 'di ni tha snyad tsam ste/ 'di lta ste/ rnam par 
216a7(mdo 'grel): shes pa zhes bya'o zhes bya bar de ltar shes so/ /skye mched dang/ khams dang/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ 'di ni tha snyad tsam ste/ 'di lta ste/ rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba zhes bya bar shes so/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dmigs su
216b1(mdo 'grel): med ba'i phyir 'di ni tha snyad tsam ste/ 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya bar da ltar shes so/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/
216b2(mdo 'grel): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba dmigs su med pa'i phyir 'di ni tha snyad tsam ste/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya bar shes so/ /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir 'di ni tha snyad tsam ste/ 'di lta ste/ byang chub kyi
216b3(mdo 'grel): phyogs kyi chos rnams zhes bya bar shes so/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dmigs su med pa'i phyir 'di ni tha snyad tsam ste/ 'di lta ste/ sangs
216b4(mdo 'grel): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad ces bya bar shes so/ /nang stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ 'di ni tha snyad tsam ste/ 'di lta ste nang stong pa nyid ces bya bar shes so/ /phyi stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir 'di ni tha snyad tsam ste/ 'di lta ste phyi stong ba nyid
216b5(mdo 'grel): ces bya bar shes so/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir 'di ni tha snyad tsam ste/ 'di lta ste/ phyi nang stong pa nyid ces bya bar shes so/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ 'di na tha snyad tsam ste/ 'di lta ste/ dngos po med pI
216b6(mdo 'grel): ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ces bya bar shes so/ /de bzhin nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir 'di ni tha snyad tsam ste/ 'de? lta ste/ de bzhin nyid ces bya bar shes so/ /ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang/ gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang/ chos nyid dang/ chos kyi dbyings
216b7(mdo 'grel): dang/ chos kyi gnas nyid dang/ chos des pa nyid dang/ yang dag pa'i mdza' dmigs su med pa'i phyir 'di ni tha snyad tsam ste/ 'di lta ste/ yang dag pa'i mdza' zhes bya bar shes so/ /byang chub dmigs su med pa'i phyir 'di ni tha snyad tsam ste/ 'di lta ste//
217a1(mdo 'grel): byang chub ces bya bar shes so/ /sangs rgyas dmigs su med pa'i phyir/ 'di ni tha snyad tsam ste/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas zhes bya bar yang dag par shes te/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ltar na/ byang chub sems
217a2(mdo 'grel): dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la 'dzeg pa zhes bya'o zhes bya ba ni ched du/ bya ba la 'jug pa'o// //tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu/ gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nye bar
217a3(mdo 'grel): bzung ste/ snying po byang chub la 'dug gi bar du mngon par shes pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir na sems can yongs su smin par byed do/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing du sangs rgyas gang la mchod pa dang bkur sti byar 'os
217a4(mdo 'grel): pa'i mchod pas/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bkur stir byed/ bla mar byed/ ri mor byed/ mchod par byed do/ /sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag las kyang chos nyan te/ 'di lta ste/ theg pa chen po 'di nyid do/ /de byang chub sems
217a5(mdo 'grel): dpa' i theg pa de la 'dzeg nas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro zhing/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par byed/ sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed kyang/ de la sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi 'du shes kyang mi 'byung/ sems
217a6(mdo 'grel): can gyi 'du shes kyang mi 'byung/ sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes kyang mi 'byung ngo/ /de gnyis su med pa'i sa la gnas shing/ /lus ji lta bus sems can rnams kyi don bya ba'i mthu yod pa de lta bu'i lus ched du bsams shing yongs su 'dzin to/ /
217a7(mdo 'grel): de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes thob par ma gyur gyi bar du theg pa chen po de dang nam yang mi 'bral lo zhes bya ba ni mngon par shes pa la 'jug pa'o// //des rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes thob nas
217b1(mdo 'grel): kyang/ nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang/ lha dang/ klu dang gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen po dang/ mi dang mi ma yin pa dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis bskor bar mi nus pa'i
217b2(mdo 'grel): chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ro/ /de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams yon
217b3(mdo 'grel): tan brjod pa mdzad cing/ 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po che ge mo zhes bya ba zhig theg pa chen po bla na med pa'i theg pa mchog la 'dzegs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob bo/ /rnam pa thams
217b4(mdo 'grel): cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar byed do zhes grags ba sgrogs cing dbyangs su brjod pa mdzad do/ /de bzhin du lho dang/ nub dang/ byang dang/ byang shar dang/ shar lho dang/ lho nub dang/ nub byang dang/ 'og dang/ steng gi phyogS
217b5(mdo 'grel): gyi phyogs re re zhing/ 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa rnams yon tan brjod pa mdzod cing/ 'jig rten gyi khams che ge mo zhig tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po che ge mo
217b6(mdo 'grel): zhes bya ba zhig theg pa chen po bla na med pa'i theg pa theg pa'i mchog la 'dzegs nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob bo/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob nas kyang chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar byed do zhes grags pa sgrog cing dbyangs su brjod pa
217b7(mdo 'grel): mdzad do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po theg pa chen po la 'dzegs pa zhes bya'o zhes bya ba ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la 'jug pa'o// //'di dag gis ni 'jug pa'i sgrub pa
218a1(mdo 'grel): bstan to/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis/ bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das go cha chen po bgos pa/ go cha chen po bgos pa zhes brjod pa/ bcom ldan 'das ji tsam gyis na byang chub
218a2(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos go cha chen po bgos zhes bgyi ba lags/ de skad ces gsol pa dang/ bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ /rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 
218a3(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' chen pos theg pa chen po'i go cha 'di lta ste/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha dang/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha dang/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha dang/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha dang/
218a4(mdo 'grel): bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i go cha bgos/ nang stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ phyi stong pa nyid kyi go cha bgos/ phyi nang stong pa nyid kyi go cha bags/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi
218a5(mdo 'grel): bar gyi go cha bgos/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa'i go cha bgos/ yang dag par spong ba dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang/ dbang pa dang/ stobs dang/ byang chub kyi yan lag dang/ lam gyi go cha bgos/ bsam gtan dang/ tshad med pa dang/ gzuD
218a6(mdo 'grel): med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa'i go cha bgos/ mngon par shes pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang/ mi 'jigs pa dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi go cha bgos/ rnam pa
218a7(mdo 'grel): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis go cha bgos /sangs rgyas kyi sku'i go cha bgos nas/ stong gsum gyi stob chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di snang pas rgyas par bkang ste/ shar phyogs kyis jig? rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bya ma snyed
218b1(mdo 'grel): snang pas rgyas par 'gengs so/ /lho phyogs dang/ nub phyogs dang/ byang phyogs dang/ byang shar dang/ shar lho dang/ lho nub dang/ nub byang dang/ 'og dang stong gi phyoD kyi phyogS re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed snang bas rgyas par
218b2(mdo 'grel): 'gangs so/ /stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam par 'gyur ba drug tu rab tu bskyod do/ /shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang+gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnam par 'gyur ba drug tu rab tu bskyod do/ /lho phyogs dang/ nub
218b3(mdo 'grel): phyogs dang/ byang phyogs dang/ byang shar dang/ shar lho dang/ lho nub dang/ nub byang dang/ 'og dang/ steng gi phyogs kyi phyogs re re zhing 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed rnam par 'gyur ba rab tu bskyod do/ /des stong gsum gyi
218b4(mdo 'grel): stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na sems can dmyal ba'i me'i phung po ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad zhi par byas shing sems can dmyal ba pa rnams kyi sdug bsngal rab tu bcil nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
218b5(mdo 'grel): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo zhes bya ba'i sgra brjod do/ /dbyangs sgrog go /de'i tshe sems can dmyal ba'i sems can de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi sgra de thos nas dga' ba dang/ bde ba thob ste/ de dag dga' ba dang bde ba des son dmyal
218b6(mdo 'grel): bde dag naS rnaM par ldang ngo/ /de dag sems can dmyal ba de dag nas rnam par langs nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba dang/ de dag tu skye ste/ lha dang mi'i skye ba yongs su 'dzin to/ /de bzhin du/ byol song
218b7(mdo 'grel): gi skye gnas pa'i sems can rnams dang/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten pa'i sems can de dag nas rnam par ldang ngo/ /de dag byol song gi skye gnas dang/ 'jig rten de dag nas rnam par langs nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang/ gang nas sangs rgyas
219a1(mdo 'grel): bcom ldan 'das rnams bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong ba de dang de dag tu skye ste/ lha dang mi'i skye ba yongs su 'dzin to/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu mkhas pa zhig gis
219a2(mdo 'grel): lam po che'i ba ni mdor 'dug ste/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi mdun du sems can dmyal ba pa dang/ byol song gi skye gnas dang/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten dag cig mngon par sprul la/ de ltar mngon par sprul nas ngan song gi sems can de dag
219a3(mdo 'grel): la sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang/ chos kyi sgra dang/ dge 'dun gyi sgra sgrogs par gyur te/ de nas sprul pa de dag sangs rgyas kyi sgra dang/ chos kyi sgra dang/ dge 'dun gyi sgra nges sems can dmyal ba dang/ byol song gi skye gnas dang/ gshin rje'i 'jig
219a4(mdo 'grel): rten de dang de dag las rnam par langs par gyur na/ rab 'byor de la ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po dang/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu nges sems can gang yang/ sems can dmyal ba dang/ byol song gi skye gnas dang/ gshin rje'i
219a5(mdo 'grel): 'jig rten de dag nas rnam par bslang ba yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten
219a6(mdo 'grel): gyi khams tshad med grangs med pa'i sems can rnams ngan song gsum las yongs su dkrol yang sems can gang yang yongs grol bar byas pa med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyi de
219a7(mdo 'grel): bzhin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po bgos zhes bya'o zhes bya ba ni snying rje'i tshogs so// //rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po go cha chen po
219b1(mdo 'grel): bgos pa ni/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing/ stong gsum gyi stong chen pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams baiDUrya'i? rgyu las byung ba mngon par sprul par byed da/ /de ltar bai DUrya'i rgyu las byung ba mngon par sprul nas/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i bkod pa
219b2(mdo 'grel): mngon par sgru? bar byed do/ /de ltar 'khor los sgyur ba'i bkod pa mngon par sprul nas/ zas 'dod pa rnams la zas kyi sbyin pa byed do/ /skom 'dod pa rnams la skom/ bzhon pa 'dod pa rnams la bzhin pa/ gos 'dod pa rnams gos/ me tog
219b3(mdo 'grel): 'dod pa rnams la me tog/ phreng pa 'dod pa rnams la phreng ba/ spos 'dod pa rnams la spos/ byug pa 'dod pa rnams la byug pa/ mal cha 'dod pa rnams la mal cha/ khyim 'dod pa rnams la khyim/ 'tsho ba 'dod pa rnams la 'tsho ba/ yo byad
219b4(mdo 'grel): 'dod pa rnams la yo byad/ nad kyi rkyen rtsi dang/ yo byad 'dod pa rnams la rtsi dang yo byad kyi sbyin pa byed do/ /nor bu dang/ mu tig dang/ bai DUrya dang/ man shel dang/ byu bu dang/ gser dang dngul 'dod pa rnams la nor bu dang/ mu tig dang/ ?
219b5(mdo 'grel): dang/ dud dang/ man shel dang/ byu ru dang/ gser dang dngul gyi sbyin pa byed cing/ mi'i yo byad gang ci yang rung ba'i bar du sbyin par byed de/ nges de ltar zas 'dod pa rnams la zas byin/ mi'i yo byad gang ci yang rung ba'i bar du byin nas/ sems
219b6(mdo 'grel): can de dag la chos ston pa ? ni 'di lta ste/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i chos bstan pa 'di nyid stong to/ /sems can de dag gis kyang chos bstan pa de thos nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sangs rgyas kyi par du pha
219b7(mdo 'grel): rol tu phyin pa drug dang nam yang 'phral bar mi 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu mkhas pa zhig gis lam po che'i bzhi mdor bdug ste/ skye bo mang po'i tshiD kyi mdun du/ skye bo mang ? tshoD shig
220a1(mdo 'grel): mngon ba sprul te/ zas 'dod pa rnams ? byin/ mi'i lo byang gang ci yang rung ba'i bang du byin na/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ ci sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu mkhas pa des/ sems can gang la yang ci
220a2(mdo 'grel): yang byin pa yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das da ni ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'khor los sgyur ba'i bkod pa mngon par sprul te/ zas 'dod pa
220a3(mdo 'grel): rnams 'bras byin/ mi'i lo byang gar ci yang rung ba'i bar du byin pa dang/ sems can gang la yang ci yang phyi nang med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung na/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyis de bzhin pa'i phyir te/ rab
220a4(mdo 'grel): 'byor de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o zhes bya ba ni sbyin pa'i tshogs so// //rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin
220a5(mdo 'grel): pa la gnas shing cher du bsams te skye ba yongs su bzung bas 'khor los sgyur ba'i rigs su skye zhing 'khor los sgyur ba'i dbang phyug de la gnas nas/ sems can rnams dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu 'gor do/ /bsam gtan bzhi dang/
220a6(mdo 'grel): tshad med pa bzhi dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'i bar dang/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang/ sangs rgyas kyi
220a7(mdo 'grel): ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la sems can rab tu 'god de/ sems can de dag kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par ma gyur gyi bar du/ chos bstan pa de dang nam yang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ro//
220b1(mdo 'grel): rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu mkhas pa zhig gis/ lam po che'i bzhi ma dor 'dug ste/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi mdun du skye po mang po'i tshogs shing mngon par sprul te/ sems can de dag dge ba bcu'i
220b2(mdo 'grel): las kyi lam la bkod dam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar la bkod na/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu mkhas pa des sems can gang yang dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la
220b3(mdo 'grel): bkod pa yod dam/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar la bkod pa yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
220b4(mdo 'grel): sems can tshad med grangs med pa/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam la rab tu bkod de/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar la bkod kyang/ sems can gang yang de dag la bkod pa med do/ /rab 'byor de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung
220b5(mdo 'grel): na/ chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyis de bzhin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni go cha chen po bgos zhes bya'o zhes bya ba ni tshul khrims kyi tshogs so// //bam po bco lnga po/ /rab 'byor gzhan ?
220b6(mdo 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ sems can thams cad bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor zhing la rab tu 'god do/ /rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
220b7(mdo 'grel): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing/ sems can thams cad bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor zhing 'dog la rab tu 'god pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems dang po bskyed pa nas nye
221a1(mdo 'grel): bar bzung ste/ 'di ltar go cha gyon te/ brgya la sems can thams cad bdag la rdo dang/ dbyig pa dang/ khu tshur gyis brdeg cing mtshon gyis 'debs kyang de la bdag gis 'khrug pa'i sems 'ga' tsam yang bskyed
221a2(mdo 'grel): par mi bya zhing sems can thams cad kyang bzod pa de 'dra ba la rab tu dgod par bya'o snyam mo/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na sgyu ma'i mkhan pa 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu mkhas pa zhig gis lam po che'i bzhi med pa 'dug ste/ skye bo mang
221a3(mdo 'grel): po'i tshogs kyi mdun du/ skye po mang po'i tshogs shig mngon par sprul te/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sgyur zhing gzhog la rab tu 'god pa byas na/ rab 'byor de nyi snyam du sems/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu des
221a4(mdo 'grel): sems can gang yang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod pa yod dam/ gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal ba/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems
221a5(mdo 'grel): can tshad med grangs med pa de snyed dag bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod kyang/ sems can gang yang bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la bkod pa med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni sgyu ma'i chos nyid nye bar bzung nas/ chos rnams
221a6(mdo 'grel): kyi chos nyid kyis de bzhin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o zhes bya ba ni bzod pa'i tshogs so// //rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' 
221a7(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing/ sems can thams cad brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par sbyor zhing gzhog la rab tu 'god do/ /rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems
221b1(mdo 'grel): dpa' chen po brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing/ sems can thams cad brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par sbyor ba dang/ gzhig la rab tu 'god pa yan zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnam
221b2(mdo 'grel): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pas/ sems can thams cad lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus la yang dag par sbyor zhing gzhog la rab tu 'god do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i
221b3(mdo 'grel): 'chan bu mkhas ba zhig gis lam po che'i bzhi mdor 'dug ste/ skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi mdun du sgye bo mang po'i tshogs shig mngon par sprul te/ lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus la bkod na/ rab 'byor de la ji snyam du sems/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po
221b4(mdo 'grel): 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu nges sems can gang yang lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus la bkod pa yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni mchis so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems
221b5(mdo 'grel): dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sems can tshad med grangs med pa de snyed pa de dag lus? dang sems kyi brtson 'grus la bkod kyang/ lus dang sems kyi brtson 'grus la bkod pa med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni sgyu ma'i tshos nyid nye bar bzung na/
221b6(mdo 'grel): chos rnams kyi chos nyid kyis de bzhin pa'i phyir te/ rab 'byor de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni go cha chen po bgos pa zhes bya'o zhes bya ba ni brtson 'grus kyi tshogs so// //rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub
221b7(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas shing sems can thams cad bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par sbyor zhing gzhog la rab tu 'god do/ /rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems
222a1(mdo 'grel): dpa' sems dpa' chen po bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la gnas te/ sems can thams cad bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor zhing gzhog la/ rab tu 'god pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang
222a2(mdo 'grel): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos thams cad kyi chos nyid mnyam pa nyid la gnas shing/ chos gang la yang rnam par g.yeng pa'am rnam par mi g.yeng bar yang dag par rjes su mi mthong na/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa
222a3(mdo 'grel): la gnas pa yin te/ de de bzhin du sems can thams cad kyang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par sbyor zhing gzhog pa dang rab tu 'god pa byed de/ de ltar yang dag par sbyar ba rnams kyang na ma bla na med pa yang dag par
222a4(mdo 'grel): rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par ma gyur gyi bar du nam yang bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang 'bral par mi 'gyur ro/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po 'am/ sgyu ma'i mkhan po'i mchan bu mkhas pa
