335b7(mdo 'grel): zhes bya'o/ /byang chub des kyang chos thams cad kyi rnam par shes te/ chos de dag la mngon par chags pa med do/ /chos gang dag gi rnam par shes she na/ gzugs kyi rnam par shes te/ de la mngon par zhen pa med do/ /tshor ba dang/ 'du
336a1(mdo 'grel): shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa'i rnam par shes te/ /de la mngon par zhen pa med do/ /skye mched dang/ khams dang/ rten cing 'brel par 'bral ba so so ba dang bsdus pa'i rnam par shes te/ de la
336a2(mdo 'grel): mngon par zhen pa med do/ /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi rnam par shes te/ de la mngon par zhen pa med de/ /bsam gtan dang/ tshad med pa dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang/ pha rol tu phyin pa rnams
336a3(mdo 'grel): dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang/ mi 'jigs pa rnams dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi rnam par shes te/ de la mngon par zhen pa med do/ /smras pa/ tshe
336a4(mdo 'grel): dang ldan pa rab 'byor chos thams cad kyi rnam pa gang yin /rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam pa gang dag dang/ rtags dang dag dang/ mtshan ma gang dag gis gzugs dang/ sgra dang/ dri dang/ ro dang/ reg bya dang/
336a5(mdo 'grel): chos rnams? sam/ nang gi chos sam/ phyi'i chos sam/ 'dus byas sam/ 'dus ma byas rnams 'dzin par byed pa de dag ni chos thams cad kyi rnam pa zhes bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gang yang 'di skad du shes rab kyi pha rol
336a6(mdo 'grel): tu phyin pa gang zhes zer ba ni tshe dang dang pa shA ri'i bu gang yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba de ni ring du song zhing kun dga' ba 'phags pa ste/ des na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o/ /gang la ring du song zhing
336a7(mdo 'grel): kun dga' ba 'phags she na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu phung po rnams las ring du song zhing kun dga' ba 'phags zhes bya'o/ /skye mched rnams dang/ khams rnams las ring du song zhing kun dga' ba 'phags so/ /de'i phyir pha rol
336b1(mdo 'grel): tu phyin pa zhes bya'o/ /rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba las ring du song zhing kun dga' ba 'phags so/ /nyon mongs pa thams cad dang/ lta ba'i rnam pa thams cad dang/ 'gro ba drug las ring du song zhing kun dga' ba 'phags so/ /de'i phyir pha rol tu phyin
336b2(mdo 'grel): pa zhes bya'o/ /sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa las ring du song zhing kun dga' ba 'phags so/ /de'i phyir ring du song ba zhes bya'o/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bsam gtan
336b3(mdo 'grel): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las ring du song zhing kun dga' ba 'phags so /de'i phyir ring du song ba zhes bya'o/ /nang stong pa nyid las ring du song zhing kun dga' ba 'phags so/ /de'i phyir ring du song ba zhes bya'o/ /phyi sdong pa nyid
336b4(mdo 'grel): las ring du song zhing kun dga' pa 'phags so/ /de'i phyir ring du song ba zhes bya'o/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid las ring du song zhing kun dga' ba 'phags so/ /de'i phyir ring du song pa zhes bya'o/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bang? las
336b5(mdo 'grel): ring du song zhing kun dga' ba 'phags so/ /de'i phyir ring du song ba zhes bya'o/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams las ring du song zhing kun dga' ba 'phags so/ /de'i phyir ring du song ba zhes bya'o/ /yang dag par spong ba rnams dang/ rdzu 'phrul ?
336b6(mdo 'grel): rkang pa rnams dang/ dbang po rnams dang/ stobs rnams dang/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa las ring du song zhing kun dga' ba 'phags so/ /de'i phyir ring du song ba zhes bya'o/ /bsam gtan rnams
336b7(mdo 'grel): dang/ tshad med pa rnams dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams las ring du song zhing kun dga' ba 'phags so/ /de'i phyir ring du song ba zhes bya'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang/ mi 'jigs pa rnams dang/ so so 
337a1(mdo 'grel): yang dag par rig pa rnams dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams las ring du song zhing kun dga' ba 'phags so/ /des dang ring du song zhing 'phags po gang yin pa 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes
337a2(mdo 'grel): bya'o/ /de'i phyir ring du song ba zhes bya'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na 'di ni ring du song zhing kun dga' ba 'phags pa yin te/ 'di lta ste/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gang yang 'di skad
337a3(mdo 'grel): du yongs su rtog pa de ni gang zhes zer ba ni/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyon pa'i tshe/ gzugs rtag ces bya ba dang/ mi rtag ces bya ba mi rtog go/ pang?
337a4(mdo 'grel): zhes bya ba dang sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ bdag ces bya ba dang bdag med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ zhi zhes bya ba dang ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ stong zhes bya ba dang mi stong zhes bya bar yongs su
337a5(mdo 'grel): mi rtog go/ mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang mtshan ma med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ smon ba yod ces bya ba dang smon pa med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ dben zhes bya ba dang mi dben zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ tshor ba dang/ 'du
337a6(mdo 'grel): shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba dang/ mi rtag ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ bde zhes bya ba dang sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ bdag ces bya ba dang bdag med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/
337a7(mdo 'grel): zhi zhes bya ba dang ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ stong zhes bya ba dang mi stong zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang/ mtshan ma med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /smon pa yod ces bya ba dang/ smon pa med
337b1(mdo 'grel): ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ dben zhes bya ba dang/ mi dben zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ mig rtag ces bya ba dang/ mi rtag ces bya bar yongs su mi rtag go/ bde zhes bya ba dang sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ bdag ces bya ba dang/ bdag med
337b2(mdo 'grel): ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ zhi zhes bya ba dang/ ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ stong zhes bya ba dang/ mi stong zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang mtshan ma med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ smon pa yod ces bya ba dang smon
337b3(mdo 'grel): pa med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ dben zhes bya ba dang mi dben zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ rna ba dang/ sna dang/ lce dang/ lus dang/ yid rtag ces bya ba dang mi rtag ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ bde zhes bya ba dang/ sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su mi
337b4(mdo 'grel): rtog go /bdag ces bya ba dang bdag med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ zhi zhes bya ba dang ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ stong zhes bya ba dang mi stong zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang mtshan ma med ces bya bar yongs su mi
337b5(mdo 'grel): rtog go /smon pa yod ces bya ba dang smon pa med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /dben zhes bya ba dang mi dben zhes ba bar yongs su mi rtog go/ gzugs rtag ces bya ba dang mi rtag ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ bde zhes bya ba dang sdug bsngal zhes bya bar
337b6(mdo 'grel): yongs su mi rtog go/ bdag ces bya ba dang bdag med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ zhi zhes bya ba dang ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ stong zhes bya ba dang mi stong zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang mtshan ma mang ces bya bas
337b7(mdo 'grel): yongs su mi rtog go/ smon pa yod ces bya ba dang/ smon pa med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /dben zhes bya ba dang mi dben zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /sgra dang /dri dang/ ro dang/ reg bya dang/ chos rtag ces bya ba dang mi rtag ces bya bar yongs su
338a1(mdo 'grel): mi rtog go/ bde zhes bya ba dang sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtag go/ bdag ces bya ba dang bdag med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ zhi zhes bya ba dang ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ stong? zhes bya bar mi stong zhes
338a2(mdo 'grel): bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang mtshan ma med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ smon? pa yod ces bya ba dang smon? pa med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ dben zhes bya ba dang mi dben zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ mig gi rnam par
338a3(mdo 'grel): shes brtag ces bya ba dang mi rtog ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ bde zhes bya ba dang sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ bdag ces bya ba dang bdag med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ zhi zhes bya ba dang ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ stong
338a4(mdo 'grel): zhes bya ba dang mi stong zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang mtshan ma med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ smon pa yod ces bya ba dang smon pa med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ dben zhes bya ba dang mi dben zhes bya bar yongs su mi
338a5(mdo 'grel): rtog go/ rna ba'i rnam par shes pa dang/ sna'i rnam par shes pa dang/ lce'i rnam par shes pa dang/ lus kyi rnam par shes pa dang/ yid kyi rnam par shes pa rtag ces bya ba dang mi rtag ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ bde zhes bya ba dang sdug
338a6(mdo 'grel): bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ bdag ces bya ba dang/ bdag med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ zhi zhes bya ba dang ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ stong zhes bya ba dang mi stong zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang
338a7(mdo 'grel): mtshan ma med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /smon pa yod ces bya ba dang smon pa med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog dben zhes bya ba dad mi dben zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa rtag ces bya ba dang/ mi rtag ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/
338b1(mdo 'grel): bde zhes bya ba dang sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ bdag ces bya ba dang bdag med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ zhi zhes bya ba dang/ ma zhi nas bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ stong zhes bya ba dang mi stong zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go mtshan ma yod
338b2(mdo 'grel): ces bya ba dang mtshan ma med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go smon pa yod ces bya ba dang smon pa med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ dben zhes bya ba dang mi dben zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ rna ba'i ? te reg? pa dang/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa dang/ lce'i
338b3(mdo 'grel): 'dus te reg pa dang/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa dang/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa rtag ces bya ba dang mi rtag ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go /bde zhes bya ba dang sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ bdag ces bya ba dang bdag ming ces bya bar yongs su mi
338b4(mdo 'grel): rtog go/ zhi zhes bya ba dang ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ stong zhes bya ba dang mi stong zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ mtshan? ma yod ces bya ba dang mtshan med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ smon pa yod ces bya ba dang smon pa med ces bya bar
338b5(mdo 'grel): yongs su mi rtog go /dben zhes bya ba dang mi dben zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ mig gi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rtag ces bya ba dang mi rtag ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ bde zhes bya ba dang sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go bdag ces
338b6(mdo 'grel): bya ba dang bdag med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ zhi zhes bya ba dang ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ stong zhes bya ba dang mi stong zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang mtshan ma med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ smon pa
338b7(mdo 'grel): yod ces bya ba dang smon pa med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ dben zhes bya ba dang mi dben zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ rna ba'i 'dus te rig pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang/ sna'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang/ lce'i 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen
339a1(mdo 'grel): kyis tshor ba dang/ lus kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba dang/ yid kyi 'dus te reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba rtag ces bya ba dang mi rtag ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ bde zhes bya ba dang sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/
339a2(mdo 'grel): bdag ces bya ba dang bdag med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ zhi zhes bya ba dang ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ stong zhes bya ba dang mi stong zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang mtshan ma med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/?
339a3(mdo 'grel): smon pa yod ces bya ba dang smon pa med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ dben zhes bya ba dang mi dben zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa rtag ces bya ba dang mi rtag ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ bde zhes bya ba dang sdug bsngal
339a4(mdo 'grel): zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ bdag ces bya ba dang bdag med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ zhi zhes bya ba dang ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ stong zhes bya ba dang mi stong zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang mtshan ma
339a5(mdo 'grel): med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ smon pa yod ces bya ba dang smon pa med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ dben zhes bya ba dang mi dben zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ brtson
339a6(mdo 'grel): 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rtag ces bya ba dang mi rtag ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ bde zhes bya ba dang sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ bdag ces bya ba dang
339a7(mdo 'grel): bdag med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ zhi zhes bya ba dang ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ stong zhes bya ba dang mi stong zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang/ mtshan ma med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go 
339b1(mdo 'grel): smon pa yod ces bya ba dang smon pa med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ /dben zhes bya ba dang mi dben zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ nang stong pa nyid rtag ces bya ba dang mi rtag ces bya bar yongs su mi rtag go/ bde zhes bya ba dang sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su mi
339b2(mdo 'grel): rtog go/ bdag ces bya ba dang bdag med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ zhi zhes bya ba dang ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ stong zhes bya ba dang mi stong zhes bya par yongs su mi rtog go/ mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang mtshan ma med ces bya bar yongs su
339b3(mdo 'grel): mi rtog go/ smon pa yod ces bya ba dang smon pa med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ dben zhes bya ba dang mi dben zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ dngos? po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du rtag ces bya ba dang mi rtag ces bya bar yongs su
339b4(mdo 'grel): mi rtog go /bde zhes bya ba dang sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ bdag ces bya ba dang bdag med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ zhi zhes bya ba dang ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ steng zhes bya ba dang mi stong zhes bya bar yongs
339b5(mdo 'grel): mi rtog go/ mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang mtshan ma med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ smon pa yod ces bya ba dang smon pa med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ dben zhes bya ba dang mi dben zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams
339b6(mdo 'grel): rtag ces bya ba dang mi rtag ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ bde zhes bya ba dang sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ bdag ces bya ba dang bdag med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog/ zhi zhes bya ba dang ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ stong zhes ba pa dang mi stong
339b7(mdo 'grel): zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang mtshan ma med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ smon pa yod ces bya ba dang smon pa med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ dben zhes bya ba dang mi dben zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/
340a1(mdo 'grel): yang dag par spong ba rnams dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang/ dbang po rnams dang/ stobs rnams dang/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa rtag ces bya ba dang mi rtag ces bya
340a2(mdo 'grel): bar yongs su mi rtog go /bde zhes bya ba dang sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ bdag ces bya ba dang bdag med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ zhi zhes bya ba dang ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ stong zhes bya ba dang mi stong zhes bya bar
340a3(mdo 'grel): yongs su mi rtog go /mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang mtshan med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ smon pa yod ces bya ba dang smon pa med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ dben zhes bya ba dang mi dben zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ bsam gtan rnams dang
340a4(mdo 'grel): tshad med pa rnams dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang/ mngon par shes pa rnams dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang/ mi 'jigs pa rnams dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang/ sangs rgyas kyi
340a5(mdo 'grel): chos ma 'dres pa rnams rtag ces bya ba dang mi rtag ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ bde zhes bya ba dang sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ bdag ces bya ba dang bdag med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ zhi zhes bya ba dang ma zhi zhes bya
340a6(mdo 'grel): bar yongs su rtog go/ stong zhes bya ba dang mi stong zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ mtshan ma yod ces bya ba deng mtshan ma med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ smon pa yod ces bya ba dang smon pa med ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ dben zhes bya ba
340a7(mdo 'grel): dang mi dben zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rtag ces bya ba dang mi rtag ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ bde zhes bya ba dang sdug bsngal zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ bdag ces bya ba dang bdag med
340b1(mdo 'grel): ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ zhi zhes bya ba dang ma zhi zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ stong zhes bya ba dang mi stong zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ mtshan ma yod ces bya ba dang mtshan ma mdo ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ smon pa yod ces bya ba dang smon pa med
340b2(mdo 'grel): ces bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ dben zhes bya ba dang mi dben zhes bya bar yongs su mi rtog go/ 'di lta ste tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos 'di dag la yongs su rtog pa
340b3(mdo 'grel): med pa'i tshul gyis de? ltar yongs su rtog go/ smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na de skad du gzugs kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin/ tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnam dang/ rnam par shes pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni
340b4(mdo 'grel): rnam par shes pa ma yin zhes zer/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na de skad du skye mched dang/ khams dang/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang/ pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang/ stong pa nyid thams cad dang/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang/ bsam
340b5(mdo 'grel): gtan rnams dang/ tshad med pa rnams dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang/ mi 'jigs pa rnams dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang/
340b6(mdo 'grel): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ma skyes ba gang yin pa de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin zhes zer/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu gzugs ni gzugs kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni gzugs ma yin te skye ba med do//
340b7(mdo 'grel): tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na gzugs kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa ni rnam par shes pas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni rnam par
341a1(mdo 'grel): shes pa ma yin te skye ba med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs nges na rnam par shes pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma yin no/ /tshe? dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ste mched drug dang khams dang/ rten cing?
341a2(mdo 'grel): 'brel par 'byung ba ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung pas stong ste/ gang stong ba de ni rten cing 'brel par? 'byung ba ma yin te skye ba med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs nges na rten cing 'brel par 'byung pa'i ma skyes? pa gang yin pa de ni
341a3(mdo 'grel): rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin te skye ba med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs deng/? na
341a4(mdo 'grel): sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni sbyin pa de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bsam
341a5(mdo 'grel): gtan kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pas stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin te skye ba med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na shes rab kyi pha rol
341a6(mdo 'grel): tu phyin pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu nang stong pa nyid ni nang stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni nang stong pa nyid ma yin te skye ba med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu
341a7(mdo 'grel): rnam grangs des na nang stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de nang stong pa nyid ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu phyi stong pa nyid ni phyi stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni phyi stong pa nyid ma yin te/ skye ba med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i
341b1(mdo 'grel): bu rnam grangs des na phyi stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni phyi stong pa nyid ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu phyi nang stong pa nyid ni phyi nang stong pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni phyi nang stong pa ? ma yin te skye ba med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs ? nu phyi
341b2(mdo 'grel): nang stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni phyi nang stong pa nyid ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma
341b3(mdo 'grel): yin te skye ba med de/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ni dran pa nye bar gzhag
341b4(mdo 'grel): pa rnams kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ma yin te skye pa med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs nges na dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams ma yin no//
341b5(mdo 'grel): tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu yang dag par spong ba rnams dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang/ dbang po rnams dang/ stobs rnams dang/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams dang/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pas
341b6(mdo 'grel): stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ma yin te skye ba med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa'i ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni 'phags pa'i sa yan lag brgyad pa ma yin no/
341b7(mdo 'grel): pas ma gtad rnams dang/ tshad med pa rnams dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang/ mi 'jigs pa rnams dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang/ chos ma 'dres pa rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi
342a1(mdo 'grel): chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ma yin te skye ba med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs nges na sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de sangs rgyas
342a2(mdo 'grel): kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ma yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyis stong ste/ gang stong pa de ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin te skye ba med do/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam
342a3(mdo 'grel): grangs nges na rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa gang yin pa de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin no/ /smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na de skad du gzugs kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de gzugs ma yin/ tshor ba dang/ 'du shes
342a4(mdo 'grel): dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par shes pa ma yin no/ /skye mched dang/ khams dang/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang/ pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang/ stong pa nyid thams cad dang/ byang chub kyi phyogs
342a5(mdo 'grel): kyis chos rnams dang/ bsam gtan dang/ tshad med pa dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyems par 'jug pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang/ mi 'jigs pa dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyi 'grib pa
342a6(mdo 'grel): gang yin pa de ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams ma yin te/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par thams cad mkyen pa nyid ma yin zhes zer/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di
342a7(mdo 'grel): ltar 'gris pa gang yin pa dang/ gzugs gang yin pa dang/ gnyis su byar med pa gang yin pa dang/ 'grib pa gang yin pa dang/ tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dad/ rnam par shes pa gang yin pa dang/ gnyis su byar med pa gang
342b1(mdo 'grel): yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad ni ldan pa yang ma yin/ mi ldan pa yang ma yin te/ gzugs med pa/ bltar ? pa/ theg pa med pa/ mtshan nyid gcig pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid med pa'o/ /'grib pa gang yin pa dang/ skye mched dang/ khams dang/
342b2(mdo 'grel): rtan cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang/ gnyis su byang med pa gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad kyang ldan pa yang ma yin/ mi ldan pa yang ma yin/ gzugs med pa/ bltar med pa/ thogs pa med pa/ mtshan nyid gcig pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid med pa'o/
342b3(mdo 'grel): 'grib pa gang yin pa dang/ pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang/ stong pa nyid thams cad dang/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang/ bsam gtan rnams dang/ tshad med pa rnams dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug ga rnams dang/ de bzhin gshegs
342b4(mdo 'grel): pa'i stobs rnams dang/ mi 'jigs pa rnams dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar yang yin pa dang/ gnyis su byar med pa gang yin pa'i chos de dag thams cad kyang
342b5(mdo 'grel): ldan pa yang ma yin/ mi ldan pa yang ma yin/ gzugs med pa/ bltar med pa/ thogs pa med pa/ mtshan nyid gcig pa ste/ 'di ltar mtshan nyid med pa'o/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na gzugs kyi 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang gzugs
342b6(mdo 'grel): ma yin/ tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa'i 'grib ba gang yin pa de rnam par shes pa ma yin/ skye mched dang/ khams dang/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang rten cing 'grel? par 'byung ba
342b7(mdo 'grel): ma yin/ pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang/ stong pa nyid thams cad dang/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang/ bsam gtan rnams dang/ tshad med pa rnams dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnam ?
343a1(mdo 'grel): mi 'jigs pa rnams dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ? gyis 'grib pa gang yin pa de yang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin no//
343a2(mdo 'grel): smras pa tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci'i phyir na/ de skad du gzugs zhes de ltar brjod pa gang yin pa 'di ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa zhes de ltar brjod pa gang
343a3(mdo 'grel): yin pa de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa zhes bya ba'i bar de ltar brjod pa gang yin pa 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis pa'i grangs su byas ba'o/ zhes zer/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar gzugs
343a4(mdo 'grel): kyang gzhan ma yin ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang gzugs gzugs nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na gang 'di gzugs zhes de ltar brjod pa gang yin pa 'di ni gnyis su med pa'i ? su byas
343a5(mdo 'grel): pa'o/ /'di ltar tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa yang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang rnam par shes pa/ rnam par gshes pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam
343a6(mdo 'grel): grangs des na/ gang 'di rnam par shes pa zhes de ltar brjod pa gang yin pa 'di ni gnyis su ma mchis pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /'di lta ste skye mched dang/ khams dang/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang/ pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang/ stong pa nyid thams
343a7(mdo 'grel): cad dang/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams dang/ bsam gtan rnams dang/ tshad med pa rnams dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang/ mngon par shes pa rnams dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang/ mi 'jigs pa rnams
343b1(mdo 'grel): dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams kyang gzhan ma yin/ ma skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA
343b2(mdo 'grel): ri'i bu rnam grangs nges na gang 'di sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams zhes 'di ltar brjod pa gang yin pa de ni gnyis su med pa'i grangs byas pa'o/ /'di lta ste ting nge 'dzin dang/ gzungs kyi sgo? dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi par yang gzhan ma yin/ ma
343b3(mdo 'grel): skyes pa yang gzhan ma yin te/ ma skyes pa nyid kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang ma skyes pa ste/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu rnam grangs des na gang 'di rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces de ltar brjod pa gang yin pa 'di ni
343b4(mdo 'grel): gnyis su med pa'i grangs su byas pa'o/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod cing chos de dag la de ltar
343b5(mdo 'grel): yongs su rtogs pa de'i tshe shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du gzugs kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i
343b6(mdo 'grel): slad du skye mched rnams dang/ khams rnams dang/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rnams kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slar du tshul khrims kyi pha
343b7(mdo 'grel): rol tu phyin pa dang/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du nang stong pa nyid kyis skyes pa mthong
344a1(mdo 'grel): bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du nang stong pa nyid kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar gyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu
344a2(mdo 'grel): rnam par dag pa'i slad du dran pa nye bar gzhag pa rnams kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du yang dag par spong ba rnams dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams dang/ dbang po rnams dang/ stobs rnams dang/ byang chub kyi
344a3(mdo 'grel): yan lag rnams dang/ 'phaD pa'i lam yang lag brgyad pa'i ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du bsam gtan rnams dang/ tshad med pa rnams dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang/ rnam par thar pa
344a4(mdo 'grel): rnams dang/ mngon par shes pa rnams dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang/ mi 'jigs pa rnams dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa rnams dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i spang du rnaM
344a5(mdo 'grel): pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du so so'i skye po'i ma skyes ba mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du so so'i skye bo'i chos rnams kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i
344a6(mdo 'grel): slad du rgyun tu zhugs pa dang/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i chos rnams kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam par dag pa'i slad du lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i chos rnams dang/ phyir mi 'ong ba dang/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i chos rnams dang/ dgra
344a7(mdo 'grel): bcom pa dang/ dgra bcom pa'i chos rnams dang/ rang sangs rgyas dang/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams dang/ byang chub sems dpa' dang/ byang chub sems dpa' i chos rnams dang/ sangs rgyas kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur/ shin tu rnam
344b1(mdo 'grel): par dag pa'i slad du sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams kyi ma skyes pa mthong bar 'gyur ro/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis smras pa'i don bdag gis shes pa ltar na gzugs kyang
344b2(mdo 'grel): skyes/ chor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa yang ma skyes/ skye mched kyang ma skyes/ khams kyang ma skyes/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rnams kyang ma skyes/ pha rol tu phyin pa rnams kyang ma skyes/ stong pa nyid thams cad kyang ma skyes
344b3(mdo 'grel): byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun kyang ma skyes/ bsam gtan rnams dang/ tshad med pa rnams dang/ gzugs med pa'i sems par 'jug pa rnams kyang ma skyes/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams dang/ mi 'jigs pa rnams dang/ so so yang dag ?
344b4(mdo 'grel): rigs pa rnams dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bcom rgyad kyang ma skyes/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar yang ma skyes/ so so skye bo yang ma skyes/ so so skye bo'i chos kyang ma skyes/ rgyun tu zhugs pa yang ma skyes/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i chos kyang ma skyes/ lan
344b5(mdo 'grel): cig phyir 'ong ba yang ma skyes/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i chos kyang ma skyes/ phyir mi 'ong ba yang ma skyes/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i chos kyang ma skyes/ dgra bcom pa yang ma skyes/ dgra bcom pa'i chos kyang ma skyes/ rang sangs rgyas kyang ma skyes/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos
344b6(mdo 'grel): kyang ma skyes/ byang chub sems dpa' yang ma skyes/ byang chub sems dpa' i chos kyang ma skyes/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang ma skyes pa yin no/ /tshe dang ldan pa gal te dpyod de ltar gzugs kyang ma skyes pa nas sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar yang 
344b7(mdo 'grel): skye ba med rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar yang skye pa med/ so so skye bo yang skye ba med/ so so skye bo'i chos kyang skye ba med/ rgyun tu zhugs pa dang/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'i c hos kyang skye ba med/ lan cig 'ong pa dang/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i
345a1(mdo 'grel): chos kyang skye ba med/ phyir mi 'ong ba dang/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i chos kyang skye ba med/ dgra bcom pa dang/ dgra bcom pa'i chos kyang skye ba med/ rang sangs rgyas dang/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang skye ba med/ byang chub sems dpa' yang skye ba med
345a2(mdo 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' i chos kyang skye ba med/ sangs rgyas kyang skye ba med/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang skye ba med pa na ni nyan thos kyi theg pa rnams kyis kyang rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu
345a3(mdo 'grel): dang/ dgra bcom pa nyid thob? zin par 'gyur ro/ /dang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa rnams kyis kyang rang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub thob zin par 'gyur ro/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos kyang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob zin par
345a4(mdo 'grel): 'gyur ro/ /'gro ba lnga rnams kyang tha dad par mi 'gyur ro/ /tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gal te chos thams cad kyang ma skyes pa yin na/ ci'i phyir rgyun tu zhugs pas kun tu sbyor? ba gsum spangs pa'i phyir lam sgom par bya/ lan cig phyir 'ong bas ni
345a5(mdo 'grel): 'dod chags dang/ zhe sdang dang/ gti mug bsrab pa'i phyir lam bsgom par bya/ phyir mi 'ong pas ni 'og ma'i cha dang mthun pa'i kun tu sbyor ba lnga spangs pa'i phyir lam bsgom par bya/ dgra bcom pas ni gong ma'i cha dang mthun pa kun tu spyod
345a6(mdo 'grel): ba rnams spang pa'i phyir lam bsgom par bya/ rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la zhugs pas ni rang byang chub kyi don du lam bsgom par bya/ ci'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni sems can rnams kyi don du da ltar sdug bsngal nyams su
345a7(mdo 'grel): myong bar byed cing dka' ba'i spyad pa spyod/ ci'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pas ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas/ ci'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pas ni chos kyi 'khor lo bskor/ de skad ces smras pa
345b1(mdo 'grel): dang/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces smras so/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu bdag ni chos ma skyes pa la thong pa 'am mngon par rtogs par mi 'dod do/ /bdag ni ma skyes? la rgyun tu zhugs pa mi 'dod do/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu
345b2(mdo 'grel): mi 'dod/ mi skyes pa la lan cig phyir 'ong ba mi 'dod/ lan cig phyir 'ong pa'i 'bras bu mi 'dod do/ /ma skyes pa la phyir mi 'ong ba mi 'dod do/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu mi 'dod do/ /ma skyes pa la dgra bcom pa mi 'dod/ dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu ma
345b3(mdo 'grel): 'dod do/ /ma skyes pa la rang sangs rgyas mi 'dod/ rang sangs rgyas nyid mi 'dod do/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu bdag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i spyod pa spyed par mi 'dod do/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni dka' pa'i?
345b4(mdo 'grel): 'du shes kyis spyod pa yang ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu sdug bsngal gyi 'du shes la gnas pas ni sems can gnas pas ni sems can gzhal du med/ grangs med/ tshad med pa rnams kyi ngon bya bar mi nus kyi/ tshe dang ldan
345b5(mdo 'grel): pa shA ri'i bu 'on kyang sems can la mar 'du shes bskyed ba dang/ phar 'du zhes bskyed pa dang/ bdag tu 'du shes bskyed pa dang/ bur 'du shes bskyed pas sems can gzhal du med/ grangs med/ tshad med pa rnams kyi don bya bar nus te/ de yang mi
345b6(mdo 'grel): dmigs pa'i tshul gyis so/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni 'di ltar sems bskyed do/ /ji ltar bdag bdag ces brjod kyang de ni thams cad du thams cad rnam pa thams cad du thams cad med cing mi dmigs pa de bzhin du phyi nang gi chos
345b7(mdo 'grel): rnams la yang 'du shes bskyed do/ de ltar 'du shes bskyed kyang dka' ba'i 'du shes bskyed de/ de ltar 'du shes bskyed kyang dka' ba'i 'du shes ma bskyed do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de ni chos gang yang mi len mi dmigs pa'i phyir ro/ /tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i
346a1(mdo 'grel): bu bdag ni ma skyes pa la de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'dod do/ /bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub snad? ma'i 'dod do/ /chos kyis bong? po bstong bar yang mi 'dod do/ /chos ma skyes? pas thob par yang mi 'dod do/ /smras? pa/
346a2(mdo 'grel): tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ci ma skyes pa'i chos kyis thob pa skyes pa thob pa 'am/ 'on te skyes pa'i chos kyi thob pa ma skyes pa thob pa'i? rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa sha ri'i bu bdag ni skyes pa'i chos kyi thob pa ma skyes pa thob par yang mi 'dod la/ ma skyes pa'i chos
346a3(mdo 'grel): kyis thob pa skyes pa thob par yang mi 'dod do/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ni 'o na thob pa med pa la mngon par rtog pa med dam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu thob pa yang yod/ mngon par rtogs pa yod do/ /gnyis ni ma yin no/ /tshe dang
346a4(mdo 'grel): ldan pa shA ri'i bu thob pa'am/ mngon par rtogs pa ni 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyis gdags pa'o/ /rgyun tu zhugs pa 'am/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba 'am/ phyir mi 'ong ba 'am/ dgra bcom pa 'am/ rang sangs rgyas sam/ byang chub sems dpa' 'am/ sangs rgyas
346a5(mdo 'grel): kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad kyis gdags pa ste/ don dam par ni thob pa 'am/ mngon par rtogs pa 'am/ rgyun tu zhugs pa'am/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'am/ phyir mi 'ong ba'am/ dgra bcom pa'am/ rang sangs rgyas sam/ byang chub sems dpa' 'am/ rang
346a6(mdo 'grel): sangs rgyas kyang med do/ shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ma skyes pa'i chos ma skyes pa'i chos smra bar nus sam/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu ma skyes pa'i chos ma skyes pa'i chos zhes smra bar spobs sam zhes zer ba ni/
346a7(mdo 'grel): tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu kho bo la ni chos ma skyes pa yang smra ba'i spobs pa med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar ma skyes pa'i chos gang yin pa dang/ spobs pa gang yin pa dang/ smra ba gang yin pa dang/ ma skyes pa gang yin pa 'di dag thaMs cad ni ldan
346b1(mdo 'grel): pa yang ma yin/ mi ldan pa yang ma yin zhing gzugs can ma yin zhing bstan du med pa/ thogs pa med pa/ mtshan nyid gcig pa ste/ 'di lta ste mtshan nyid med pa'i shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor smra ba yang skye ba yang med pa/ spongs pa yang skye ba med pa/ chos
346b2(mdo 'grel): kyang skye ba med pa gang las brtsams te spobs pa'i chos bdag kyang skye ba med pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de de bzhin te smra ba ni skye ba med do/ /spongs? ma pa ni skye ba med do/ /chos ni skye ba med do/ /gang las pa rnams? nas smra bar spangs par yang? med do/
346b3(mdo 'grel): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu 'di ltar gzugs skyeng? med do/ /tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes ba ni skye ba med do/ /de bzhin du so so ba dang/ bsdus pa'i skyen tshed? dang/ khams dang/ rten cing 'drel bar 'gyur ba dang/ pha rol
346b4(mdo 'grel): tu phyin pa rnams dang/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang/ stong pa nyid thams cad dang/ bsam gtan dang/ tshed med pa dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang/ mngon par shes pa dang/ ting 'dzin dang/ gzugs kyi sgo? rnams dang/ stongs
346b5(mdo 'grel): dang/ mi 'jigs pa dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad rnams skye ba med do/ /rgyun tu zhugs ba dang/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba dang/ phyir mi 'ong ba dang/ dgra bcom pa dang/ sangs rgyas dang/ byang chub sems dpa' dang/
346b6(mdo 'grel): thams cad shes pa dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang skye ba med do/ /shA ri'i bus smras ba/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor de de bzhin te/ smra ba ni skye ba med do/ /spobs ba ni skye ba med do/ /chos ni skye ba med do/ /? brtsams nas smra ba spobs pa'i chos de dag/
346b7(mdo 'grel): kyang skye ba med do/ /phung po dang/ khams dang/ skye mched dang/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba dang/ pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos dang/ stong pa nyid thams cad dang/ ting 'dzin dang/ gzungs kyi sgo thams cad dang/ bstong pa dang/ mi 'jigs?
347a1(mdo 'grel): dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa nas de bzhin du sbyar te rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du skye ba med do/ /de ltar na 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du 'gro ba
347a2(mdo 'grel): lnga pa rnams tha dad pa yin gyi/ don dam par ni ma yin no/ /shA ri'i bus smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor thob pa dang mngon par rtogs par bya ba 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du yod pa de bzhin du 'gro ba lnga dag
347a3(mdo 'grel): kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du tha dad kyi/ don dam par ni ma yin nam/ smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu de de bzhin te ji ltar thob pa dang/ mngon par rtogs pa 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du yod pa de bzhin du 'gro ba lnga
347a4(mdo 'grel): dag kyang 'jig rten gyi tha snyad du tha dad kyi/ don dam par ni ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu don dam par ni las kyang med/ las kyi rnam par smin pa yang med/ skye ba med/
347a5(mdo 'grel): 'gag pa yang med/ kun nas nyon mongs pa yang med/ rnam par byang ba yang med do/ /smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor ma skyes pa'i chos skye bar 'gyur ram/ 'on te skyes pa'i chos skye bar
347a6(mdo 'grel): 'gyur/ rab 'byor gyis smras pa/ tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu bdag ni ma skyes pa'i chos kyang skye bar mi 'dod/ skyes pa'i chos kyang skye bar mi 'dod do// sarba mang+gA laM// //
